name: height
example: 单词 height 的例句||||The two trees are about the same height. 这两棵树高度差不多。||||Prices rise to a great height. 价格大涨。

name: nut
interpret: n.坚果；果仁；螺母，螺帽；难对付的人（事）
example: 单词 nut 的例句||||My favorite nut is peanut. 我最喜欢的坚果是花生。||||This old nut won't bite. 这个旧螺母咬不住扣。

name: slowly
example: 单词 slowly 的例句||||Speak more slowly, please. 请说慢一点。||||Do it slowly and carefully. 要慢慢仔细地做。

name: quietly
example: 单词 quietly 的例句||||Winter has came quietly. 冬天悄然地来了。||||You have to play quietly. 你要安安静静地玩。

name: area
example: 单词 area 的例句||||John is the London area manager. 约翰是伦敦地区经理。||||The farm covers a large area. 这农场面积很大。

name: crowded
example: 单词 crowded 的例句||||Earth is becoming more and more crowded. 地球变得越来越拥挤。||||Guangzhou is a crowded city! 广州是个拥挤的城市！

name: product
example: 单词 product 的例句||||The new product sells well. 这新产品很畅销。|||| This is the product of his labour. 这是他劳动的成果。

name: traffic
example: 单词 traffic 的例句||||That will help the traffic. 这会促进交通状况。||||He had a traffic accident. 他出了交通事故。

name: ever
interpret: adv.曾经；永远；不断地；在任何时候；究竟
example: 单词 ever 的例句||||Have you ever been to Hangzhou? 你曾经去过杭州吗？||||I will be young and strong and beautiful for ever. 我将永远年轻、强壮，永远漂亮。

name: pancake
example: 单词 pancake 的例句||||Well, have you ever made a pancake by yourself?  嗯，你有没有自己做过烤饼吃？||||Do you like to eat pancake? 你想吃煎饼吗？

name: menu
example: 单词 menu 的例句||||Here is the lunch menu. 这是午餐的菜单。||||Let's look at the menu first. 我们先看看菜谱吧。

name: litter
interpret: n.垃圾，杂乱；v.乱丢垃圾，弄乱
example: 单词 litter 的例句||||The park and river are full of litter. 公园和河里满是乱扔的废弃物。||||Don't litter. 别乱扔垃圾。

name: unhealthy
example: 单词 unhealthy 的例句||||That book is unhealthy for a child to read. 那本书很不健康，不适宜孩子阅读。||||Mary has an unhealthy life style. 玛丽的生活方式不健康。

name: railway
example: 单词 railway 的例句||||Police closed the railway station. 警察关闭了火车站。||||Our village is close to the railway station. 我们村挨近火车站。

name: noon
interpret: n.中午，正午；最高点；全盛期
example: 单词 noon 的例句||||She often reads newspaper at noon. 她常在中午看报。||||I'll be back before noon. 我会在正午之前回来。

name: peel
example: 单词 peel 的例句||||Some people like to peel the apple before eating. 有的人吃苹果喜欢剥皮。||||Let me peel a banana. 让我来剥香蕉皮。

name: except
interpret: vt. 不计；把…除外；vi. 反对；prep.除了...之外，若不是，除非
example: 单词 except 的例句||||Everybody is here except Tom. 除了汤姆大家都到了。||||He never came except when he was in trouble. 除非有了困难，他从来不到这里来。

name: dumpling
interpret: n.饺子，汤团；水果布丁；矮胖的人
example: 单词 dumpling 的例句||||Would you like a dumpling? 你想要吃饺子吗？||||There's some meat but there's no dumpling. 有一些肉但是没有饺子。

name: camp
interpret: n.宿营；野营；营地；vi.露营，扎营
example: 单词 camp 的例句||||We have to go back to camp now. 我们现在该回营去了。||||We shall camp beside our church. 我们应该在教堂旁边扎营。

name: against
example: 单词 against 的例句||||You're against the traffic rules. 你违反了交通规则。||||Are you for or against? 你是赞成还是反对？

name: pilot
interpret: n.飞行员，领航员，引航员；vt.领航，驾驶，向导；adj.引导的，示范的
example: 单词 pilot 的例句||||He has become a pilot. 他已成为一名飞行员。|||| Nowadays girls pilot planes, too! 现在姑娘家也会开飞机啦！

name: lay
interpret: （lie的过去式和过去分词）；vt.击，放置，产卵，使平静，打赌，压平，设计；vi.生蛋，打赌，全力以赴；n.隐蔽处，计划，价格，生蛋，叙事诗，诗歌；adj.世俗的，外行的
example: 单词 lay 的例句||||Please lay the knife on the dish. 请把刀放在盘子上。||||All birds lay eggs. 鸟都下蛋。

name: dolphin
example: 单词 dolphin 的例句||||They are looking at the dolphin. 他们正看着那头海豚。||||A dolphin is jumping. 海豚在跳跃。

name: ocean
example: 单词 ocean 的例句||||Who lives in the ocean? 谁生活在大海里？||||I have an ocean of things to do. 我有许多事情要做。

name: tower
example: 单词 tower 的例句||||How high is the tower? 这塔有多高？||||The tower is on the top of the hill. 塔位于山顶上。

name: cherry
example: 单词 cherry 的例句||||Each cake has a cherry on top. 每块蛋糕上面都有一颗樱桃。||||Pick a cherry and put it into the mouth. 摘一个放在嘴巴里。

name: asleep
interpret: adj.睡熟了的，麻木的；adv.熟睡地
example: 单词 asleep 的例句||||The baby seems to be asleep. 那婴孩好像是睡着了。||||My right foot is asleep. 我的右脚麻木了。

name: along
example: 单词 along 的例句||||Would you like to come along? 你想一起去吗？||||They walked slowly along the road. 他们沿着公路慢慢走。

name: awake
example: 单词 awake 的例句||||The baby awake is looking here and there. 醒着的婴儿东张西望。||||Please awake me at six. 请6点钟唤醒我。

name: rise
interpret: vi. 上升；增强；起立；高耸 vt. 使…飞起；使…浮上水面
example: 单词 rise 的例句||||The sun rises. 太阳升起来。||||I always rise with the bell. 我总是听到铃声就起床。

name: step
example: 单词 step 的例句||||She walked on a few steps. 她继续走了几步。||||He was sitting on the bottom step. 他坐在最下面的一级台阶上。

name: save
interpret: n.救援，救球，节约；v.解救，保存，节省；prep.除...之外
example: 单词 save 的例句||||Why didn't you save me? 你为什么不救我？||||We have to save old newspapers. 我们得保存旧报纸。

name: roll
interpret: vi.卷；摇晃；vt.使滚动；使摇摆；n.卷；名册
example: 单词 roll 的例句||||We will need to roll up the paper. 我们得把这纸卷起来。||||I'll call the roll before class. 课前我要点名。

name: score
interpret: n.(比赛中)得分，分数；(测验中)成绩
example: 单词 score 的例句||||The score is four to three. 比分是四比三。||||Her score on the test was 95. 她的考试成绩是95分。

name: degree
example: 单词 degree 的例句||||I got my degree last year. 我去年获得学位了。||||Do you know the degree of the round angle? 你知道周角的度数吗？

name: temperature
example: 单词 temperature 的例句||||The temperature is very low. 温度非常低。||||The temperature is going up. 气温正逐渐上升。

name: astronaut
example: 单词 astronaut 的例句||||My son's dream is to be an astronaut. 我儿子的理想是当宇航员。||||Then they saw a photo of an astronaut. 接着，他们看到一张宇航员的照片。

name: across
interpret: adv.横过，使...被理解(或接受)；prep.穿过，横过
example: 单词 across 的例句||||He walked across the road carefully. 他小心地过马路。||||You can go across the bridge. 你可以越过这座桥。

name: builder
example: 单词 builder 的例句||||Her father was a builder in Shanghai. 她父亲是上海的一位建筑师。||||Mouse saves builder! 老鼠救了建筑工人！

name: metre
interpret: n.米，公尺，计量器；n.（诗的）韵律，格律；（=meter）(美)
example: 单词 metre 的例句||||This cloth is sold by the metre. 这种布按米出售。||||The river is half a metre deep. 这条河有半米深。

name: might
interpret: aux./v.(may的过去式)可能；可以，允许
example: 单词 might 的例句||||It looks as if it might snow. 看起来好像要下雪了。||||Might I ask a question? 我能问个问题吗？

name: mall
example: 单词 mall 的例句||||I am going to the mall the day after tomorrow. 我后天去大型购物中心。||||Are you going to go to the mall? 你要去大型购物中心吗？

name: market
example: 单词 market 的例句||||The next market is on the 15th. 下一次集市是15号。||||There is no market for these goods. 这些货物，没有销路。

name: poster
interpret: n.海报，招贴；脚夫；v.贴海报于
example: 单词 poster 的例句||||Please put up the poster on the wall. 请把海报贴在墙上。||||Let's look at this poster. 让我们看这副广告画。

name: others
example: 单词 others 的例句||||Learning from others is important. 向别人学习很重要。||||She is always ready to help others. 她总是乐于助人。

name: push
interpret: vt.推；使突出，使伸出，使延伸；大力推进，推行；通过，促使；vi.推；推进；伸展
example: 单词 push 的例句||||Don't push me! 别推我！||||If you always push him too hard, he may make mistakes. 要是你总逼他太紧，他可能会出错。

name: pollution
example: 单词 pollution 的例句||||Pollution is a big problem. 污染是个大问题。||||The new law will reduce pollution of the rivers. 这条新法律将会减轻河流污染。

name: plastic
example: 单词 plastic 的例句||||This ruler is made of plastic. 尺子是塑料做的。||||Where is the plastic cup? 塑料杯放哪儿了？

name: part
interpret: n.部份，零件；角色，部位；vt.分开，分离，分配；vi.分离，离开；adv.部份地；adj.分离的
example: 单词 part 的例句||||This is the broken part. 这就是损坏的部件。||||Which part do you play? 你演哪一个角色？

name: promise
interpret: n.诺言，约定，希望；v.允诺，约定，预示
example: 单词 promise 的例句||||I didn't make any promises. 我没有作出任何承诺。||||His promise is a big lie. 他的许诺是大谎言。

name: project
interpret: n.（学校的)课题，作业；项目，计划；方案；工程
example: 单词 project 的例句||||The project will start next year. 这项工程明年上马。||||I'm doing a project on Chinese history. 我正在做一个有关中国历史的研究课题。

name: skin
example: 单词 skin 的例句||||You need a skin test. 你需要做个皮肤测试。||||Your skin is very dry. 你的肌肤非常干燥。

name: solve
interpret: vt. 解决；解答；溶解 vi. 作解答
example: 单词 solve 的例句||||I can solve the problem. 我能解决这个问题。||||This problem is too hard for me to solve. 这个问题太难，我解决不了。

name: someone
example: 单词 someone 的例句||||I can hear someone knocking. 我听到有人敲门。||||Someone wants to see her. 有人找她。

name: somewhere
example: 单词 somewhere 的例句||||He's from somewhere in the middle east. 他从中东某个地方来。||||Somewhere in the United States. 在美国的某个地方。

name: wide
interpret: adj.广泛的，宽阔的；adv.广大地，全部地
example: 单词 wide 的例句||||It is fifty meters wide. 它有五十米宽。||||This box is too wide. 这个盒子太宽了。

name: wild
interpret: adj.放荡的；未开发的，野的，野生的，原始的；n.荒野
example: 单词 wild 的例句||||We should protect the wild animal. 我们应该保护野生动物。||||After the old gardener died, the garden grew wild. 老园丁死后，花园就慢慢荒芜了。

name: wonder
interpret: n. 惊奇；奇迹；惊愕 vi. 怀疑；想知道；惊讶 vt. 怀疑；惊奇；对…感到惊讶 adj. 奇妙的；非凡的
example: 单词 wonder 的例句||||I wonder why he is late. 我想知道他为什么迟到。||||No wonder it's a wonder. 怪不得这是一个奇迹。

name: would
interpret: aux.will的过去式；愿，要；常常；大概；将要，会
example: 单词 would 的例句||||Why would you say that? 为什么你会这么说？||||Would you please help me? 你能帮帮我吗？

name: share
interpret: vt./vi.分享，共有，分配；n.共享；份额
example: 单词 share 的例句||||I will share in the cost with you. 我愿意和你一起负担费用。||||Children should learn to share. 小孩应该学会与人分享东西。

name: ability
example: 单词 ability 的例句||||Ability is a poor man's wealth. 才能是穷人的财富。||||His ability is very strong/good. 他的能力很强。

name: ugly
example: 单词 ugly 的例句||||There is an ugly duck. 有一只丑小鸭。||||It has a very ugly face. 它有一张非常难看的脸。

name: unit
interpret: n.单位，单元，部件，元件，装置
example: 单词 unit 的例句||||This unit is very hard. 这个单元很难。||||This textbook has twenty units. 这本课本有二十单元。

name: wave
interpret: n.波，波浪，波动；v.波动，挥动，起伏
example: 单词 wave 的例句||||The flag waved in the wind. 旗帜在风中飘扬。||||The waves stopped. 波浪停止了。

name: melon
example: 单词 melon 的例句||||Which do you like better, orange or melon? 桔子和甜瓜，你更喜欢哪一样？||||It's the best melon in China. 这是中国最好的瓜。

name: leaf
interpret: n.叶，树叶，花瓣；v.生叶，翻...的页
example: 单词 leaf 的例句||||The trees are just beginning to leaf. 树刚刚开始长叶子。||||He take a leaf out of the book. 他从书上撕下一页。

name: mooncake
example: 单词 mooncake 的例句||||Let's have a mooncake. 让我们吃块月饼。||||I like to eat mooncakes. 我喜欢吃月饼。

name: No.
example: 单词 No. 的例句||||You are NO. 1. 你是一号。（你是最棒的。）||||What is your QQ number? 你的QQ号码是多少？

name: merry
interpret: adj.高兴的，愉快的，欢乐的，兴高采烈的
example: 单词 merry 的例句||||I wish you a Merry Christmas. 祝你圣诞快乐。|||| She is in a merry mood. 她心情愉快。

name: postcode
example: 单词 postcode 的例句||||Please add the postcode. 请把邮编加上。||||If you write the postcode, it will be helpful. 如果你写上邮编，它会是有帮助的。

name: yard
example: 单词 yard 的例句||||There is an apple in the yard. 院子里有一个苹果。||||The children are playing in the yard. 孩子们正在院子里玩耍。

name: dictionary
example: 单词 dictionary 的例句||||I have a new dictionary. 我有一本新字典。 ||||This is a good dictionary. 这是一本非常好的词典。

name: running
interpret: n.赛跑，流出，运转；adj.流动的，跑着的，连续的
example: 单词 running 的例句||||I like running. 我喜欢跑步。||||The water is running out. 水流出来了。

name: fold
interpret: n.折层，羊栏，折痕；v.折叠，包，交叉
example: 单词 fold 的例句||||I folded the letter and put it in my pocket. 我折好信，放进口袋里。||||I'd like a fold at the back of my jacket. 我希望我的短上衣的后背有个折。

name: fireman
example: 单词 fireman 的例句||||My Dad is a fireman. 我的爸爸是个消防员。||||Would you like to be a fireman? 你愿意是一名消防队员吗？

name: fisherman
example: 单词 fisherman 的例句||||His father is a fisherman. 他的父亲是渔民. |||| There was once a poor old fisherman. 从前有位穷苦的老渔夫。

name: toothbrush
example: 单词 toothbrush 的例句||||Can I borrow your toothbrush? 我可以借你的牙刷吗？|||| I need to buy a toothbrush. 我需要买牙刷。

name: toothpaste
example: 单词 toothpaste 的例句||||Would you pass me my toothpaste? 把牙膏递给我好吗？||||I need to buy a tube of toothpaste. 我需要买牙膏。

name: x-ray
interpret: n.X射线（X光机，X光照片）；vt.用X射线检查
example: 单词 x-ray 的例句||||She went to the hospital for an X-ray yesterday. 她昨天去医院作了X光检查。||||I'm sure that you need an X-ray, Andy. 安迪，我看你需要做一次X光透视。

name: insect
example: 单词 insect 的例句||||You put the insect in a box. 你把这个虫子放进盒子里。||||He put the insect on his hand. 他把虫子放在手上。

name: root
interpret: n.根，根本，根源，基础，底部；vt.使扎根，使固定，根除，肃清，搜出
example: 单词 root 的例句||||Money is the root of all evil. 金钱是万恶之源。|||| This is the root cause of poverty. 这是贫穷的根本原因。

name: photograph
example: 单词 photograph 的例句||||This photograph is too small. 这张照片太小了。|||| He put the photograph on the desk. 他把照片放在书桌上。

name: cage
interpret: n.笼子；v.关入笼中；vt.把...关入笼内
example: 单词 cage 的例句||||He opened the cage and set the bird free. 他打开鸟笼，放了鸟儿。||||There is a beautiful bird in the cage. 鸟笼里有一只美丽的鸟。

name: grey
example: 单词 grey 的例句||||She was dressed in grey. 她穿着灰色服装。||||This colour is grey. 这种颜色是灰色。

name: button
example: 单词 button 的例句||||Press the button, then the machine will work. 按下电钮，机器就能转动了。||||Push the button on top of the camera. 按一下相机上面的按钮。

name: skateboard
interpret: n.溜冰板(一种装有滑轮的椭圆形滑板)
example: 单词 skateboard 的例句||||I want a skateboard. 我想要一个滑板。||||Can I have a look at your new skateboard? 我可以看看你的滑板吗？

name: stick
interpret: n.枝，杆，手杖；vt.插于，刺入，竖起；vi.钉住，粘贴，坚持
example: 单词 stick 的例句||||A walking stick is a must for me now. 如今我行走离不开手杖了。||||To stick a stamp on an envelope. 在信封上贴邮票。

name: parrot
interpret: n.鹦鹉；鹦鹉学舌般地复述
example: 单词 parrot 的例句||||The boy had a parrot on his right shoulder. 男孩右肩上有一只鹦鹉。||||It is a parrot. My brother and I love it very much. 它是只鹦鹉。我哥哥和我都非常喜欢它。

name: television
example: 单词 television 的例句||||Do you often watch television? 你经常看电视吗？||||Please turn off the television. 请把电视关上。

name: shine
interpret: vi.发光；照耀，闪耀 vt. 照射，擦亮；把…的光投向
example: 单词 shine 的例句||||The stars shine in the sky. 星星在天空闪烁. ||||The sun is shinning brightly. 今天阳光格外明媚。

name: brave
interpret: adj.勇敢的；v.勇敢地面对(危险等)；抵抗
example: 单词 brave 的例句||||He is a brave soldier. 他是一位勇敢的战士。||||I think you are very brave. 我认为你非常勇敢。

name: uniform
interpret: n.制服；校服；adj. 统一的；一致的；相同的；均衡的
example: 单词 uniform 的例句||||Every one wears a blue uniform. 人人都穿着蓝制服。||||Tom looks handsome in uniform. 汤姆穿上制服很英俊。

name: rubbish
interpret: n.垃圾，废物；废话，胡说八道
example: 单词 rubbish 的例句||||This book is all rubbish. 这本书全是胡言乱语。||||The room is full of rubbish. 房间里堆满了垃圾。

name: sunglasses
example: 单词 sunglasses 的例句||||You had better wear sunglasses in summer. 夏天你最好带太阳镜。||||He looks very cool in sunglasses. 他戴上太阳镜真酷。

name: drum
interpret: n.鼓； 鼓状物； 鼓声；vt.击鼓； 连打； 反复讲；vi.击鼓；连打； 拍翅
example: 单词 drum 的例句||||They play the drum on Monday. 他们在星期一玩鼓。||||Don't drum the table with your fingers. 不要用手指敲打桌子。

name: blind
interpret: adj.盲目的，瞎的；n.百叶窗；v.使失明
example: 单词 blind 的例句||||He is blind in the left eye. 他的左眼是瞎的。||||The blind live in the dark. 盲人在黑暗中生活。

name: shake
example: 单词 shake 的例句||||Let's shake hands and be friends. 让我们握手做朋友。||||Shake, shake, shake your shoulders, shake them up and down. 耸耸肩，从上到下耸耸肩。

name: soldier
example: 单词 soldier 的例句||||He is a good soldier. 他是个好战士。||||He is a brave soldier. 他是一个勇敢的士兵。

name: dish
interpret: n.盘子；一样菜，一道菜；vt.上菜
example: 单词 dish 的例句||||Did you break the whole dish? 盘子被你打碎了？||||This dish is very delicious. 这道菜味道鲜美。

name: motorbike
example: 单词 motorbike 的例句||||I want to go by motorbike. 我想骑摩托车去。||||Excuse me, is this your motorbike? 请问，你是你的摩托车吗？

name: actor
interpret: n.演员（尤指男演员）；行动者；参与者
example: 单词 actor 的例句||||The actor plays very well. 这男演员演得很好。|||| The second actor plays well. 第二个男演员演得好。

name: certainly
interpret: adv.当然，无疑；一定，肯定，必定
example: 单词 certainly 的例句||||He is certainly a hero! 他无疑是个英雄！||||Some people certainly think so. 有些人肯定会这么认为。

name: visitor
example: 单词 visitor 的例句||||He has a visitor right now. 他现在正好有客人。||||He is nothing but a visitor. 他只是一个参观者。

name: could
interpret: v.能，可能(can的过去式)；aux.v.(can的过去式)能；可以
example: 单词 could 的例句||||Could I open the window? 我可以打开窗子吗？||||I could wait ten minutes. 我可以等十分钟。

name: bit
interpret: n.一点儿，少量；钻头；马嚼子；辅币，位，比特(二进位制信息单位)；v.控制
example: 单词 bit 的例句||||I'm just going out for a bit. 我正打算出去一会儿。||||When did you change the bit? 什么时候换的钻头？

name: coach
interpret: n.大巴，教练；(火车)客车车厢，四轮马车，经济舱；vt.训练，指导；vi.训练，指导
example: 单词 coach 的例句||||The coach is full of elderly ladies. 客车上坐满了老太太。||||The coach plays better than players. 教练比运动员打得好。

name: centre
example: 单词 centre 的例句||||You should go to the shopping centre. 你应该去购物中心。||||Have you got a map of the city centre? 你有市中心的地图吗？

name: mind
interpret: n.思想，主意，心意；v.介意，照顾，留心
example: 单词 mind 的例句||||I've changed my mind. 我一经转变主意。||||You really don't mind? 你真的不介意？

name: palace
example: 单词 palace 的例句||||It is really a magic palace! 那真是一个有魔力的宫殿！||||What a palace this was! 这里可真像皇宫啊！

name: somebody
example: 单词 somebody 的例句||||Somebody is using the computer. 有人在用电脑。||||He seems to be somebody. 他似乎是个重要人物。

name: strange
example: 单词 strange 的例句||||She's a strange policewoman. 她是个作风奇特的女警。||||I heard a strange sound. 我听到一种奇怪的声音。

name: turning
example: 单词 turning 的例句||||Take the first turning on the left. 在左边第一个转弯处拐弯。||||The leaves of the tree were turning yellow and red. 树叶变成黄色和红色。

name: fair
interpret: adj.公平的，晴朗的，美丽的；(皮肤，毛发等)浅色的；白皙的；n.展览会，市集
example: 单词 fair 的例句||||I think it is not fair. 我认为那不公平。||||And never I'd seen a girl as fair. 我从没见比她更美丽的女孩。

name: pleasure
interpret: n.愉快，快乐，高兴，乐事，乐趣，意志，愿望
example: 单词 pleasure 的例句||||It's a pleasure talking to you. 同您谈话很愉快。|||| He finds pleasure in reading. 他从阅读中得到乐趣。

name: capital
interpret: n.资本，资金，资方；首都，首府，中心；大写字母；adj.主要的；资本的；大写的
example: 单词 capital 的例句||||Beijing is the capital of China. 北京是中国的首都。||||We don't have enough capital. 我们没有足够的资金。

name: clearly
example: 单词 clearly 的例句||||I remember it quite clearly. 这事我记得很清楚。|||| We clearly need to think again. 我们显然需要重新考虑。

name: cough
example: 单词 cough 的例句||||The smoke made him cough. 烟熏得他咳嗽起来。|||| Love and a cough cannot be hidden. 恋爱与咳嗽无法掩藏。

name: free
interpret: adj.自由的，免费的；v.使自由；adv.随意地
example: 单词 free 的例句||||I don't have much free time. 我没有多少空闲时间。||||There really is no free lunch. 天下果然没有免费的午餐。

name: lend
interpret: vt. 贷；增添，提供；把……借给 vi. 贷款
example: 单词 lend 的例句||||Would you lend me some money? 能借我一些钱吗？|||| They had no reading books to lend. 他们没有阅读用书可以出借。

name: national
example: 单词 national 的例句||||In our country New Year's Day is a national holiday. 在我国，元旦是全国性的假日。||||Tomorrow is a national holiday. 明天是全国性节日。

name: medicine
interpret: n.药，医学，内科，内服药；vt.给…用药
example: 单词 medicine 的例句||||I studied medicine in college. 我在大学学医学。|||| Time is the best medicine. 时间是最好的良药。

name: pardon
interpret: n.请原谅；对不起；请再说一遍
example: 单词 pardon 的例句||||Please pardon me for waking you. 请原谅我吵醒了你。||||Pardon me for saying so. 请原谅我这样说。

name: terrible
example: 单词 terrible 的例句||||I think you've made a terrible mistake. 我认为你犯了一个严重的错误。||||This is a terrible idea. 这是一个可怕的想法。

name: duty
example: 单词 duty 的例句||||Our duty is helping them. 我们的责任就是帮助他们。||||It is a simple duty. 它是一个简单的职责。

name: opera
example: 单词 opera 的例句||||What do you think of soap opera? 你觉得肥皂剧怎么样？||||I quite like some opera music. 我颇喜欢某些歌剧乐曲。

name: anybody
example: 单词 anybody 的例句||||They do not see anybody. 他们没看见任何人。|||| You couldn't tell anybody. 你不能告诉任何人。

name: clear
interpret: adj. 清楚的；清澈的；晴朗的；无罪的 vt. 通过；清除；使干净；跳过 vi. 放晴；变清澈
example: 单词 clear 的例句||||Clear the snow from the road. 清除马路上的积雪。||||Is that clear to everyone? 大家都明白了么？

name: had
interpret: vbl.have的过去式和过去分词；conj.有
example: 单词 had 的例句||||I just had a good idea! 我有个好主意！||||The boy has a small branch of tree in his hand. 这个男孩手上拿一条小树枝。

name: fix
interpret: vt. 使固定；修理；安装；准备 vi. 固定；注视
example: 单词 fix 的例句||||I'll try to fix it soon. 我将尽快修理它。||||I'm going to stay behind and fix dinner. 我会留下来安排晚餐。

name: repair
interpret: n.修理，补救；v.修理，补救，补偿
example: 单词 repair 的例句||||We can repair this car. 我们可以修理这辆车。|||| The road is still under repair. 这条路还在修复中。

name: serious
interpret: adj.认真的，严肃的，重大的，严重的
example: 单词 serious 的例句||||You know I am serious. 你知道我是认真的。||||He is a serious boy. 他是个严肃的孩子。

name: pork
example: 单词 pork 的例句||||I like pork and beef. 我喜欢猪肉和牛肉。||||I want to buy some pork. 我想买些猪肉。

name: tofu
example: 单词 tofu 的例句||||I ate tofu for lunch today. 我今天午餐吃豆腐. ||||He can make many dishes with tofu. 他会用豆腐做很多菜。

name: strict
interpret: adj.严格的；严厉的，绝对的，详尽的；精确的
example: 单词 strict 的例句||||We must be strict in our work. 我们必须严于职守。||||She is a strict teacher. 她是个严格的教师。

name: fresh
interpret: adj.新鲜的；无经验的；淡(水)的；精神饱满的；纯洁无瑕的；生动的；adv.最近地；n.涌流
example: 单词 fresh 的例句||||The air is quite fresh there. 那儿的空气很清新。||||Have you got fresh news? 你有最新的消息吗？

name: own
interpret: vt. 拥有；承认 vi. 承认 adj. 自己的；特有的
example: 单词 own 的例句||||I need my own space. 我需要自己的空间。|||| Everything I own is yours. 我所有的一切都是你的。

name: bridge
example: 单词 bridge 的例句||||There are two bookshops near the bridge. 大桥附近有两家书店。||||I am strange at bridge. 我对桥牌是外行。

name: seat
interpret: n.座，座位，位子，席位；所在地；vt.使坐下，使就座，设座于
example: 单词 seat 的例句||||Go back to your seat. 回到你的坐位去。||||Which seat do you prefer? 你更喜欢哪个位置？

name: painting
interpret: n.绘画；油画；上色，着色；颜料，油漆
example: 单词 painting 的例句||||I know something about painting. 我懂一点绘画。||||I painted a painting. 我画了一幅油画。

name: beef
example: 单词 beef 的例句||||Please give me some beef. 请给我一些牛肉。||||Mum doesn't like beef. 妈妈不喜欢吃牛肉。

name: dead
interpret: adj.死的；无生命的；死气沉沉的；adv.完全地
example: 单词 dead 的例句||||Mary threw away the dead flowers. 玛丽把枯萎的花扔掉了。||||He was dead asleep. 他完全睡着了。

name: cupboard
interpret: n.碗柜；橱柜（放食物或衣物等）
example: 单词 cupboard 的例句||||There are not any spoons in the cupboard. 橱柜中没有任何汤匙。||||The cupboard door swung open. 碗橱的门晃开了。

name: clerk
interpret: n.(银行、办公室、商店等)办事员
example: 单词 clerk 的例句||||He is a bank clerk. 他是一位银行职员。||||Are you a clerk here? 你是这儿的店员吗？

name: club
interpret: n社团；俱乐部，夜总会，社；棍棒，（高尔夫球等的）球棒， （扑克牌）梅花；vt.棍打，把...当棍棒用；协作，联合
example: 单词 club 的例句||||He joined the football club. 他加入了足球俱乐部。||||He is managing a club for teenagers. 他在经营一家青少年俱乐部。

name: environment
interpret: n.环境，生态环境，自然环境
example: 单词 environment 的例句||||It is much cheaper and kinder to the environment. 这样既便宜，又有益于保护环境。||||We should protect the environment. 我们应该保护环境。

name: entrance
example: 单词 entrance 的例句||||He stood at the entrance of the hospital. 他站在医院入口处。||||May you pass the entrance examination. 祝你能通过入学考试。

name: flight
interpret: n.飞行，飞机的航程，航班；逃跑
example: 单词 flight 的例句||||I want to change my flight. 我想变更飞行班次。||||I lost my flight ticket. 我的飞机票丢了。

name: forward
interpret: adj.向前的，早的，迅速的，前锋；v.转交，促进，运送；adv.向前地
example: 单词 forward 的例句||||Please move your car forward. 请你把汽车住前开。||||Please forward my mail to me. 请把我的邮件转寄给我。

name: fax
example: 单词 fax 的例句||||This fax is really slow. 这个传真机真慢。||||This fax machine is broken. 这部传真机坏了。

name: forest
example: 单词 forest 的例句||||Lion is the king of the forest. 狮子是丛林之王。||||I like reading in the forest. 我喜欢在树林里读书。

name: grandson
example: 单词 grandson 的例句||||His grandson wants to become a doctor. 他的孙子想成为一名医生。||||Your grandson is very lucky. 你外孙很幸运。

name: friendly
example: 单词 friendly 的例句||||He's not friendly to others. 他对别人不友好。||||People here are very friendly. 这儿的人很友好。

name: however
example: 单词 however 的例句||||It's raining hard. However, I still want to go there. 虽然下着大雨，我还是想去那儿。||||However, this does not always happen. 然而，这种情况并不总是发生。

name: interview
interpret: n.面谈，访问，接见；v.接见，会谈
example: 单词 interview 的例句||||I have an interview this afternoon. 我今天下午有面试。||||We'll do the interview tomorrow. 我们明天再做访问吧。

name: information
interpret: n.起诉；信息，消息；知识；报告，通知，情报
example: 单词 information 的例句||||I hope the information I gave you was helpful. 我希望我给你的消息对你有所帮助。||||We must get further information. 我们必须获得更多的消息。

name: helpful
example: 单词 helpful 的例句||||Computers are very useful and helpful. 电脑非常有用，也有益。||||I try to be helpful. 我尽量使自己有助于人。

name: invite
example: 单词 invite 的例句||||We'd better not invite him. 我们最好不要邀请他。||||They invite us to have dinner. 我们邀请他们去电影院。

name: kilometre
example: 单词 kilometre 的例句||||My home is half a kilometre away from here. 我家离这儿有半公里。||||It is one kilometre long. 它有一公里长。

name: kill
interpret: vt.杀死，弄死；扼杀，毁掉；使终止；消磨；vi.杀死；被弄死杀，杀伤；猎获物
example: 单词 kill 的例句||||Many ants kill the horse. 蚁多可杀马。||||She wants to kill me. 她想杀了我。

name: land
interpret: n.陆地，国土，土地；v.登陆，登岸，卸货
example: 单词 land 的例句||||Farmers work on the land. 农民在土地上干活。||||How long is it before we land? 我们还有多长时间降落？

name: garage
interpret: n.汽车库，汽车间，汽车修理厂
example: 单词 garage 的例句||||There is a garage in the southeast corner of his house. 他房子的东南角有一个车库。||||The garage did such a bad repair. 修车厂的活干得如此之差。

name: grandparents
example: 单词 grandparents 的例句||||I often visit my grandparents. 我常常去看望祖父母。||||My grandparents live in Shanghai. 我的祖父母住在上海。

name: manager
example: 单词 manager 的例句||||The manager believes in him. 经理信任他。||||In our company the manager has the last word. 在我们公司经理有最后决定权。

name: concert
interpret: n.音乐会；一致，和谐；vt.制定计划，通过协商达成一致；vi.合作
example: 单词 concert 的例句||||She forgot about the concert. 她把音乐会给忘了。|||| Who will direct at the concert? 音乐会谁来指挥？

name: downstairs
example: 单词 downstairs 的例句||||He went downstairs to breakfast. 他下楼去吃早饭了。||||I'll come downstairs in a minute. 我马上下楼。

name: finally
example: 单词 finally 的例句||||We can finally take a rest. 总算是可以休息了。|||| Finally, they won the game. 结果他们打赢了。

name: practice
interpret: n.练习，实行，习惯；v.练习，实习，开业
example: 单词 practice 的例句||||I need to practice more. 我要多加练习。|||| Knowledge comes from practice. 知识来自于实践。

name: store
interpret: n.商店，贮藏，仓库；v.储存，贮藏，供给
example: 单词 store 的例句||||The shoe store is across from the bank. 鞋店在银行对面。||||Some food won't store. 有些食物不能贮存。

name: gallery
example: 单词 gallery 的例句||||Here is the entrance of the gallery. 这里是画廊的入口处。||||Her work is on display at the gallery. 她的作品正在美术馆展出。

name: vacation
example: 单词 vacation 的例句||||I'll take a vacation this weekend. 这个周末我要休假。||||The vacation passed away quickly. 假期过得很快。

name: bookstore
example: 单词 bookstore 的例句||||The bookstore is just around the corner. 书店就在那边转弯的地方。||||The book can be bought in any bookstore. 这本书哪家书店都能买到。

name: university
example: 单词 university 的例句||||She teaches English at the University of Wales. 她在威尔士大学教英语。||||I'm going to enter a university. 我要上大学。

name: travel
interpret: n.旅行，游历，进行；vi.旅行，行进，移动，被传播；vt.旅行，通行于，使移动
example: 单词 travel 的例句||||We can now travel by air. 现在我们可以坐飞机旅行。||||Autumn is the best season for travel. 秋天是旅行的最好季节。

name: careless
interpret: adj.疏忽的，粗心的，不注意的，马马虎虎的
example: 单词 careless 的例句||||A careless driver is a danger to the public. 粗心的驾驶员对于公众是一种危险。||||You are always so careless. 你做事总这么毛糙。

name: lazy
example: 单词 lazy 的例句||||Lazy people seldom succeed. 懒惰的人很少会成功。||||Don't be so lazy. 不要这样懒惰。

name: nature
interpret: n.自然，自然界，自然状态；本性，天性，性质；质；性格；性；本质
example: 单词 nature 的例句||||Man has been trying to control nature. 人类一直在努力控制自然。||||It's man's nature. 这是人的本性。

name: report
interpret: n.报告，汇报；传说，传阅；v.报告，报到
example: 单词 report 的例句||||We're going to listen to a report this afternoon. 今天下午我们要去听报告。||||I shall report to you. 我将向你汇报。

name: action
example: 单词 action 的例句||||The time has come for action. 行动的时候到了。|||| Is your machine still in action? 你的机器还在运转吗？

name: channel
interpret: n.(无线电、电视)波段；波道；频道
example: 单词 channel 的例句||||There will be a special on Channel 8 tonight. 今晚八频道电视有特别节目。||||The channel is 20 miles across. 海峡宽20英里。

name: fit
interpret: adj.适宜的，对的，准备好的；v.适合；安装；n.适宜；发作；一阵
example: 单词 fit 的例句||||I am sure you can fit me in somewhere. 我相信你能找个地方安排我。||||She is fit for the job. 她适合做这项工作。

name: famous
interpret: adj.著名的，驰名的，闻名遐迩的；极好的；擅长的
example: 单词 famous 的例句||||The hotel is famous for its suppers. 那个酒店以晚餐而著称。||||He is famous for his learning. 他以有学问而出名。

name: dark
example: 单词 dark 的例句||||The night is too dark for us to see. 夜间太暗，我们看不见。||||The sky was dark blue and clear when the moon came up. 月亮出来时，天空是深蓝色的，非常晴朗。

name: luck
interpret: n.运气，幸运，吉祥之物；v.侥幸成功
example: 单词 luck 的例句||||I'll try my luck. 我要碰碰运气。||||Good luck! We'll keep our fingers crossed for you. 祝你好运！我们将为你祈祷。

name: important
example: 单词 important 的例句||||It's important to find out what he is doing. 弄清他在干什么是重要的。||||This is a very important problem. 这个问题很重要。

name: boil
interpret: vi. 煮沸，沸腾；激动，激昂 vt. 煮沸，烧开；使…激动；使…蒸发
example: 单词 boil 的例句||||Boil the milk. 把牛奶煮沸。||||Boil some water for us, please! 请给我们烧点开水！

name: leather
example: 单词 leather 的例句||||He has a pair of leather shoes. 他有一双皮鞋。|||| He buys and sells leather goods. 他做皮革制品的买卖。

name: metal
interpret: n.金属，质料；adj.金属制的；v.以金属覆盖
example: 单词 metal 的例句||||He hands a metal disk to me. 他把一个金属圆盘给我。||||Coins are made of metal. 硬币是金属做的。

name: gave
interpret: vbl.（give的过去式）给予，产生，发表
example: 单词 gave 的例句||||He asked for money and I gave him some. 他要钱，我给了他一些。||||I gave you a map so you wouldn't get lost. 我给你一张地图，这样你就不会迷路了。

name: kiss
example: 单词 kiss 的例句||||Sweetie, let me kiss you. 亲爱的，让我来亲一下。||||My mother gave me a kiss on the forehead. 妈妈吻了我的前额。

name: made
example: 单词 made 的例句||||They were not made in china. 它们不是中国制造的。||||The monkey made a long arm for the peach. 猴子伸臂去摘桃子。

name: ran
example: 单词 ran 的例句||||He ran, and then slowed down to a walk. 他跑着，然后放慢速度步行。||||As soon as Marie opened the door, the dog ran in. 当玛丽一打开门，狗就跑了进来。

name: said
interpret: v.动词say的过去式、过去分词
example: 单词 said 的例句||||He said to me that he could not come. 他对我说他不能来。||||He said to his mother that he would do it by himself. 他对他的母亲说他将自己独立做那件事。

name: came
example: 单词 came 的例句||||I was surprised why he came here so early. 他为什么那么早到这里，我很惊奇。||||The doctor came in time to save his life. 医生及时来抢救他的生命。

name: ate
example: 单词 ate 的例句||||I ate a whole box of chocolates. 我吃了一整盒巧克力。||||It's a long time since she ate out last time. 她很长一段时间没在外面吃饭了。

name: broke
interpret: v.(动词break的过去式)折断；打破
example: 单词 broke 的例句||||He dropped his glass on the floor and broke it. 他把玻璃杯掉到地板上打碎了。||||After a long silence, she broke into a laugh. 她沉默了很久之后，忽然笑了起来。

name: India
example: 单词 India 的例句||||New Delhi is the capital of India. 新德里是印度的首都。||||In India, there are fifteen official languages. 印度有15种官方语言。

name: Indian
interpret: adj.印度(人)的；n.印度人；印第安人
example: 单词 Indian 的例句||||Is that Indian tea or Chinese tea? 那是印度茶还是中国茶？||||One day they met an old Indian who lived there. 一天他们碰到一位当地的老印第安人。

name: person
example: 单词 person 的例句||||I would never trust in that kind of person. 我绝不会相信那种人。||||She is a nice person. 她是个好人。

name: print
interpret: n. 印刷业；印花布；印刷字体；印章；印记 vt. 印刷；打印；刊载；用印刷体写；在…印花样 vi. 印刷；出版；用印刷体写
example: 单词 print 的例句||||This book has clear print. 这本书印刷字体很清晰。||||Will you print the missing names for me? 你能替我把那些漏掉的名字添上吗？

name: printing
interpret: n.印刷，印刷术；动词print的现在分词
example: 单词 printing 的例句||||Mistakes in the printing should be pointed out at once. 印刷上的错误应立即予以指出。||||Printing was first invented by Chinese. 印刷术最早是由中国人发明的。

name: lock
interpret: vt. 锁；锁上；使固定；隐藏；vi. 卡住，不动；n. 锁；水闸；一撮
example: 单词 lock 的例句||||This box doesn't lock. 这只箱子锁不上。||||Will you lock up the house, please? 请将房门锁起来，好吗？

name: hmm
example: 单词 hmm 的例句||||Hmm...... that's very strange. 嗯……这很奇怪。||||Hmm. What day is it? 嗯，今天是星期几？

name: A.M.
example: 单词 A.M. 的例句||||They begin work at 8 am. 他们上午8点开始工作。||||Shall we meet saturday am.? 我们要再星期六上午相见吗？

name: P.M.
example: 单词 P.M. 的例句||||I finish working at five thirty p.m. 我下午五点半结束工作。||||We return to school at 5 p.m. 们在下午五点返回学校。

name: backpack
example: 单词 backpack 的例句||||Is this your new backpack? 这是你的新背包吗？|||| This backpack belongs to me. 这背包是我的。

name: pants
example: 单词 pants 的例句||||This is a pair of pants. 这是一条裤子。||||What color are his pants? 他的裤子是什么颜色？

name: engineer
example: 单词 engineer 的例句||||She looks like an engineer. 她看上去像个工程师。||||My father is an engineer. 我的父亲是工程师。

name: Britain
interpret: n.英国；不列颠(英格兰、威尔士和苏格兰)
example: 单词 Britain 的例句||||London is the capital of Britain. 伦敦是英国的首都。||||I was not in Britain at the time. 当时我不在英国。

name: subway
interpret: n.地下人行道；（美）地铁；vi.乘坐地下铁路
example: 单词 subway 的例句||||I go to the library by subway. 我坐地铁去图书馆。||||Where is the nearest subway station? 最近的地铁站在哪里？

name: snowy
interpret: adj.多雪的，雪的，被雪所覆盖着的，下雪的
example: 单词 snowy 的例句||||It's cold and snowy in December. 十二月是寒冷多雪的。||||On a snowy winter day. 在一个下雪的冬日。

name: kick
interpret: n.踢；反冲；vi.踢，反抗；充满活力的运动；vt.踢；对自己生气
example: 单词 kick 的例句||||Don't kick the ball into the road. 不要把球踢到马路上。||||If the new actor is no good, kick him out. 如果那个新来的演员不怎么样就让他走.

name: plus
interpret: n.加号，正号；adj.超过的，正的；prep.加上
example: 单词 plus 的例句||||Four plus five is nine. 四加五等于九。||||All the children here are 12 plus. 这里所有的孩子都大于十二岁。

name: attention
example: 单词 attention 的例句||||I hope you will give attention to this problem. 希望你对此给予关注。||||Pay attention to your spelling. 请注意拼写。

name: weekday
interpret: n.工作日；平日(星期日、星期六除外)
example: 单词 weekday 的例句||||Don't you go to the office on weekday? 难道你工作日不上班吗？||||It was a weekday. 这是一个工作日。

name: band
example: 单词 band 的例句||||Jack drums for the school band. 杰克为学校乐队打鼓。||||The band is playing. 乐队正在演奏。

name: delicious
example: 单词 delicious 的例句||||The apples are big and delicious. 苹果又大又好吃。||||The beer tastes very delicious. 这啤酒尝起来很可口。

name: myself
example: 单词 myself 的例句||||Should I do it myself? 我应该自己做吗？||||I woke up to find myself in the hospital. 我醒来发现自己在医院里。

name: gym
example: 单词 gym 的例句||||We play basketball in the gym. 我们在体育馆里打篮球。||||We did an hour of gym. 我们做了一小时的体操。

name: activity
example: 单词 activity 的例句||||Their activity came to a full stop. 他们的活动完全停止了。||||Do you like the activity? 你喜欢这个活动吗？

name: boring
example: 单词 boring 的例句||||It is a boring film. 这是一部枯燥乏味的电影。|||| This story is kind of boring. 这个故事有点无聊。

name: Egypt
example: 单词 Egypt 的例句||||Egypt is an African country. 埃及是一个非洲国家。||||He spent most of his childhood in Egypt. 他童年大部分时间在埃及度过。

name: Europe
example: 单词 Europe 的例句||||Have you traveled in Europe? 你到欧洲旅行过吗？|||| We're planning to visit Europe this summer. 我们正打算今年夏天去欧洲旅行。

name: excited
example: 单词 excited 的例句||||He was so excited that he could not speak. 他太兴奋，连话都说不出来了。||||The excited children forgot to take the presents to the party. 孩子们兴奋得忘了把礼物带到聚会上了。

name: invent
example: 单词 invent 的例句||||This kind of machine was invented in the 1970's. 这种机器是七十年代发明的。||||Can't you invent a better excuse than that? 你就不能编造一个高明些的藉口吗？

name: inventor
example: 单词 inventor 的例句||||Thomas Edison was a great inventor. 爱迪生是一位伟大的发明家。||||The machine is named after its inventor. 这台机器是以其发明者的名字命名的。

name: kilometer
example: 单词 kilometer 的例句||||How much does it cost for the first kilometer? 启程的第一公里是多少钱？||||The road is 5 kilometers long. 这条马路5公里长。

name: meter
interpret: n.公尺；韵律；计量器；v.以计量器计量
example: 单词 meter 的例句||||It is fifty meters wide. 它有五十米宽。|||| Something must be wrong with the meter. 计程表一定有毛病。

name: nervous
interpret: adj.神经的；紧张不安的，神经过敏的
example: 单词 nervous 的例句||||He feels nervous when he faces so many people. 面对那么多人，他感到紧张。||||He was over nervous. 他太紧张了。

name: musician
interpret: n.音乐家，擅长音乐音乐的人；乐师，作曲家
example: 单词 musician 的例句||||Mozart was a great musician. 莫扎特是伟大的音乐家。||||He is a famous musician. 他是一位有名的音乐家。

name: Russia
example: 单词 Russia 的例句||||During his summer vacation he visited Russia. 暑假期间他去俄罗斯了。||||America and Russia are great powers. 美国和俄国是两大强国。

name: Russian
interpret: adj.俄国人的，俄语的；n.俄国人；俄语
example: 单词 Russian 的例句||||He both speaks and writes Russian. 他又能说，又能写俄语。||||I think the Russian's going to win. 我想那个俄国人会得第一。

name: scientist
example: 单词 scientist 的例句||||He is a black scientist. 他是一位黑人科学家。|||| She has become a famous scientist. 她成为著名科学家。

name: proud
example: 单词 proud 的例句||||He was proud of having such a good friend. 他为有这样的好朋友而自豪。||||We are proud of our great motherland. 我们为伟大的祖国而自豪。

name: province
example: 单词 province 的例句||||Yunnan province is the home of elephants. 云南省是大象的生息地。||||Jinan is the capital of Shandong Province. 济南是山东省省会。

name: silk
interpret: n.绸，绸锻类，丝，丝织品；adj.丝的，丝织的
example: 单词 silk 的例句||||The Chinese silk is known all over the world. 中国丝绸驰名天下。||||I like the feel of silk. 我喜欢触摸丝绸。

name: Spain
example: 单词 Spain 的例句||||Spain lies in the south of Europe. 西班牙位于欧洲的南部。||||I spent a week in Spain this summer. 今年夏季我在西班牙度过了一星期。

name: surprised
interpret: adj.感到惊讶的，感到惊奇的
example: 单词 surprised 的例句||||Are there anything to be surprised at? 那有什么可怪的？||||The news greatly surprised us. 这消息使我们非常惊异。

name: worried
example: 单词 worried 的例句||||He was worried about the safety of me. 他为我的安全担心。||||He worried his father to buy a new car. 他苦苦缠着父亲要买一辆新车。

name: writer
interpret: n.作家，记者，撰稿者，抄写员
example: 单词 writer 的例句||||Dickens was a famous English writer. 狄更斯是英国著名作家。||||He is a very popular writer but I don't like his style. 他是个很受欢迎的作家，但我不喜欢他的文风。

name: common
interpret: adj.共同的，平常的，普通的；n.平民，普通，公地，公园
example: 单词 common 的例句||||Man and ape have many things in common. 人和猿有许多共同之处。||||Britain and America share a common language. 英国和美国共用一种语言。

name: chemistry
example: 单词 chemistry 的例句||||He is reading a text in chemistry. 他在看化学教科书。||||Her major subject is chemistry. 她的主修科是化学。

name: graduate
interpret: vt. 授予…学位；分等级；标上刻度 vi. 毕业；渐变 n. 研究生；毕业生
example: 单词 graduate 的例句||||We shall graduate in the middle of next year. 到明年的年中，我们就该毕业了。||||He was a college graduate. 他是个大学毕业生。

name: Chicago
example: 单词 Chicago 的例句||||She has never been to a big city other than Chicago. 除芝加哥外她没有去过别的大城市。||||We must change at the next station for Chicago. 我们得在下一站换车去芝加哥。

name: suddenly
example: 单词 suddenly 的例句||||The weather changed suddenly. 天气陡变。||||He suddenly cried out at the top of his voice. 他声嘶力竭地大叫。

name: airplane
example: 单词 airplane 的例句||||OK. May I know the types of airplane? 请问是什么机型？||||How many times have you traveled by airplane? 你坐过几次飞机？

name: dentist
example: 单词 dentist 的例句||||Maybe you should see a dentist. 也许你该看看牙医。||||The dentist examined my teeth. 牙医检查了我的牙齿。

name: decorate
interpret: vt. 装饰；布置；授勋给 vi. 装饰；布置
example: 单词 decorate 的例句||||My mother likes to decorate rooms. 我妈妈非常喜欢装饰房间。||||John will decorate his house tomorrow. 约翰明天将装饰他的房子。

name: keyboard
example: 单词 keyboard 的例句||||I bought a keyboard in the supermarket yesterday. 昨天我在超市上买了个键盘。||||Now put your fingers on the keyboard. 现在把手指头放在键盘上。

name: tent
example: 单词 tent 的例句||||They put up a tent. 他们搭起了一个帐篷。||||It's not safe to keep food in your tent. 把食物放在你的帐篷里不安全。

name: anywhere
example: 单词 anywhere 的例句||||You can go anywhere you like. 你可以去任何你想去的地方。||||You will find the text anywhere in the Bible. 你可在《圣经》某处找到这段经文。

name: pocket
interpret: n.口袋，钱袋，钱，容器，孤立地区；vt.装…在口袋里，隐藏，抑制，私吞，搁置
example: 单词 pocket 的例句||||The letter has been in my pocket all the time. 这封信一直揣在我口袋里。||||I wish to change some pocket money. 我希望换些零钱。

name: direction
example: 单词 direction 的例句||||In which direction did he go? 他朝哪个方向去了？|||| He looked in that direction and saw an airplane. 他朝那个方向看，看见了一架飞机。

name: ground
interpret: n.土地，战场，场地；adj.土地的，地面上的；v.放在地上，使...搁浅，打基础
example: 单词 ground 的例句||||The baby is playing on the ground. 婴儿正在地上玩。||||He picked a pen from the ground. 他从地上捡起一支钢笔。

name: poem
interpret: n.诗；韵文；诗一样的作品；富有诗意的东西
example: 单词 poem 的例句||||Their lives are a poem. 他们的生活就是一首诗。|||| The boy learned the poem by heart. 这男孩背下了这首诗。

name: voice
example: 单词 voice 的例句||||Her voice was music to my ears. 她的声音听起来就像音乐。||||That song doesn't suit her voice. 那首歌不适合她的嗓子。

name: nicely
interpret: adv.令人满意地；adj.健康的，强健的
example: 单词 nicely 的例句||||My plans dovetailed nicely with hers.我的计划与她的计划正好吻合。||||The room was nicely furnished.这房间布置得很舒适。

name: theatre
interpret: n.电影院，戏院；戏剧工作；演戏
example: 单词 theatre 的例句||||I work at the Grand Theatre. 我在大剧院上班。||||During our visit to London we often went to the theatre. 我们在伦敦逗留时常去看戏。

name: instead
example: 单词 instead 的例句||||She decided to leave here on Sunday instead of Monday. 她决定星期日而不是星期一离开这里。||||Will you go to the party instead of me? 你替我赴宴好吗？

name: camel
example: 单词 camel 的例句||||A camel is known as the ship of the desert. 骆驼被认为是沙漠之舟。||||Have you ever ridden a camel? 你曾骑过骆驼吗？

name: winner
interpret: n.获胜的人; 胜券在握; 制胜的一记入球; 成功的东西
example: 单词 winner 的例句||||There will be a prize for the winner. 优胜者将获得奖品。||||I think she is the winner. 我认为她是优胜者。

name: pull
example: 单词 pull 的例句||||Pull your chair up to the table. 把你的椅子挪近桌子。||||Please pull the door to when you go out. 你出去请把门带上。

name: spider
example: 单词 spider 的例句||||Look at the picture of the spider. 看看这些蜘蛛的照片。||||How many legs does a spider have? 蜘蛛有多少条腿呢？

name: cooking
example: 单词 cooking 的例句||||What do you mean, you don't like my cooking? 你是什么意思，你是不喜欢我做的饭？||||I have little knowledge of cooking. 我几乎不懂烹饪技术。

name: sentence
interpret: n.句子；判决，宣判 vt.宣判，判决
example: 单词 sentence 的例句||||It is a simple sentence. 这是个简单句。||||This is the first sentence. 这是第一句话。

name: chalk
example: 单词 chalk 的例句||||Please give me a piece of chalk. 请给我一支粉笔。||||I want a piece of red chalk. 我想要一支红粉笔。

name: rose
interpret: n.玫瑰，蔷薇；v.(rise的过去式)起立，上升，升起
example: 单词 rose 的例句||||This is a red rose. 这是一朵红色玫瑰花。||||The river suddenly rose. 河水暴涨。

name: lily
example: 单词 lily 的例句||||She is as fair as lily. 她像百合花一样美。||||She destroyed a lily flower. 她破坏了一朵百合花。

name: sunflower
example: 单词 sunflower 的例句||||Yes. This plant is a sunflower. 是的。这是棵向日葵。||||The sunflower turns towards the sun. 向日葵向着太阳。

name: killer
interpret: n.杀人者，杀人犯，杀手，屠杀者
example: 单词 killer 的例句||||Heart attacks have become Britain's No.1 killer disease. 心脏病已成为英国的头号致命疾病。||||The bulk of the evidence points to him as her killer. 大量证据证明是他杀死她的。

name: wipe
interpret: n.擦拭，用力打；v.擦，消除，拭去
example: 单词 wipe 的例句||||Wipe away your tears. 擦干你的眼泪。||||The mother told her son to wipe his face clean. 母亲叫儿子把脸擦干净。

name: shut
interpret: adj.关闭的，合拢的，围绕的；v.关上，闭起，幽禁；vbl.关上，闭起，幽禁
example: 单词 shut 的例句||||It's time to shut up shop and go home. 该闭店回家了。||||Shut up. I'm trying to think. 闭嘴，我在想问题。

name: daily
interpret: adj.每日的，日常的；adv.每日地，日常地；n.日报
example: 单词 daily 的例句||||He sells daily newspapers. 他卖日报。||||He does daily exercises to help control his weight. 他为控制体重而每天坚持锻炼。

name: life
example: 单词 life 的例句||||The doctor came in time to save his life. 医生及时来抢救他的生命。||||At last he knew the meaning of life. 终于，他知道了生命的意义。

name: twin
interpret: n.双胞胎中一人，一对中的一个；adj.双胞胎的，一对的，相似的；vi.生双胞胎
example: 单词 twin 的例句||||She has a twin sister. 她有个双胞胎妹妹。||||I'd like a twin room. 我想要一个双人间。

name: borrow
example: 单词 borrow 的例句||||Can I borrow two books at a time? 我可以一次借两本书吗？||||You can borrow this dictionary from the library. 你可以从图书馆借到这本字典。

name: off
interpret: adj.远的；休假的，空闲的；adv.走开，出发，隔断；prep.离开，脱落，在...之外
example: 单词 off 的例句||||You'd better cool off first. 你最好先冷静下来。|||| I need some time off. 我需要一些时间休息。

name: exhibition
example: 单词 exhibition 的例句||||They went to an exhibition of modern art yesterday. 昨天，他们参观了现代美术展览。||||The exhibition will open tomorrow. 展览会明天开幕。

name: writing
example: 单词 writing 的例句||||I am also writing a short story. 我也写短篇小说。||||Do you like writing for children? 你愿意为儿童写作吗？

name: problem
example: 单词 problem 的例句||||The problem is ongoing. 这个问题尚未解决。||||This problem is too hard for me to solve. 这个问题太难，我解决不了。

name: such
interpret: adj.如此的，这样的；pron.这样的；adv.如此地
example: 单词 such 的例句||||He is such a man. 他是这样一个人。||||He spent all his money, he was such a fool. 他这样傻，花光了所有的钱。

name: honest
example: 单词 honest 的例句||||He was very honest to tell me his story. 他十分坦率地给我讲了他的故事。||||He has an honest face. 他有一张诚实坦率的脸。

name: popular
interpret: adj.受欢迎的；流行的；通俗的
example: 单词 popular 的例句||||" Mary " is a very popular name for a girl. “ 玛丽 ”是个很常见的女孩名字。||||He likes to play football and to sing popular songs. 他喜欢踢足球和唱流行歌曲。

name: serve
interpret: vt. 招待，供应；为…服务；对…有用；可作…用 vi. 服役，服务；适合，足够；发球；招待，侍候 n. 发球，轮到发球
example: 单词 serve 的例句||||To serve the people is our duty. 为人民服务是我们的本分。||||I decided to serve the church. 我决心服务于教会。

name: secondly
example: 单词 secondly 的例句||||Secondly, use your own head and present your point of view. 第二，动脑筋提出自己的见解。||||Secondly it is necessary to define the applied load. 其次，需要确定所作用的载荷。

name: size
interpret: n.尺寸，大小；v.按大小排列或分类
example: 单词 size 的例句||||I think I can find the right size for you. 我想我能给你找到合适的尺码。||||This room is twice the size of that one. 这间屋子有那间两个大。

name: slim
interpret: adj.苗条的，纤细的；薄的；微小的
example: 单词 slim 的例句||||She is tall and slim. 她身量修长。||||I wish I was as slim as you. 但愿我能像你一样苗条。

name: straight
interpret: adj.直的；连续的；整齐的；adv.直地；坦率地；立即；n.直线
example: 单词 straight 的例句||||His hair is dark and straight. 他是黑色直头发。||||Just go straight forward and you'll find the post office. 你只需要直着往前走，然后就会找到邮局。

name: competition
example: 单词 competition 的例句||||It's a friendly competition. 这是一场友谊赛。||||I shall enter for the singing competition. 我将报名参加歌咏比赛。

name: lose
interpret: vt. 浪费；使沉溺于；使迷路；遗失；错过 vi. 失败；受损失
example: 单词 lose 的例句||||I always lose at cards, with my bad luck. 我不走运，打牌总输。||||I can always lose myself in a good book. 一本好书会使我爱不释手。

name: pop
interpret: n.取出，砰然声，流行乐曲；adj.流行的，热门的，通俗的；v.取出，发出爆裂声，突然伸出
example: 单词 pop 的例句||||She is a lead singer in a pop group. 她是流行歌曲演唱团体的最重要的歌手。||||I know nothing about pop music. 我对流行音乐一无所知。

name: prize
interpret: n.奖，奖品，战利品；v.珍视，捕获
example: 单词 prize 的例句||||He won a prize for good behaviour at school. 他因在校的表现好而获奖。||||He hopes from his very heart that he will win a prize. 他满心希望获奖。

name: puzzle
example: 单词 puzzle 的例句||||I'm doing a word puzzle in this newspaper. 我正在猜这张报纸上的一个谜。||||I can't figure out the puzzle. 我算不出那难题。

name: twice
example: 单词 twice 的例句||||Bob phoned twice today. 鲍勃今天打了两次电话。|||| I woke up twice in the night. 我夜里醒过两次。

name: whole
example: 单词 whole 的例句||||It snowed for two whole days. 雪下了整整两天。||||The whole village was sleeping. 整个村庄一片寂静。

name: French
interpret: adj.法国(人)的，法语的；n.法语；vt.剁肉，蔬菜切成长条
example: 单词 French 的例句||||She reads French quite well, but doesn't speak it. 她法语的阅读能力相当强，但不会讲。||||The only French city she enjoyed was Paris. 巴黎是她惟一喜欢的法国城市。

name: German
interpret: adj.德国的，德国人的，德语的；n.德国人，德语
example: 单词 German 的例句||||He is studying German. 他在学习德语。||||Besides English, he has to study German and French. 除英语外，他还要学德语和法语。

name: Japanese
interpret: n.日本人；日语；日文；adj.日本的；日本语的
example: 单词 Japanese 的例句||||This is of Japanese make. 这是日本制造的。||||He began to learn Japanese three years ago. 3年前他开始学日语。

name: peace
example: 单词 peace 的例句||||The two countries were at peace. 两国现在和平相处。||||All I want is a bit of peace and quiet. 我所希望的只是一点平静。

name: artist
example: 单词 artist 的例句||||He is a known artist. 他是一个知名的艺术家。|||| Afterward, the boy became a very famous artist. 后来，这男孩成为一个很有名的艺术家。

name: Asia
example: 单词 Asia 的例句||||He went to some place in Asia. 他到亚洲某地去了。||||An Asian is a person born or living in Asia. 亚洲人是指出生或居住在亚洲的人。

name: plan
interpret: n.计划，策略，方法；v.计划，设计，意欲
example: 单词 plan 的例句||||What do you plan to do during the holidays? 你打算在假期里做什么？||||I talked with him about our plan, and he wanted in. 我同他谈了我们的计划，他想参加。

name: dialogue
example: 单词 dialogue 的例句||||Practise the dialogue in pairs. 两人一组练习对话。||||The dialogue went on until nine o'clock. 谈话一直到九点。

name: speaker
interpret: n.说话者，发言者；说某种语言者；扬声器
example: 单词 speaker 的例句||||Who's the next speaker? 下一个该谁发言？||||He is a poor speaker. 他是一个蹩脚的演讲者。

name: news
example: 单词 news 的例句||||No news is good news. 没有消息就是好消息。||||I like reading hot news. 我喜欢读热点新闻。

name: friendship
interpret: n.友谊，交友关系，友情，友爱
example: 单词 friendship 的例句||||That is my idea about friendship. 这是我关于友谊的看法。||||Let's drink to the friendship of our two peoples. 让我们为两国人民的友谊干杯。

name: kid
example: 单词 kid 的例句||||The kid was playing with his ball. 孩子在玩皮球。||||Look at that cute kid. 瞧瞧这可爱的小家伙。

name: gun
example: 单词 gun 的例句||||This is a really big gun. 这是一个真正的大枪。|||| The soldier reached for his gun. 那名士兵伸手去拿枪。

name: suit
interpret: n.(一套)衣服；起诉；v.合适，中..的意；相称
example: 单词 suit 的例句||||That suit is so expensive. 这套衣服很贵。||||Which day would suit you? 哪一天适合你？

name: mice
example: 单词 mice 的例句||||I like fish and mice. 我喜欢鱼和老鼠。||||Mice are small grey animals. 老鼠是灰色的小动物。

name: tooth
example: 单词 tooth 的例句||||Which tooth pains you? 你哪一颗牙齿痛？||||I have a filling in the tooth. 我补牙了。

name: ouch
interpret: int.哎哟（忽然受痛时的呼叫声）
example: 单词 ouch 的例句||||Ouch! It really hurts. 哎哟！真疼啊。||||Ouch! The ball is heavy! 哎哟！这球很重！

name: Australian
interpret: adj.澳洲的；澳大利亚人的；n.澳大利亚人
example: 单词 Australian 的例句||||He is an Australian. 他是一个澳大利亚人。||||I love Australian animals. 我喜欢澳大利亚的动物。

name: Canadian
interpret: adj.加拿大的；加拿大人的；n.加拿大人
example: 单词 Canadian 的例句||||My best friend is Canadian. 我最好的朋友是加拿大人。||||She's Canadian, but her Chinese is excellent. 她是加拿大人，但她的汉语非常出色。

name: shoot
interpret: vt. 射击，射中；拍摄；发芽；使爆炸；给…注射 vi. 射击；发芽；拍电影
example: 单词 shoot 的例句||||Try and shoot the bird. 开枪打那只鸟试试。||||Keep your distance, or I'll shoot! 别靠近，否则就开枪了！

name: onto
example: 单词 onto 的例句||||The cat jumped onto the chair. 猫跳到椅子上。|||| He threw himself onto the sofa. 他猛然坐到沙发上。

name: truth
interpret: n.真理；真相，事实，实际情况
example: 单词 truth 的例句||||We must find out the truth of the matter. 我们必须弄清楚事情的真相。||||You may trust me that I'm speaking the truth. 你可以相信我在说实话。

name: society
example: 单词 society 的例句||||He lived a hard life in the old society. 他在旧社会日子过得很苦。||||How many people are there in your society? 你们社团有多少人？

name: meeting
example: 单词 meeting 的例句||||Will you be at the meeting? 你会来开会吗？||||We would like to hold the meeting at an early date. 我们希望早日举行这次会议。

name: cartoon
example: 单词 cartoon 的例句||||What can you see in a cartoon? 你在卡通里能看到什么？||||What is your favorite cartoon? 你最喜欢哪部卡通？

name: dull
interpret: adj.钝的，迟钝的，无趣的；（计算机）暗淡的
example: 单词 dull 的例句||||The knife is so dull that it will not cut. 刀子太钝了，割不开东西。||||The room is dull. 这个房间很阴暗。

name: Thanksgiving
example: 单词 Thanksgiving 的例句||||It's traditional to eat turkey at Thanksgiving. 感恩节吃火鸡是传统。||||She will go home to take part in the Thanksgiving dinner this weekend. 周末她要回家参加感恩节餐会。

name: either
interpret: adj.任一，两方的；prep.任一，随便任一个；conj.或，也
example: 单词 either 的例句||||I have bought two books, you can have either. 我买了两本书，你要哪一本都可以。||||I don't think either of them are at home. 我想他们中任何一个都不在家。

name: fourth
example: 单词 fourth 的例句||||The fourth lesson is science. 第四节是科学课。|||| The Fourth of July is the national holiday of the US. 七月四日是美国国庆日。

name: fifth
example: 单词 fifth 的例句||||It's the fifth door on the right. 右边第五个门。||||I'd like to sit in about the fifth row. 我想坐在第五排左右。

name: eighth
example: 单词 eighth 的例句||||It is on the eighth page. 它在第八页上。||||August is the eighth month of the year. 八月是一年中的第八个月。

name: ninth
example: 单词 ninth 的例句||||He is coming back on the ninth of May. 他五月九号回来。||||September is the ninth month of the year. 九月是一年中的第九个月。

name: twelfth
example: 单词 twelfth 的例句||||It's November the twelfth. 今天是十一月十二日。|||| December is the twelfth month of the year. 12月是一年中的第12个月。

name: twentieth
example: 单词 twentieth 的例句||||Tomorrow is her twentieth birthday. 明天是她二十岁生日。||||He is the twentieth on the list. 在名单上他是第二十个。

name: honey
interpret: n.蜂蜜，甜蜜，爱人；adj.蜂蜜似的，甜蜜的，甘美的；vt.加蜜使甜
example: 单词 honey 的例句||||Honey is very sweet. 蜂蜜很甜。||||That car is a honey. 那辆轿车是个宝贝。

name: hide
interpret: vt.隐藏；躲避；遮蔽，覆盖；vi.隐瞒；遮住；遮挡；n.兽皮
example: 单词 hide 的例句||||She tried to hide her feelings. 她设法掩藏她的感情。||||Are you trying to hide something from me? 你是不是有什么事想瞒着我？

name: secret
example: 单词 secret 的例句||||Their secret is out. 他们的秘密泄露了。||||The plan is secret. 这计划是秘密的。

name: chips
example: 单词 chips 的例句||||Potato chips are served for the children. 给儿童端上了炸薯条。||||I'd like some potato chips. 我想要些炸土豆片儿。

name: bill
interpret: (Bill)比尔(男名)；n.帐单，钞票，票据，清单；议案，法案；广告；鸟嘴，喙；vt.开帐单，用海报宣传，把...列成表
example: 单词 bill 的例句||||Bill is both a good swimmer and a good cook. 比尔不仅是个游泳好手，而且是个烹调能手。||||It will save trouble if you pay the bill now. 如果你现在付账就没事了。

name: cookie
interpret: n.（pl.cookies）小甜饼；饼干；小甜点；甜面包
example: 单词 cookie 的例句||||I don't like eating any cookie. 我不喜欢吃饼干。||||What happened after Alice ate some cookie? 爱丽丝吃了点饼干后发生了什么？

name: waitress
example: 单词 waitress 的例句||||The waitress gave me a menu. 服务员小姐递给我一份菜单。||||She is a very pleasing waitress. 她是个很会讨顾客喜欢的女招待。

name: bookcase
example: 单词 bookcase 的例句||||Put the books back into the bookcase. 把书放回架上去。||||There is a bookcase on the left of my desk. 在我的写字台左边有一个书柜。

name: huge
example: 单词 huge 的例句||||He gave me a huge apple. 他给了我一个大苹果。|||| His acting raised a huge laugh. 他的表演引起一阵大笑。

name: headmaster
example: 单词 headmaster 的例句||||Mr. Jones became headmaster last year. 琼斯先生去年当了校长。||||The whole school like the headmaster. 全校师生都喜欢这位校长。

name: heart
interpret: n.心，中心，要点；v.鼓起勇气，激励
example: 单词 heart 的例句||||He is old in body but young in heart. 他人老心不老。||||I thank you from the bottom of my heart. 我从心坎里感谢你。

name: side
example: 单词 side 的例句||||The shop is on the west side of the street. 商店在街道的西边。||||There was a lot of people on every side. 到处都是人。

name: health
example: 单词 health 的例句||||Are you in good health? 你的身体好吗？||||I wish you a good health and a long life. 祝您健康长寿。

name: believe
interpret: vi. 信任；料想；笃信宗教 vt. 相信；认为；信任
example: 单词 believe 的例句||||Believe it or not, that's the way it is. 信不信由你，反正事情就是这样。||||I believe what you say. 我相信你的话。

name: anyway
example: 单词 anyway 的例句||||Anyway I'm free now. Let me go with you. 我反正闲着没事,就陪你走一趟吧。|||| Anyway, you can try. 至少你可以试试。

name: yourself
example: 单词 yourself 的例句||||I need you to do it yourself. 我要你亲自做。|||| Late again, Tom? I hope you can explain yourself. 汤姆，又迟到了？我希望你能说明理由。

name: herself
example: 单词 herself 的例句||||The little girl wrote the letter all by herself. 这小女孩自己写了这封信。||||She should do her homework herself. 她应该自己做作业。

name: thief
example: 单词 thief 的例句||||He saw the thief running away. 他看见贼逃走了。||||The thief broke the window and got into the house. 那个窃贼打破窗子，进入屋内。

name: lab
example: 单词 lab 的例句||||Who is in the lab this morning? 今天早上谁在实验室？||||We usually have Science in the science lab. 我们通常在科学实验室里上科学课。

name: trouble
interpret: n.苦恼，麻烦；故障；动乱；vt.麻烦 vi.费神
example: 单词 trouble 的例句||||I hate to trouble you. 我真不愿麻烦你。||||The trouble is that he doesn't have enough money. 麻烦在于他缺钱。

name: everybody
example: 单词 everybody 的例句||||Christmas is a holiday for everybody. 圣诞节是所有人的节日。||||It is difficult to find a time that suits everybody. 很难找到一个对每人都合适的时间。

name: center
example: 单词 center 的例句||||The new sports center is a big success. 新建的体育中心获得巨大成功。||||Alice stood in the center of a large group. 爱丽丝站在一大群人的中央。

name: nearby
example: 单词 nearby 的例句||||There is a supermarket nearby. 附近有一家超市。|||| We went fishing in the river nearby. 我们去附近的河里钓鱼。

name: Singapore
example: 单词 Singapore 的例句||||How much do you know about Singapore? 你对新加坡了解多少？||||Are you from Singapore? 你是新加坡人吗？

name: dream
example: 单词 dream 的例句||||I met my grandfather in my dream last night. 昨晚我梦见了我的外祖父。||||It's my dream to win a Nobel Prize. 我的理想是获得诺贝尔奖。

name: Italy
example: 单词 Italy 的例句||||Have you ever been to Italy? 你到过意大利吗？||||We lived in southern Italy. 我们住在意大利的南部。

name: excellent
example: 单词 excellent 的例句||||She is an excellent teacher. 她是个优秀的教师。|||| I'm sure you can make an excellent job next time. 我相信你下次会干得更好。

name: discuss
example: 单词 discuss 的例句||||Let's discuss it another day. 咱们改日再议吧。||||College students always discuss the news. 大学生经常讨论新闻。

name: pound
interpret: n.英镑(英国货币单位，符号为￡)
example: 单词 pound 的例句||||I had nothing in the world but a million-pound note. 除了一张百万英镑的钞票，这世上我是一无所有。|||| I hope the cost will be below a pound. 我希望费用低于一镑。

name: freedom
example: 单词 freedom 的例句||||They are fighting for freedom. 他们正为自由而战。||||At last they won their freedom. 他们终于赢得了自由。

name: rude
example: 单词 rude 的例句||||How can you be so rude? 你怎么可以这么粗鲁呢？|||| It is rude to point. 指指点点是不礼貌的。

name: hometown
example: 单词 hometown 的例句||||Australia is the hometown of kangaroos. 澳大利亚是袋鼠的故乡。||||My hometown is 100 miles away from here. 我的家乡离这里有一百英里路。

name: enter
interpret: vt.进入，参加，开始；vi.进去，参加；n.回车键，输入，回车
example: 单词 enter 的例句||||Do not enter the danger zone! 切勿进入危险区！|||| The sign means that cars cannot enter. 这种标志表示汽车不能入内。

name: hate
interpret: n.憎恨，厌恶，厌恶的人或事；vt.憎恨，不愿；vi.表示憎恨
example: 单词 hate 的例句||||We hate our enemy. 我们憎恨敌人。||||Snakes are my special hate. 蛇是我最憎恶的东西。

name: oversleep
interpret: vt. 使睡过头 vi. 睡过头
example: 单词 oversleep 的例句||||I never oversleep. 我从不睡懒觉。||||I'm afraid I'll oversleep. 我怕睡过了头。

name: fail
interpret: vi. 失败，不及格；破产；缺乏；衰退 vt. 不及格；使失望；忘记；舍弃
example: 单词 fail 的例句||||If I should fail I would try again. 万一失败，我还要试一试。||||If you fail now, who will pick up the pieces? 你现在要是失败了，谁来收拾残局？

name: exam
example: 单词 exam 的例句||||I hope to pass this exam. 我希望通过这次考试。|||| His exam results were good. 他的测验成绩不错。

name: badly
interpret: adv.非常，严重地；坏地，差地，拙劣地
example: 单词 badly 的例句||||I miss you so badly. 我非常非常想你。||||We need money badly now. 我们现在非常需要钱。

name: police
interpret: n.警察，警察当局，治安，公安；vt.维持治安，警备，管辖
example: 单词 police 的例句||||They sent him over to the police. 他们将他遣送警察局。||||It took the police only several days to break the case. 警察只用了几天就破案了。

name: purple
example: 单词 purple 的例句||||Who is wearing a purple dress? 谁穿着紫色的裙子？||||We like our purple socks. 我们喜欢我们的紫色袜子。

name: passage
interpret: n.通道，走廊，一段文章，旅程；vi.通过；vt.通过
example: 单词 passage 的例句||||I'll read you another passage. 我来读另一段给你们听。||||The house has an underground passage. 这房子有一条地下通道。

name: British
interpret: adj.英国的；大不列颠的；英国人的
example: 单词 British 的例句||||The British drink a great deal of tea. 英国人饮大量的茶。||||The ship is in British waters. 这条船行驶在英国的海域里。

name: opposite
interpret: adj.相对的，相反的，对面的；prep.对面
example: 单词 opposite 的例句||||The post office is opposite (to) the station. 邮局在车站的对面。||||Black and white are opposite. 黑与白是截然相反的。

name: upstairs
interpret: adj.楼上的；adv.在楼上，往楼上，高水平地，上层地，头脑上地；n.楼上
example: 单词 upstairs 的例句||||He would prefer to meet me downstairs rather than upstairs. 他宁愿在楼下见我，而不愿在楼上。||||I think I'll go upstairs and have a sleep. 我想上楼去睡一觉。

name: pool
interpret: n.水塘(池)，游泳池，撞球；vi.形成池塘；vt.集中，积累
example: 单词 pool 的例句||||The swimming pool was opened to the public on July 1. 游泳池于七月一日对外开放。||||At the end of half an hour the pool was nearly dry. 这样过了半小时，坑里的水差不多舀光了。

name: assistant
interpret: n.助手，助理，助教；adj.有帮助的，辅助的，副的
example: 单词 assistant 的例句||||He needs an assistant. 他需要一位助手。||||Her sister is a sales assistant. 她姐姐是个售货员。

name: blonde
example: 单词 blonde 的例句||||My younger brother married a blonde. 我弟弟娶了个白肤金发碧眼的女人。||||The lady was young, blonde and dressed in blue. 这位女士年轻，皮肤白皙，穿着蓝色的衣服。

name: hero
example: 单词 hero 的例句||||He is a nameless hero. 他是无名英雄。||||Bob is the hero of the novel. 鲍勃是那小说中的男主人公。

name: patient
interpret: n.病人；adj.有耐心的，能容忍的
example: 单词 patient 的例句||||The doctor told the patient that he was in good way. 大夫对病人说，他的病情已在好转。||||We must be patient with children. 我们对孩子要耐心。

name: handsome
example: 单词 handsome 的例句||||He is a handsome man. 他是一位美男子。||||She lost her heart to the handsome guy. 她爱上了这个漂亮的小伙子。

name: apartment
interpret: n.（美）公寓住宅，公寓房间；单元房间
example: 单词 apartment 的例句||||How big is the apartment? 这公寓有多大？|||| Remember to clean your apartment. 记得打扫你的公寓。

name: cleaner
example: 单词 cleaner 的例句||||I used to work as a cleaner in a hospital. 我过去在医院里做保洁员。||||Take your clothes to the cleaner. 将你的衣服送到洗衣店。

name: athlete
example: 单词 athlete 的例句||||He looks like an athlete when he puts on that coat. 他穿上那套衣服俨然像个运动员。||||Tompson was a great athlete. 汤普森是位著名的运动员。

name: lawyer
example: 单词 lawyer 的例句||||My son is a lawyer. 我儿子是律师。||||A lawyer is often called in to write a will. 律师常被请来写遗嘱。

name: sweep
interpret: n.扫除，打扫；肃清；视野，范围；全胜；vt.扫除；用手指弹，猛拉；扫荡；肃清；冲走
example: 单词 sweep 的例句||||Did you sweep up all the broken glass? 你有没有把碎玻璃都扫掉？||||This floor needs a good sweep. 这地板需要好好清扫一下。

name: younger
example: 单词 younger 的例句||||My younger brother hides behind the door. 我弟弟躲在门后。|||| She is older than me but my other sisters are younger. 她比我大，其余都是我妹妹。

name: joke
interpret: n.笑话；笑柄；vi.开玩笑；vt.开…的玩笑，戏弄
example: 单词 joke 的例句||||Come on, lighten up! It was only a joke. 喂，别紧张！这只不过是开玩笑。||||They all laughed about the joke. 这个笑话把他们全逗笑了。

name: reporter
example: 单词 reporter 的例句||||A good reporter has a nose for news. 一个优秀的记者善于发现新闻。||||He told his story to a reporter. 他向一个记者讲述了自己的经历。

name: medal
example: 单词 medal 的例句||||He has won a gold medal. 他获得了一枚金质奖章。|||| When did China win the first medal at olympic games? 中国首次获得奥运奖牌是在哪一年？

name: championship
example: 单词 championship 的例句||||We are proud for you to win the championship. 我们为你赢得冠军而骄傲。||||The basketball championship is exciting. 篮球冠军赛真激动人心。

name: record
example: 单词 record 的例句||||She broke the former record. 她打破以前的记录。|||| All the important events are on record. 重大事件都有记载。

name: Olympic
interpret: adj.奥林匹克的；n.奥林匹克运动会
example: 单词 Olympic 的例句||||The 1984 Olympic Games was held in Los Angeles. 1984年奥林匹克运动会在洛杉矶举行。||||In the Olympic Games the winner will get a gold medal. 在奥运会上优胜者得到一枚金牌。

name: low
interpret: aaj.低，矮；低级的，下层的，卑贱的；低声的
example: 单词 low 的例句||||Your price is too low. 你们的价格太低。||||This is a small and low house. 这是一个小而低矮的房子。

name: gentleman
interpret: n.出身高贵的人，绅士，君子；阁下，先生；男厕所
example: 单词 gentleman 的例句||||He is a real gentleman. 他是一个真正的君子。||||If he is anything of a gentleman, he will pay the money. 倘若他是位真君子，他会付这笔钱的。

name: rainstorm
example: 单词 rainstorm 的例句||||In the swift the day before that year's wheat harvest,a rainstorm threatened.在那一年麦收的前一天，一场暴雨眼看就要来临。||||This river used to get flooded whenever there was a rainstorm.过去一下暴雨，这条河就发大水。

name: blouse
interpret: n.女衬衫；童衫；宽松的上衣
example: 单词 blouse 的例句||||Look at my new blouse. 看看我的新的女衬衫。||||How much is the pink blouse? 这件粉红色的童衫多少钱？

name: kilo
example: 单词 kilo 的例句||||I must buy a kilo of coffee today. 我今天得去买一公斤咖啡。||||These apples are selling at 40 pence a kilo. 这些苹果售价每公斤40便士。

name: cent
example: 单词 cent 的例句||||Three twenty-five cents' stamps, please. 请给我三张25分邮票。||||The book was old and it was not worth a cent. 这本书旧了，一文不值。

name: net
interpret: n.网，网状物，罗网，净利，实价；adj.净余的，纯粹的；vt.用网捕，撒网；净赚
example: 单词 net 的例句||||There is a net behind the goal in football. 足球的球门后面有一个网子。|||| The ball rolled into the net. 球滚进了网中。

name: bookshop
example: 单词 bookshop 的例句||||I want to go to the bookshop. 我想去书店。|||| You can get this book at any bookshop. 在任何书店都买得到这本书。

name: fantastic
interpret: adj.极好的，难以置信的，奇异的，幻想的
example: 单词 fantastic 的例句||||What a fantastic goal! 这球进得多漂亮！|||| I thought she was fantastic. 我觉得她太棒了。

name: surf
interpret: n. 海浪，拍岸浪 vt. 在…冲浪 vi. 作冲浪运动
example: 单词 surf 的例句||||I surf every day from about 8 pm.to midnight. 我每天都冲浪，大约从晚上八点到午夜。||||I surf the Internet two hours a day. 我每天上网冲浪两个小时。

name: accident
example: 单词 accident 的例句||||He had a traffic accident. 他出了交通事故。||||An accident happened yesterday. 昨天发生了一起事故。

name: deep
interpret: adj.深的，深长的；深奥的；强烈；adv.深，迟
example: 单词 deep 的例句||||The sky is deep blue. 天空是深蓝色的。||||We talked deep into the night. 我们谈至深夜。

name: lightly
interpret: adv.轻轻地，容易地，不费力地
example: 单词 lightly 的例句||||The wind was blowing lightly from the west. 风从西方轻轻吹来。||||If you walk lightly, your footsteps will not be heard. 如果你轻轻地走，别人就听不见你的脚步声了。

name: soil
example: 单词 soil 的例句||||The soil here is very loose. 这里的土质很松。|||| The soil has been washed down into the valley. 泥土流入了山谷。

name: grandparent
example: 单词 grandparent 的例句||||We went to our grandparent's place for a short visit. 我们去祖母家呆了一会儿。||||A grandparent's job is easier than that of a parent. 祖父母的任务比父母的任务要轻松一些。

name: later
interpret: adv.过后，后来；adj.以后的，更后的，较晚的
example: 单词 later 的例句||||He didn't turn up until half an hour later. 半小时后他才出现。||||This part of the hospital was built on later. 医院的这个部分是后来增建的。

name: fashion
interpret: n.流行，风尚，时样，时装；v.形成，造，作
example: 单词 fashion 的例句||||The style of cloth is in fashion nowadays. 现在这种布料正流行。||||She was dressed in the latest fashion. 她穿着最新时装。

name: army
interpret: n.军队，陆军，正规军，野战军
example: 单词 army 的例句||||The army numbered four to five thousand at the start. 这支军队开始才有四五千人。||||What is the total strength of the enemy army? 敌军人数总共有多少？

name: western
interpret: n.西方人；西部片；西部小说；adj.西方的，西洋的，西部的
example: 单词 western 的例句||||He is wearing a western style suit. 他穿着一套西式服装。||||He lives at the western end of the village. 他家住在村子尽西头。

name: exactly
example: 单词 exactly 的例句||||What I want is exactly this one. 我要的就是这一个。||||I beg your pardon, what you say is not exactly correct. 对不起，你说的话并不完全对。

name: owner
example: 单词 owner 的例句||||They decided to give it back to its owner. 他们决定把它归还原主。||||Do you know the name of the owner? 你知道主人的名字吗？

name: brought
example: 单词 brought 的例句||||He brought a new book with him. 他带来一本新书。|||| I brought you your shirt. 我带来了你的衬衣。

name: future
interpret: adj.将来的，未来的；n.将来，未来
example: 单词 future 的例句||||We are still on the way of future. 我们还在未来的路上。||||We all work hard in the interests of our future. 我们都为我们自己的将来而努力工作。

name: event
example: 单词 event 的例句||||I'm surprised that you didn't know of such an important event. 这么大的事你竟会不知道。||||He is the center of this event. 他是这次事件的核心人物。

name: husband
example: 单词 husband 的例句||||My husband just lost his job. 我老公刚刚失业了。||||I visited my daughter and her husband. 我去看望我的女儿和女婿。

name: population
example: 单词 population 的例句||||What is the population of London? 伦敦的人口是多少？||||China has a huge population. 中国有众多的人口。

name: wife
example: 单词 wife 的例句||||She is my wife. 她是我妻子。||||He is a tall man but his wife is short. 他是个子很高的男人，但他妻子很矮。

name: built
example: 单词 built 的例句||||My father built his business on years of hard work. 我父亲多年奋斗创立了自己的事业。||||Ten years later, the school built out two buildings. 10年后这个学校又增建了两栋建筑。

name: until
example: 单词 until 的例句||||He arrived home until midnight. 他直到半夜才到家。||||She didn't sleep until midnight. 她直到半夜才睡。

name: neither
interpret: adj.皆不，两不；int.两者都不；conj.既非，既不
example: 单词 neither 的例句||||I don't know that neither. 那个我也不知道。||||He doesn't smoke, neither does he drink. 他既不抽烟也不喝酒。

name: tool
example: 单词 tool 的例句||||You'll need a special tool to do that. 干那个活儿要用专用工具。||||A foreign language is a useful tool. 外语是有用的工具。

name: tourist
example: 单词 tourist 的例句||||A tourist guide will show you around. 一位导游将陪您到处参观。||||I'm a tourist and I have a passport. 我是个观光客，我有护照。

name: zero
example: 单词 zero 的例句||||The teacher put a zero on his paper. 老师在他的试卷上打了个零分。||||Our hopes fell to zero. 我们的希望完全破灭了。

name: e-mail
interpret: n.( = electronic mail)电子邮件，电子邮政
example: 单词 e-mail 的例句||||Do you have an e-mail box? 你有电子信箱吗？||||May I have your e-mail address? 能给我你的e-mail地址吗？

name: international
example: 单词 international 的例句||||International trade helps all nations. 国际贸易有助于所有的国家。||||March 8 is the International Woman's Day. 三月八日是国际妇女节。

name: language
example: 单词 language 的例句||||Is English a hard language to learn? 英语是一种难学的语言吗？||||Language is a wonderful thing. 语言是极好的东西。

name: plenty
interpret: adj.充足的，相当多的；n.充足，大量；pron.充分，够多
example: 单词 plenty 的例句||||We have plenty of time to finish the job. 我们有充裕的时间完成这项工作。||||Plenty of people have come. 来了很多人。

name: pain
interpret: n.痛苦，疼，痛，劳苦，努力；vt.使痛苦；vi.作痛
example: 单词 pain 的例句||||Bad teeth often cause pain. 坏牙常引起疼痛。|||| The patient cried with pain. 那病人痛苦地哭喊。

name: pale
example: 单词 pale 的例句||||You look a bit pale. 你脸色有点苍白。||||He seems to be sick, for he appears pale. 看样子他病了，因为他面色看起来很苍白。

name: prefer
interpret: vt. 更喜欢；宁愿；提出；提升 vi. 喜欢；愿意
example: 单词 prefer 的例句||||I prefer red to blue. 我喜欢红色而不喜欢蓝色。||||I prefer tea rather than coffee. 我喜欢茶甚于喜欢咖啡。

name: seldom
example: 单词 seldom 的例句||||Lazy people seldom succeed. 懒惰的人很少会成功。||||On Sundays, he seldom stays in the house. 星期天他很少待在房子里。

name: wake
interpret: vt.叫醒，激发；vi.醒来，醒着；警觉，振奋；n.醒；守夜；尾迹，痕迹
example: 单词 wake 的例句||||Please wake me up at six. 请在六点钟叫醒我。||||Be quiet or you'll wake the whole house! 安静点！别把全家人都吵醒了！

name: sightseeing
example: 单词 sightseeing 的例句||||Most of our time was spent in sightseeing. 我们的大部分时间用在游览上。||||Sightseeing is no part of my plan. 我根本没打算参观游览。

name: UFO
example: 单词 UFO 的例句||||Did you actually see the UFO? 你真的见到飞碟了吗？||||Is that a UFO in the sky? 天上那东西是不是个不明飞行物？

name: Moscow
example: 单词 Moscow 的例句||||Moscow is a very cold place in winter. 冬季莫斯科非常寒冷。||||He joined a flying school in Moscow. 他进了莫斯科一所飞行学校。

name: purse
example: 单词 purse 的例句||||She cried out that she had lost her purse. 她高喊钱包丢了。||||He found a purse on the road. 他在路上捡到一个钱包。

name: course
interpret: n.课程，讲座，过程，路线，一道(菜)
example: 单词 course 的例句||||The college course was then cut to three years. 大学学制那时缩短到三年。||||Of course, I don't always sleep in the afternoons. 当然，我并不总是在下午睡觉。

name: contest
interpret: n.竞争；竞赛，比赛；vt.竞赛，争取，争辩；vi.争夺
example: 单词 contest 的例句||||Are you going to enter yourself for the contest? 你打算报名参加比赛吗？||||This is man's contest with nature. 这是人与大自然的搏斗。

name: college
example: 单词 college 的例句||||The college drama society is going to put on a play. 大学戏剧协会正准备上演一个剧目。||||I was hot on playing basketball when I was in college. 我上大学时热衷于打篮球。

name: company
example: 单词 company 的例句||||Is this your company? 这是你的公司吗？||||Which company was that? 那是哪家公司？

name: Italian
interpret: adj./n.意大利的；意大利(人/语)的
example: 单词 Italian 的例句||||They were speaking in Italian. 他们在讲意大利语。||||We'll cook them a nice Italian meal. 我们会给他们做一顿美味的意大利餐。

name: machine
interpret: n.机器，机械装置，机械般工作的人；v.以机器制造；（计算机）机器
example: 单词 machine 的例句||||I can't guess how to control the machine. 我猜不出来怎样操作那台机器。||||This kind of machine is out of date. 这种机器过时了。

name: leader
example: 单词 leader 的例句||||Whom did you choose for our team leader? 你选谁当我们的队长？||||She does a good job as leader of the factory. 她是厂里的好当家。

name: bored
interpret: adj.无趣的，烦人的，无聊的，不感兴趣的
example: 单词 bored 的例句||||After a while, I began to get bored with my job. 过了一段时间，我开始厌烦这份工作。||||I am bored to death. 我无聊死了。

name: knock
example: 单词 knock 的例句||||There was a very quiet knock at the door. 有人轻声叩门。||||She took a bad knock when her parents died. 她的父母去世使她受到沉重的打击。

name: reason
interpret: n.原因，理由，理智，道理；v.劝说，推理
example: 单词 reason 的例句||||That is the reason why we must go now. 那就是我们现在必须走的理由。||||The reason for the flood was that heavy rain. 水灾是那场大雨造成的。

name: Korean
interpret: n.韩国人，韩国语文；adj.韩国人的，韩国语文的
example: 单词 Korean 的例句||||I'm crazy about Korean TV plays. 我非常喜欢韩国电视剧。||||I was singing an old Korean love song. 我刚才唱的，是一首旧的韩国情歌。

name: during
example: 单词 during 的例句||||What did you do with yourself during the summer holidays? 暑假你是怎样度过的？||||London is full of visitors during May and June. 五六月间伦敦挤满了游客。

name: develop
interpret: vt. 开发；进步；使成长；使显影 vi. 发育；生长；进化；显露
example: 单词 develop 的例句||||Plants develop from seeds. 植物从种子长大。||||We must develop the natural resources of our country. 我们必须开发我们国家的天然资源。

name: modern
interpret: n.现代人，有思想的人；adj.现代的，时髦的
example: 单词 modern 的例句||||England is the birthplace of the modern novel. 英国是近代小说发源地。||||She's a modern girl. 她是一个摩登女郎。

name: personal
interpret: adj.个人的，私人的；本人的；身体的，容貌的
example: 单词 personal 的例句||||It's a personal letter. 这是私人信件。||||I don't want to have a hand in his personal affairs. 我不愿意过问他个人的事。

name: return
interpret: vi.返回，回来；送还；回复，恢复；vt.归还，送还；n.返回，归来；偿还，归还；回复
example: 单词 return 的例句||||I'll return at 10 this evening. 我今晚十点回来。||||I often return to my hometown in dreams. 我常常在梦中回到我的故乡。

name: Ottawa
example: 单词 Ottawa 的例句||||The capital of Canada is Ottawa. 加拿大的首都是渥太华。||||A fast train does the journey to Ottawa in three hours. 快车在3小时以内走完去渥太华的旅程。

name: alone
interpret: adj.单独的，孤独的；adv.单独地，独自地；仅仅
example: 单词 alone 的例句||||He often makes a round trip to the hospital alone. 他经常一个人往返医院。||||It is dangerous for a girl to go out alone at night. 一个女孩夜里单独外出是危险的。

name: Germany
example: 单词 Germany 的例句||||Germany and France are European countries. 德国和法国是欧洲国家。||||I was watching the England Germany football match on TV. 我在电视里看英德足球赛。

name: turkey
example: 单词 turkey 的例句||||It is equal in size to a turkey. 它的大小和火鸡一样。||||After ten years, I was going on a trip to Turkey. 阔别10年了，我又要踏上去土耳其的旅途。

name: agree
interpret: vi.同意，赞成，承认，适合；vt.同意
example: 单词 agree 的例句||||I totally agree with you. 我完全同意你的看法。|||| They could not agree about who should do the work. 对于谁该做这项工作，他们意见不一致。

name: decide
example: 单词 decide 的例句||||It's a difficult question to decide. 这是个难以决定的问题。||||I can't decide which to choose. 我无法决定要选哪一个。

name: continue
interpret: vi. 继续，延续；仍旧，连续 vt. 继续说…；使…继续；使…延长
example: 单词 continue 的例句||||We'll continue with our work. 我们要继续做。||||Even if it should rain tomorrow, we will continue our work. 即使明天下雨，我们也要继续工作。

name: physics
example: 单词 physics 的例句||||He is working hard at physics. 他在攻读物理学。||||He's very interested in nuclear physics. 他对核物理学非常感兴趣。

name: pay
interpret: vt. 支付，付；偿还，补偿；给予 vi. 付款；偿还 n. 工资，薪水；付款；报答
example: 单词 pay 的例句||||How much did you pay? 你付了多少钱？||||His pay is below the average. 他的工资低于一般水平。

name: ladder
example: 单词 ladder 的例句||||He got down from the ladder. 他从梯子上下来了。||||The book is the ladder of human progress. 书是人类进步的阶梯。

name: nearly
example: 单词 nearly 的例句||||I nearly missed the bus. 我险些错过了公交车。||||It is nearly two years since I came here. 我来这儿快两年了。

name: mistake
example: 单词 mistake 的例句||||Don't make the same mistake again. 不要再犯同样的错。||||I made a mistake but you should give me a chance. 我犯了一次错误，但你应该给我一次机会。

name: Berlin
example: 单词 Berlin 的例句||||He went to Berlin by aeroplane. 他乘飞机到柏林。||||Where was the Berlin wall? 柏林墙在什么地方？

name: cover
interpret: n.盖子，覆盖物；v.覆盖…，扩及，掩饰
example: 单词 cover 的例句||||Under cover of the dark,the dog was stolen. 在黑夜的掩护下，狗被偷走了。|||| The book needs a new cover. 这书需要装个新封面。

name: behave
example: 单词 behave 的例句||||The children behave well. 孩子们行为良好。||||Not all kings behave in a kingly way. 并非所有国王都有王者风范。

name: set
interpret: n.组合，集合，设定；一套，一副，一局比赛；v.放置，设定；(太阳)落下去
example: 单词 set 的例句||||He set to with a will and soon finished it. 他下定决心做这件事，很快就完成了。||||The bus set the children down just outside the school gate. 公共汽车让孩子们正好在学校门口下车。

name: hang
interpret: vt. 悬挂，垂下；装饰；绞死；使悬而未决 vi. 悬着，垂下；被绞死；悬而不决
example: 单词 hang 的例句||||Why don't you hang up your clothes? 你怎么不把衣服挂起来？||||Hang the picture on the wall. 把画挂到墙上。

name: church
example: 单词 church 的例句||||Mary joined a church yesterday. 玛丽昨天加入了教会。||||She was standing on the church steps. 她正站在教堂门前的台阶上。

name: treat
interpret: n.宴请，款待，请客；vt.视为，对待，论述，治疗，款待；vi.交涉，谈判，协商，款待，作东
example: 单词 treat 的例句||||As you treat me, so will I treat you. 我将象你对待我那样对待你。||||We had better treat it as a joke. 我们最好把它当作玩笑。

name: unlucky
interpret: adj.不吉利的，不祥的，不幸的
example: 单词 unlucky 的例句||||He is always unlucky in love. 他在恋爱方面总是运气不佳。||||Friday is believed to be an unlucky day. 星期五被认为是不吉祥的日子。

name: already
example: 单词 already 的例句||||We have eaten already. 我们已经吃过了。||||I've been there already, so I don't want to go again. 我早已去过那里了，所以我不想再去了。

name: unusual
interpret: adj.不平常的，异常的；与众不同的，独特的
example: 单词 unusual 的例句||||I saw an unusual white elephant. 我看到一只罕见的白象。||||This little house is extremely unusual. 这小房子相当不寻常。

name: while
interpret: conj.当…的时候；而；虽然；尽管 n.一会儿
example: 单词 while 的例句||||In a short while, the cat ate up the fish. 不久，那只猫便将鱼吃个精光。||||He teaches English in the school all the while. 他一直在这所学校里教英语。

name: trick
interpret: n.诡计，欺诈，谋略，恶作剧；癖好；决窍；vt.戏弄，欺骗，装饰；vi. 哄骗
example: 单词 trick 的例句||||Don't try to trick me! 不要欺骗我！||||He has played me a trick. 他跟我开了个玩笑。

name: learner
example: 单词 learner 的例句||||I am a English learner. 我是一个英语学习者。||||He was not so quick a learner as his brother. 他没他弟弟学得快。

name: rush
interpret: n.匆促，冲进，急流，灯心草；vi. 冲，奔，闯，赶紧，匆促行事，涌现；vt.使冲
example: 单词 rush 的例句||||Don't rush me. I must think it over. 别催我，我要仔细想想。||||I'm sorry to have to rush off like this. 我就这样匆忙走掉了，很抱歉。

name: field
interpret: n.田地，田野；adj.野外的，田间的
example: 单词 field 的例句||||Go into the field and clear those boys off. 到田里去把那些男孩赶走。||||He is going across the field. 他正穿越田野。

name: notice
interpret: n.通知，布告；注意，认识；vt.看到，注意到
example: 单词 notice 的例句||||Post this notice on the wall. 把这个通知贴在墙上。||||I didn't notice you when you passed by. 你走过时，我没有注意到你。

name: mark
interpret: n.标志，分数，马克；v.做标记于，留意，打分数
example: 单词 mark 的例句||||Put a question mark at the end of that sentence. 在那个句末划一个问号。||||Mark the wrong word with a circle. 把错字圈起来。

name: lucky
interpret: adj.幸运的，侥幸的，碰巧的，吉祥的
example: 单词 lucky 的例句||||Three is my lucky number. 三是我的幸运数字。||||You are a lucky dog. 你真是个幸运儿。

name: awful
interpret: adj.极坏的；极讨厌的；令人畏惧的，可怕的；威严的，庄重的；极度的，非常的
example: 单词 awful 的例句||||The weather is awful today. 今天天气坏透了。||||An awful accident has happened. 发生了一起可怕的意外事故。

name: remain
example: 单词 remain 的例句||||The shops remain open until late every evening. 这个商店每天晚上要营业到很晚才关门。||||Let things remain as they have been in the past. 让事情照旧吧。

name: care
interpret: n.小心，照料，忧虑；v.关心，照顾，喜爱，介意
example: 单词 care 的例句||||I really care about the students in my class. 我的确喜欢这个班上的学生。||||Her work is to take care of the children. 她的工作是照料好孩子。

name: meal
interpret: n.膳食，一餐，谷物粗粉；vi.进餐
example: 单词 meal 的例句||||Did you enjoy the meal? 你喜欢这顿饭吗？||||Mother cooked us a good meal. 妈妈给我们做了一顿可口的饭。

name: cream
example: 单词 cream 的例句||||Please put cream in her coffee. 请在她的咖啡里加奶精。||||Ice cream is on special this week only! 冰淇淋特价优惠，只限本周！

name: copy
interpret: n.副本，幕仿，一册；（计算机）DOS命令:复制或组合文件，拷贝；v.复印，抄袭；
example: 单词 copy 的例句||||Please copy down all the words on the blackboard. 请把黑板上的字都抄下来。||||Copy this page in your notebook. 把这一页抄到你的笔记本上。

name: sight
interpret: n.景观，视力，眼界；vt.看见，观看；vi.瞄准
example: 单词 sight 的例句||||The young couple fell in love at first sight. 这对年轻人一见钟情。||||We have lost sight of him since he went abroad. 在他出国以后，我们就失掉了联系。

name: carefully
example: 单词 carefully 的例句||||If you watch carefully you will see how to do it. 如果你仔细观察，你就会看出如何做此事了。||||Now listen carefully everybody. 请大家仔细地听。

name: since
interpret: adv.后来；conj.既然，因为，自从；prep.自从
example: 单词 since 的例句||||He's been working in a bank since leaving school. 自从毕业后，他就一直在一家银行工作。||||I have known him ever since I was a child. 我自孩提时代起就已经认识他了。

name: Brazil
example: 单词 Brazil 的例句||||That coffee grows in Brazil is known to all. 众所周知巴西产咖啡。||||Coffee is Brazil's main product. 咖啡是巴西的主要产物。

name: Poland
example: 单词 Poland 的例句||||I had three friends in Poland. 我在波兰有三个朋友。||||He was born in Poland. 他出生在波兰。

name: reach
interpret: n.延伸，范围，河段；vt.到达，伸出，延伸，取得联系；vi.延伸
example: 单词 reach 的例句||||The railway line will soon reach to our town. 铁路不久就要延伸到我们镇了。|||| Can you reach that apple down in the tree? 你能把树上那个苹果摘下来吗？

name: belong
example: 单词 belong 的例句||||Does this house belong to Mr.Winter? 这幢房子是温特先生的吗？|||| We belong to the new club. 我们是这个新俱乐部的成员。

name: polite
interpret: adj.有礼貌的，客气的；斯文的，有教养的
example: 单词 polite 的例句||||It's not polite to stare at a girl in the face. 盯着姑娘的脸瞧是不礼貌的。||||She is a polite girl. 她是一个文雅的姑娘。

name: unable
example: 单词 unable 的例句||||He is unable to do the job for lack of experience. 他缺少经验不能胜任这项工作。||||He was so angry as to be unable to speak. 他是如此生气以至于不能说出话来。

name: compare
example: 单词 compare 的例句||||How does your new house compare with your old one? 你的新房子和你的旧房子比起来怎样？||||It is hard to compare. 很难比较。

name: search
interpret: n.搜寻，探究；v.搜寻，探求，调查
example: 单词 search 的例句||||Did you search all over? 你整个都搜查过了吗？|||| After a long search, they found the lost child. 经过很长时间的寻找，他们发现了这个走失的小孩。

name: complain
example: 单词 complain 的例句||||They did nothing but complain. 他们只知道抱怨。|||| You have no reason to complain. 你没有理由抱怨。

name: necessary
example: 单词 necessary 的例句||||If necessary, give me a ring. 如果需要，打个电话给我。||||Sleep is necessary to health. 睡眠对健康是必要的。

name: expect
interpret: vt. 期望；指望；认为；预料 vi. 期待；预期
example: 单词 expect 的例句||||Don't expect me to run after you all your life. 别指望我伺候你一辈子。||||Don't expect too much of his idea. 不要对他的主意期望过高。

name: crowd
interpret: n.群众，一伙，一堆；vi.拥挤，挤满，挤进；vt.挤满，将...塞进，催促
example: 单词 crowd 的例句||||There was a large crowd to send him off. 一大群人为他送行。||||A crowd of people were waiting in front of the gate. 一大群人在门前等着。

name: among
interpret: prep.在…中间，在…之中(三者或三者以上)
example: 单词 among 的例句||||You are only one among many who need help. 你不过是许多需要帮助的人之一。|||| He was among the last to leave. 他是最后离开者之一。

name: comic
interpret: n.连环图画，杂耍滑稽演员；adj.滑稽的，有趣的，喜剧的
example: 单词 comic 的例句||||He is a popular tv comic. 他是受欢迎的电视喜剧演员。||||Everything have its comic side. 凡事都有滑稽的一面。

name: tiny
example: 单词 tiny 的例句||||She learned to swim when she was really tiny. 她很小的时候就学会了游泳。||||The baby put his tiny hand in mine. 那个婴儿把小手放在我的手中。

name: imagine
interpret: vt. 想像；猜想；臆断 vi. 想像；猜想；想像起来
example: 单词 imagine 的例句||||I don't imagine they will come if it rains. 我认为天如果下雨，他们是不会来的。||||You don't imagine it is true. 你别想像那是真的。

name: negative
example: 单词 negative 的例句||||He gave us a negative answer. 他给了我们一个否定的回答。||||I think the film has some negative effect. 我认为这电影有一些消极影响。

name: rocket
interpret: n.火箭，烟火；v.发射火箭，猛涨
example: 单词 rocket 的例句||||They crowded out to look at the rocket. 他们涌出去看那火箭。||||They planned to send a rocket to the moon. 他们计划向月球发射火箭。

name: towards
interpret: prep.朝，向，致力于，有助于，对于；大约，将近
example: 单词 towards 的例句||||The house will be ready towards the end of the year. 这房子在年底以前可以造好。||||He is friendly towards me. 他对我友好。

name: discover
example: 单词 discover 的例句||||We'll discover who did it. 我们会查出是谁做的。|||| When did you discover it? 你在什么时候发觉的？

name: century
example: 单词 century 的例句||||As a writer, he really belongs to the 18th century. 作为一个作家, 他的确属于18世纪。|||| We live in the 21st century. 我们生活在二十一世纪。

name: runner
interpret: n.奔跑者，赛跑者，操作者，滑槽
example: 单词 runner 的例句||||I was slowly closing on the runner ahead of me. 我慢慢追上了跑在我前面的人。||||A runner needs plenty of wind. 跑步者需要呼吸大量的空气。

name: although
example: 单词 although 的例句||||Although my car is very old, it still runs fast. 我的汽车虽然很旧，但仍然跑得很快。||||Although he worked hard, he failed in the exam. 虽然他很努力，但他考试没有及格。

name: prevent
interpret: vt. 预防，防止；阻止 vi. 妨碍，阻止
example: 单词 prevent 的例句||||Nobody can prevent our getting married. 谁也阻止不了我们结婚。||||My only idea was to prevent the woman from speaking. 我唯一的想法就是不让那女人讲话。

name: ghost
example: 单词 ghost 的例句||||Have you ever seen a ghost? 你看见过鬼魂吗？|||| He looked as if he had seen a ghost. 他好象见了鬼似的(很惊慌的样子)。

name: enemy
interpret: n.敌人，仇敌，反对者；敌军，敌国
