example: 单词 enemy 的例句||||You must keep a good watch for the enemy. 对敌人你们必须保持警戒。||||You'd better first know a friend from an enemy. 你首先得分清敌友。

name: slide
interpret: n.滑；幻灯片；雪崩，山崩；滑坡，滑梯；vt.使滑；vi.滑，跌落
example: 单词 slide 的例句||||There was only a slide. 这儿只有一个滑梯。||||It will slide down the mountain. 它就会滑下山体。

name: even
interpret: adj.平坦的，偶数的，相等的；adv.甚至，恰好，正当
example: 单词 even 的例句||||It was cold yesterday, and it's even colder today. 昨天冷，今天更冷了。||||He's the best teacher even though he has the least experience. 尽管他经验最少，但教得最好。

name: divide
interpret: vt. 划分；除；分开；使产生分歧 vi. 分开；意见分歧
example: 单词 divide 的例句||||Divide these apples among you three. 你们三人分掉这些苹果吧。||||This class is too large, we have to divide it. 这个班太大了，我们得把它分一分。

name: clothing
example: 单词 clothing 的例句||||John sells clothing in a store. 约翰在商店里卖服装。||||We'll never lack food and clothing if we're willing to work. 如果我们愿意工作，就不会缺吃少穿。

name: single
interpret: adj.单人的；单一的，单个的；未婚的，独身的
example: 单词 single 的例句||||I want a single room. 我想要一个单人房间。||||Does he mind still being single? 他对自己仍然单身在意吗？

name: form
interpret: n.形式，形状，表格；v.形成，组成，建立
example: 单词 form 的例句||||It is an art form. 它是一种艺术形式。||||My garden is in the form of a square. 我的花园是方形的。

name: comfortable
example: 单词 comfortable 的例句||||This sofa is very comfortable. 这张沙发很舒服。|||| The environment for shopping is comfortable. 购物的环境很舒适。

name: situation
example: 单词 situation 的例句||||They could think of no way to save the situation. 他们想不出什么办法来挽救局势。||||The situation is really serious. 情形真的很严重。

name: increase
interpret: n.增加，增强，提高；v.增加，提高
example: 单词 increase 的例句||||The increase has now slowed down. 增长的速度现已减缓。||||We had better increase the amount. 我们最好把数量再增加一些。

name: well-known
interpret: adj.众所周知的；有名的；清楚明白的
example: 单词 well-known 的例句||||He is a well-known writer. 他是个有名的作家。|||| She was well-known two years ago. 两年前她就出名了。

name: introduce
example: 单词 introduce 的例句||||Allow me to introduce myself. 请允许我自我介绍一下。||||Let me introduce myself to you. 让我向您做个自我介绍。

name: marry
example: 单词 marry 的例句||||I want you to be my wife, Will you marry me? 我希望你做我的妻子，你愿意和我结婚吗？||||John is going to marry Mary. 约翰将要和玛丽结婚。

name: lonely
interpret: adj.孤独的，寂寞的，孤零零的，人迹罕至的
example: 单词 lonely 的例句||||The place is a bit lonely. 那个地方有点荒凉。||||I don't feel lonely as I've made new friends here. 我在这里又交了新朋友，一点也不寂寞。

name: invention
example: 单词 invention 的例句||||It's a most useful invention. 这是一项极其有用的发明。||||Paper is also an invention by the Chinese.纸也是中国人发明的。

name: pleasant
interpret: adj.令人愉快的，舒适的；vi.满意，喜欢；vt.使高兴
example: 单词 pleasant 的例句||||We spend a very pleasant evening. 我们度过了一个愉快的晚上。||||The climate here is pleasant. 这里的气候很宜人。

name: manage
interpret: vt.经营，管理，处理；设法，对付；操纵，运用；vi.处理，办理，设法对付
example: 单词 manage 的例句||||He took great pains to manage the factory well. 为了管理好工厂，他可真是煞费苦心。||||The work is not much,I can manage it alone. 活儿不多，我一个人也忙得过来。

name: type
interpret: n.类型，型号，样式；v.打字，用打字打出
example: 单词 type 的例句||||He is a fine type of the youth. 他是青年人的一个典范。||||She can type 70 words a minute. 她一分钟能打70个字。

name: prepare
interpret: vt.为...做好准备，整合；vi.做好准备
example: 单词 prepare 的例句||||I prepare to sell the car. 我准备把车卖掉。|||| We must prepare for the worst. 我们必须做最坏的打算。

name: purpose
interpret: n.目的，意图；意志，决心；议题；vt.打算，决意
example: 单词 purpose 的例句||||I purpose going to London. 我想去伦敦。|||| This is the main purpose of my coming here. 这就是我到这儿来的主要目的。

name: recent
example: 单词 recent 的例句||||The photo is quite recent. 这张照片是新近照的。|||| Things have changed in recent weeks. 近几周来情况发生了变化。

name: surprising
example: 单词 surprising 的例句||||The number of mistakes is surprising. 错误之多是惊人的。||||They have heard the surprising news. 他们听到了那惊人的消息。

name: perfect
interpret: n.完成式；adj.完美的，全然的，理想的，熟练的，正确的，完成式的；vt.使完美，修改
example: 单词 perfect 的例句||||She speaks perfect English. 她英语说得好极了。|||| The weather is perfect for a picnic. 这种天气举行野餐好极了。

name: deaf
example: 单词 deaf 的例句||||Deaf people can't hear. 聋人听不见。||||She was deaf to my advice. 她对我的劝告充耳不闻。

name: primary
interpret: n.最主要者；adj.主要的，初期的，根本的
example: 单词 primary 的例句||||How long have you studied in primary school? 你们在小学学习多长时间？||||The primary reason for advertising is to sell more goods. 做广告的根本目的是要多出售货物。

name: pie
interpret: n.饼图，派，馅饼；杂乱；喜鹊；爱说话的人；vt.弄乱
example: 单词 pie 的例句||||Can you manage another slice of pie? 你能再吃一片馅饼吗？||||I think I'll have a piece of apple pie. 我想来一块苹果馅饼。

name: advice
example: 单词 advice 的例句||||After all my advice, he still went his own way. 在我苦口婆心地相劝后，他仍然一意孤行。||||You should seek advice from your lawyer on this matter. 你应该征求你的律师对这件事的意见。

name: crazy
interpret: adj.发疯的，荒唐的，古怪的；(about)狂热爱好的
example: 单词 crazy 的例句||||It is a crazy idea. 那是一个疯狂的想法。||||He is crazy about that girl. 他迷上了那位女孩。

name: plum
example: 单词 plum 的例句||||Do you like plum or cherry? 你喜欢梅子还是樱桃？||||There is no blossom this year on the plum trees. 今年李子树不开花。

name: aunty
example: 单词 aunty 的例句||||I went shopping with my mum and aunty today. 下午我跟我的阿姨和老妈逛街去了。||||Aunty, can we go and play in the park? 阿姨，我们可以到公园去玩吗？

name: culture
example: 单词 culture 的例句||||I love the national culture very much. 我非常喜欢民族文化。||||I'm learning all about Thai food and culture. 我学习所有的关于泰国的食物和文化。

name: difference
example: 单词 difference 的例句||||He doesn't know the difference between right and wrong. 他是非不分。||||The difference is so slight, that I can hardly see it. 差别很小，我几乎看不出来。

name: escalator
example: 单词 escalator 的例句||||I don't like escalator - I'll climb the stairs. 我不喜欢自动扶梯,我要爬楼梯。||||Then take the escalator up to the second floor. 然后乘手扶电梯上二楼。

name: almost
example: 单词 almost 的例句||||The band has been on the road for almost a month. 那支乐队进行巡回演出近一个月了。||||We stay in almost every night and watch television. 我们几乎每个晚上都在家里看电视。

name: waste
interpret: n. 浪费；废物；荒地；损耗；地面风化物 vt. 浪费；消耗；使荒芜 vi. 浪费；变消瘦；挥霍钱财
example: 单词 waste 的例句||||Ah! This is a waste of time! 啊，真是浪费时间！|||| If you give her money, she'll only waste it. 如果你把这笔钱给她，她只会把它浪费掉。

name: mention
interpret: n.提及，说起；v.提到，谈到；vt.说起，提到
example: 单词 mention 的例句||||Don't mention this problem this evening. 今晚别提这个问题。||||You didn't mention to me when you are leaving. 你没有告诉我何时动身。

name: lover
example: 单词 lover 的例句||||Every lover sees a thousand graces in the beloved object. 情人眼里出西施。||||Mr. Smith was a lover of poetry. 史密斯先生是一名诗歌爱好者。

name: internet
example: 单词 internet 的例句||||You can find it on the Internet. 你可以在因特网上找到它。||||I surf the Internet two hours a day. 我每天上网冲浪两个小时。

name: price
interpret: n.价格，代价，价值；vt.定格，标价，比较价格
example: 单词 price 的例句||||The goods have gone up in price. 这些商品的价格已经上涨。||||They are selling the bikes off the market price. 他们按低于市价卖出自行车。

name: less
interpret: adj.更少的，更小的；adv.更少地，更小地；n.少量，次要；prep.减
example: 单词 less 的例句||||I read much less now than I did at school. 我现在看书远比我上学时少。||||You can't buy the dress with less than 50 yuan. 买这件衣服没有50元钱下不来。

name: cheer
interpret: n.愉快，激励，欢呼；v.加油，鼓舞，快活起来
example: 单词 cheer 的例句||||A cheer went up in the room. 房间里响起了欢呼声。||||Cheer up! The news isn't too bad. 振作起来吧！消息还不算太坏。

name: pot
example: 单词 pot 的例句||||Please make me a fresh pot of tea. 请给我沏一壶新茶。||||What is the pot made of? 这个锅子是什么做的？

name: perhaps
example: 单词 perhaps 的例句||||Perhaps it will rain in the afternoon. 下午可能有雨。||||Perhaps I can help you. 也许我能帮帮你的忙吧。

name: silly
example: 单词 silly 的例句||||It was silly of him to do it. 他那么做真是太傻了。||||How silly of you to do that! 你做那事多愚蠢呀！

name: beanstalk
example: 单词 beanstalk 的例句||||Look at this tall beanstalk. 看看这棵高大的豆茎。||||His mother cut down the beanstalk. 他妈妈砍断了豆茎。

name: weigh
interpret: vt.秤重量，衡量；重压；下锚；vi.有重量，有影响；重压；下锚
example: 单词 weigh 的例句||||When did you weigh last? 你上次什么时候称体重的？||||Weigh this in your hand. 掂掂这有多重。

name: fishing
example: 单词 fishing 的例句||||We are interested in fishing. 我们对钓鱼感兴趣。||||Let's go fishing today. 我们今天去钓鱼吧。

name: fight
interpret: n.打架，战斗，斗志；v.对抗，打架
example: 单词 fight 的例句||||We are ready to fight again. 我们再度准备好战斗。||||I'll fight with you. 我会和你并肩作战。

name: badminton
example: 单词 badminton 的例句||||I am going to play badminton. 我要去打羽毛球。||||Badminton is an indoor game. 羽毛球是一种室内运动。

name: million
example: 单词 million 的例句||||I've seen it a million times. 我在书上看过无数遍了。||||What will you do if you had a million dollars? 如果你有一百万美元，你会干什么？

name: adult
example: 单词 adult 的例句||||Children and adult should have equal rights. 儿童和成年人应该享有平等的权利。||||He'd spent all his adult life in the army. 他的成年生活全是在军队里度过的。

name: teenager
example: 单词 teenager 的例句||||You still look like a teenager. 你看起来像一个十几岁的青年。||||Sandy is a very busy teenager. 山迪是个非常忙碌的少年。

name: danger
example: 单词 danger 的例句||||It's a danger to peace. 这是对和平的威胁。||||The people are in danger, we must help them off. 人们处境危险，我们必须帮助他们离开。

name: earth
example: 单词 earth 的例句||||The Earth moves round the Sun. 地球绕着太阳转。||||Spring returns to the Earth. 大地回春。

name: snowball
interpret: n.雪球；v.打雪仗；滚雪球般增大
example: 单词 snowball 的例句||||All this publicity has had a snowball effect on the sales of their latest album.所有这些宣传对他们最新唱片的销售产生了一种滚雪球效应。||||Tom turned the other cheek when he was hit with a snowball.汤姆被人用雪球击中时，竟还准备再挨一下。

name: heat
interpret: n.热，热度，高潮；vi.加热；激昂；发热；vt.把…加热；使激动
example: 单词 heat 的例句||||I can not stand great heat. 我受不住高温。||||He hit his son in the heat of the moment. 盛怒中他打了儿子。

name: pack
interpret: vi./vt.捆扎；包装；打行李；n.小包；包裹
example: 单词 pack 的例句||||Did you pack your baggage by yourself? 你的行李是你自己打包的吗？||||I bought a pack of salt. 我买了一包盐。

name: yet
example: 单词 yet 的例句||||I am not ready yet. 我还没有准备好。||||Beautiful as she is, she hasn't got a boyfriend yet. 尽管她很漂亮，但还没找到男朋友呢。

name: alive
example: 单词 alive 的例句||||Was the lion alive or dead? 这只狮子是死或活？||||He is still alive. 他仍然活着。

name: burn
example: 单词 burn 的例句||||What makes the fire burn? 是什么使火燃烧？||||Don't let the fire burn down. 别让火熄灭。

name: able
interpret: adj.能...的，有才能的，能干的，能够的
example: 单词 able 的例句||||How good and able he is! 瞧他多能干啊！||||He is able to do this job well. 他有能力做好这件工作。

name: countryside
example: 单词 countryside 的例句||||He's just come from the countryside. 他刚从乡下来。||||He's going to work in the countryside. 他将要到农村去工作。

name: businessman
example:
单词 businessman 的例句||||He is a  businessman.他是一名企业家。
||||Jenny was married to a businessman. 珍妮嫁给了一位商人。

name: closed
example: 单词 closed 的例句||||He closed his eyes. 他闭上了眼睛。||||He was out of work when the factory closed. 他在工厂倒闭后失业了。

name: service
interpret: n.服务，公务部门，服役；vt.维护，保养
example: 单词 service 的例句||||The service in this hotel goes from bad to worse. 这个旅店的服务每况愈下。||||If I can help you,I am at your service. 要是我能帮忙的话，我愿为你效劳。

name: general
interpret: n.一般，将军，大体；adj. 一般的，普遍的；v.指挥，作...将军
example: 单词 general 的例句||||The general had a severe manner. 那位将军态度严肃。||||It is general knowledge that he will come tomorrow. 大家都知道他明天来。

name: sale
example: 单词 sale 的例句||||The book will be on sale next month. 这本书将于下个月上市。||||I got this hat on sale, it was very cheap. 我在大减价时买到这顶帽子，价格很便宜。

name: knowledge
interpret: n.知识，学识，学问；知晓，了解
example: 单词 knowledge 的例句||||He is poor in money, but rich in knowledge. 他贫于金钱，但富于学问。||||It is common knowledge that the earth is round. 地球是圆的是常识。

name: correct
example: 单词 correct 的例句||||She gave a correct answer. 她给了个正确的答案。|||| Choose the correct one from these words. 选择正确的词填空。

name: mend
interpret: n.修补，改进，修补处；vt.修改，改进；vi.改过自新，改进，痊愈
example: 单词 mend 的例句||||She asked how to mend the radio. 她问无线电怎么修。||||Things will mend in time. 事态总有一天会好转。

name: handbag
example: 单词 handbag 的例句||||The girl bought a nice handbag. 这女孩买了一个精致的手提包。||||Why do not you clean out your handbag? 你为何不把你的手提包清理干净呢？

name: drawer
example: 单词 drawer 的例句||||He removed the picture and put it in the drawer. 他把画取下来，放到抽屉里。||||Put it in a desk drawer. 把它放到书桌抽屉里去。

name: whom
example: 单词 whom 的例句||||That is the man whom I met in Beijing last year. 他就是我去年在北京碰见的那个人。||||He married a wife by whom he had two daughters. 他娶了妻子并跟她生了两个女儿。

name: terribly
example: 单词 terribly 的例句||||It's terribly hot here. 这里热得厉害。||||After her husband's death she felt terribly alone. 丈夫死后，她感到非常地孤独。

name: furniture
example: 单词 furniture 的例句||||This set of the furniture is very good. 这套家具非常好。||||The room was full of wooden furniture. 房间里摆满了木制家具。

name: captain
interpret: n.队长；首领；船长，舰长；（军）上校
example: 单词 captain 的例句||||Have you seen our captain? 你看到队长了吗？||||The captain sailed his ship through the narrow channel. 船长驾驶他的船穿过了狭窄的航道。

name: power
interpret: n.电力，动力；能力，力量，权力
example: 单词 power 的例句||||He lost his power of speech. 他失去了说话的能力。||||It is not in my power to do that. 做那事非我力所能及。

name: appear
interpret: vi.出现，出场，出席，露面；似乎，好像，显得
example: 单词 appear 的例句||||The students appear very nervous. 学生们看起来很紧张。||||When night falls, stars appear. 夜晚来到时星星出现。

name: rather
example: 单词 rather 的例句||||I would rather go out tonight, if you don't mind. 如果你不介意的话，我宁愿今晚出去。||||This book is rather too easy for this boy. 这本书对于这个孩子来说太简单。

name: worst
interpret: adj.（bad的最高级）最坏的，最恶劣的，最不利的；n.最坏，最坏的时候；adv.最坏，最糟
example: 单词 worst 的例句||||She is the worst singer I know. 她是我所知道的最糟糕的歌手。||||The storm is at its worst. 正是暴风雨最猛烈的时候。

name: receive
interpret: vt. 收到；接待；接纳 vi. 接收
example: 单词 receive 的例句||||He went to the door to receive his visitors. 他到门口去迎接客人。||||I like to receive presents on my birthday. 我喜欢在生日那天收到生日礼物。

name: least
interpret: adj.最小(少)的；adv.最少(小；不)；n.最小(少)
example: 单词 least 的例句||||He spends at least a part of his time in reading. 他至少有一部分空闲时间看书。||||The trip will take ten days,at least. 这趟旅行顶少得10天时间。

name: earn
example: 单词 earn 的例句||||Nowadays it is very easy to earn a living. 现今谋生很容易。||||I expect it to earn its cost in less than three years. 我希望它在3年内赚回成本。

name: politely
interpret: adv.客气地，斯文地，殷勤地，优雅地，委婉地
example: 单词 politely 的例句||||He has a politely diffident manner. 他的态度是客气中带有羞怯。||||He cannot refuse if you ask politely. 如果你客气一点的话,他是不会拒绝的。

name: experience
example: 单词 experience 的例句||||The best way to learn is to learn by experience. 学习的最佳办法就是从经验中学习。||||He is a man of wide knowledge and experience. 他见多识广。

name: offer
interpret: n.出价，提议；vt.提供，出价；贡献，奉献；vi.提议；出现；求婚
example: 单词 offer 的例句||||She chose to accept his offer. 她决定接受他的提议。||||It was friendly of him to offer his help. 他提供帮助真是太好了。

name: envelope
example: 单词 envelope 的例句||||Don't forget to stick a stamp on the envelope. 不要忘记在信封上贴邮票。||||I folded the letter and then put it into the envelope. 我把信折好后放进信封里。

name: safely
interpret: adv.安全地，平安地；确切地，没错地
example: 单词 safely 的例句||||The children can play safely in the garden. 孩子们可以在花园里玩耍，很安全。||||The ship came safely to land. 船平安靠岸。

name: exchange
interpret: n.交换，汇兑，交易所；v.交换，交易，兑换
example: 单词 exchange 的例句||||You two boys exchange places. 你们两个孩子交换一下位置。||||He likes to exchange ideas with others. 他喜欢与别人交流思想。

name: useful
example: 单词 useful 的例句||||The horse is a useful animal. 马是有用的动物。|||| He's a useful member of the team. 他是该队的一名强手。

name: local
interpret: adj.地方性的，当地的，局部的；乡土的；本地的；n.当地居民，本地新闻
example: 单词 local 的例句||||She is a local girl. 她是个本地姑娘。||||He reports for a local newspaper. 他担任一家地方报纸的记者。

name: ping-pong
example: 单词 ping-pong 的例句||||The two children are playing ping-pong. 这两个孩子在打乒乓球。||||How many years have you been playing ping-pong? 你打乒乓球多少年了？

name: seem
example: 单词 seem 的例句||||You seem very much alive today. 你今天好像非常活跃。||||The children seem very happy. 孩子们似乎很快活。

name: include
interpret: vt.包括，包含，连...在内；（计算机）包括
example: 单词 include 的例句||||Does the price include lunch? 这个价格包括午餐吗？||||Please include me in your group. 请把我算在你们组内。

name: storm
interpret: n.暴风雨；vi.起风暴，强攻；vt.猛攻，捣毁
example: 单词 storm 的例句||||The storm lasted three days. 暴风雨持续了三天。|||| This is the place where the storm hit. 这就是暴风雨袭击的地方。

name: sneeze
example: 单词 sneeze 的例句||||When you have a cold, you sneeze a lot. 感冒时，要打很多喷嚏。||||It is impossible to sneeze with your eyes open. 眼睛睁开的时候是不可能打喷嚏的。

name: beat
example: 单词 beat 的例句||||You can fight him, but can you beat him? 你可以打他，但是你能击败他吗？||||The dry grass caught fire, but we beat it out. 干草着火了，但我们将它扑灭了。

name: material
interpret: n.材料，原料；物质；素材，题材，资料；adj.物质的，实体的
example: 单词 material 的例句||||She made the material into a dress. 她将衣料制成一件衣服。||||He is going to get material for a new book. 他为了写一本新书而在收集素材。

name: mile
example: 单词 mile 的例句||||It's no more than one mile to the shops. 到商业区不过一英里。||||The hospital is about a mile past the school. 医院在离学校一英里以外的地方。

name: possible
example: 单词 possible 的例句||||It is possible to go to the moon now. 现在有可能登上月球。||||They got the work over as quickly as possible. 他们尽快地结束了工作。

name: officer
example: 单词 officer 的例句||||His father is a police officer. 他父亲是警官。|||| Behind him an officer stood in the doorway. 在他的背后，一个军官已站在门口。

name: provide
interpret: vi.供给，提供；vt.提供；规定；准备
example: 单词 provide 的例句||||He had to provide for five children. 他要供养五个孩子。||||They would not provide any details. 他们不愿提供任何细节。

name: besides
interpret: adv.此外；并且；prep.于…之外；除…以外
example: 单词 besides 的例句||||He had other people to take care of besides me. 除了我以外，他还需要照料其他人。||||Besides English, he has to study German and French. 除英语外，他还要学德语和法语。

name: impossible
interpret: adj.不可能的，不容易的，令人无法忍受的
example: 单词 impossible 的例句||||I mean that it is impossible. 我的意思是说那不可能。||||It is kind of fun to do the impossible. 去做不可能的事是一种乐趣。

name: real
interpret: adj.真实的；非虚构的；真正的；非常的
example: 单词 real 的例句||||You know her real name? 你知道她的真正名字？||||The real world does not look that way! 现实世界不是这样的！

name: coin
interpret: n.硬币，货币；v.铸造(硬币)，创造(新词)
example: 单词 coin 的例句||||Paper money is easier to carry than coin. 纸币比硬币携带方便。||||How much is your coin collection worth? 您的钱币收藏是值得多少？

name: foreign
interpret: adj.外国的；在外国的；来自外国的
example: 单词 foreign 的例句||||Are you interested in foreign languages? 你对外语感兴趣吗？|||| Welcome our foreign friends. 欢迎我们的外国朋友。

name: none
interpret: adv.一点也不；prep.没人，毫无；pron.没有人，没有任何东西
example: 单词 none 的例句||||Remember that none is perfect. 记住没有任何人是完美的。||||There's almost none left. 几乎一个没剩。

name: afford
interpret: vt.提供，负担得起的(后果，损失等)，给予
example: 单词 afford 的例句||||At last they could afford a house. 他们终于买得起房子了。||||I'll afford you a chance. 我将给你提供一个机会。

name: hardly
interpret: adv.几乎没有，刚刚，几乎不，勉强是
example: 单词 hardly 的例句||||I could hardly believe my eyes. 我简直不相信自己的眼睛。||||The hens hardly laid any eggs in summer. 母鸡夏天几乎不下蛋。

name: distance
example: 单词 distance 的例句||||A very small distance or space. 非常小的距离或空间。||||It depends on traffic and distance. 这要看交通和路程的远近。

name: desert
example: 单词 desert 的例句||||Half of the land is desert. 一半的土地是沙漠。|||| Why do you desert me now? 为什么你现在要抛弃我？

name: nobody
example: 单词 nobody 的例句||||Nobody is in the house. 没有人在房子里。||||Nobody knows where she lives. 没有人知道她住哪里。

name: Ha!
example: 单词 Ha! 的例句||||Ha, ha, I'm your husband now! 哈，哈，现在我是你的丈夫了！||||Steve,your face is full of paint. Ha! Ha! Ha! 史蒂夫，你的脸上都是油漆. 哈！哈！哈！

name: abroad
interpret: adj.在国外，海外(一般作表语)；adv.到国外，在国外
example: 单词 abroad 的例句||||I just got back from abroad. 我刚从国外回来。||||He goes abroad every year. 他每年都到国外去。

name: hope
interpret: vt.希望，期望；vi.希望，期待；n.希望，期望
example: 单词 hope 的例句||||We hope you can come. 我们希望你能来。||||Hope you'll enjoy yourself there. 愿您度过愉快的一天。

name: amount
example: 单词 amount 的例句||||What is the amount of this? 这总共是多少？|||| You'll have any amount of time after your exam. 考试过后，你们会有很多的时间。

name: praise
interpret: n.赞美，称赞，崇拜；v.称赞，归荣誉于，赞美
example: 单词 praise 的例句||||Let us give praise to God. 让我们来赞美上帝吧。|||| The teacher spoke in praise of the child for his honesty. 他很诚实，老师表扬了他。

name: allow
example: 单词 allow 的例句||||Will your father allow us to use his telephone? 你父亲肯让我们使用他的电话吗？||||The river is too deep to allow of swimming. 河太深，不能游泳。

name: die
example: 单词 die 的例句||||Flowers will die without water. 没有水，花就会枯死。||||We shall die some day. 我们总有一天要弃世而去。

name: certain
interpret: adj.一定的；pron.某几个，某些；肯定的，无疑的，必然发生的
example: 单词 certain 的例句||||She is certain to come. 她一定会来的。||||It's not at all certain whether I'll come tomorrow. 我明天还不定来不来呢。

name: dessert
example: 单词 dessert 的例句||||What would you take for dessert? 你想要点什么甜点？||||That sounds like a dessert. 听起来像是餐后甜点。

name: press
example: 单词 press 的例句||||Press‘shift’ and type‘ C ’. 按切换键然后打字母‘C’ 。||||Let's press on with our work. 咱们继续工作。

name: simple
interpret: adj.简单的，易懂的，单纯的，纯朴的
example: 单词 simple 的例句||||He wrote a story in simple English. 他用简单的英语写了一则故事。||||He was as simple as a child. 他像孩子一样天真。

name: saw
interpret: vbl.看见(see的过去式)；n.锯；v.用锯子锯
example: 单词 saw 的例句||||Would you like to saw a tree for me? 你能为我锯棵树吗？||||The moment I saw you, I knew you were angry with me. 我一看到你，就知道你在生我的气。

name: took
example: 单词 took 的例句||||I took my dog for a walk along the river. 我带着狗沿那条河散步。||||It took me about two hours to cook the meat. 我花了大约两个小时来煮这些肉。

name: traditional
example: 单词 traditional 的例句||||I prefer traditional Chinese music. 我更喜欢传统的中国音乐。||||My mother is a traditional woman. 我母亲是位传统的女人。

name: true
interpret: a.真实，不假的；忠实，可靠的；正确无误的
example: 单词 true 的例句||||He who doesn't reach the Great Wall is not a true man. 不到长城非好汉。||||I will come and see if it is true. 我要来了解一下，是否真有其事。

name: won
example: 单词 won 的例句||||We won the game in the end. 我们最终赢得了比赛。|||| We won the football game. 我们赢得了足球赛的胜利。

name: diary
example: 单词 diary 的例句||||She wrote down my telephone number in her diary. 她把我的电话号码记在她的日记本里。||||She keeps a diary in English. 她用英语记日记。

name: forgot
interpret: v.动词forget的过去式，忘记，遗漏，轻忽
example: 单词 forgot 的例句||||The boy forgot where he put his textbook. 那男孩忘记把课本放在什么地方了。|||| I forgot how to do it. 我忘记怎样做了。

name: hamster
interpret: n.东欧或亚洲产的大颊的鼠类仓鼠
example: 单词 hamster 的例句||||Do you have a hamster? 你有一只仓鼠吗？||||Jason takes his hamster to Victor's house. 杰森带着他的仓鼠到维特家中。

name: going
interpret: n.去，离去，地面(或道路)的状况，工作情况；(复数形式）goings: 行为；adj.进行中的，流行的，现存的
example: 单词 going 的例句||||We're going to listen to a report this afternoon. 今天下午我们要去听报告。||||He hates leaving the office and going on holiday. 他不愿离开办公室去度假。

name: inside
interpret: n.内部，内脏，内幕；adj.内部的，秘密的，户内的；prep.在...之内
example: 单词 inside 的例句||||Two minutes later we were inside the taxi. 两分钟以后我们已经坐在出租车里面了。||||He will be back inside two days. 他将在两天内回来。

name: hug
example: 单词 hug 的例句||||She gave her son a hug and put him to bed. 她拥抱了一下儿子，然后让他上床睡觉。||||The little girl gave her mother a big hug. 小女孩紧搂着妈妈。

name: kitten
example: 单词 kitten 的例句||||The kitten plays with its tail. 那只小猫在玩自己的尾巴。||||I picked up the shaking kitten. 我捡起了那只颤抖着的小猫。

name: order
interpret: n.订单；命令；n.顺序，整齐；勋章；阶级，决议；vt.命令； 调整；定购
example: 单词 order 的例句||||His desk is always in order. 他的书桌上总是整整齐齐的。||||You pay for it at the time you order it. 订购时就得付款。

name: raise
interpret: vt. 提高；筹集；养育；升起 vi. 上升
example: 单词 raise 的例句||||Why didn't you raise the question at the meeting? 这问题你怎么没有在会上提出来？||||He went to ask for a raise. 他要求增加工资。

name: refrigerator
example: 单词 refrigerator 的例句||||We keep food in a refrigerator. 我们把食物存放在冰箱里。||||There's a very nice refrigerator in the kitchen. 厨房里有个相当不错的冰箱。

name: scared
example: 单词 scared 的例句||||I'm scared to fly in an airplane. 我怕坐飞机。|||| Honey, I'm scared to death. 亲爱的我害怕得要命。

name: sour
interpret: adj. 酸的；酸腐的；刻薄的；vt./vi. 变酸；发坏；发酵
example: 单词 sour 的例句||||Those lemons are very sour. 那些柠檬很酸。||||This milk has gone sour. 这牛奶已经变酸了。

name: suitcase
example: 单词 suitcase 的例句||||I bought a light suitcase. 我买了一只轻便手提箱。||||Your suitcase is five kilograms overweight. 你的衣箱超重五公斤。

name: leaves
interpret: n.树叶，花瓣； leaf 的复数； leave 的单数第三人称现在式
example: 单词 leaves 的例句||||The walk was covered with leaves. 这人行道上满是树叶。||||Will you check on the time the train leaves? 请你核对一下火车开出的时间好吗？

name: possibly
example: 单词 possibly 的例句||||It was possibly their worst performance ever.这也许是他们迄今为止最糟糕的表现。||||Nothing can possibly excuse him for such rude behavior.他这样粗鲁的行为，无论怎样都不能原谅。

name: improve
interpret: vt. 改善，增进；提高…的价值 vi. 增加；变得更好
example: 单词 improve 的例句||||You need to improve your diet. 你应该改善你的饮食。||||I hope the weather will improve. 我希望天气会变好。

name: peaceful
example: 单词 peaceful 的例句||||How peaceful it is in the country now! 现在乡下多么平静啊！||||Evening in the country is a very peaceful time. 乡村里的傍晚是平静安谧的时刻。

name: accept
interpret: vt.接受，领受；认可，同意；vi.同意，认可
example: 单词 accept 的例句||||Please accept me as a friend. 请把我当作朋友。|||| Please accept it as a present. 请把它作为一件礼物收下。

name: interest
example: 单词 interest 的例句||||She lost interest in him. 她对他失去兴趣。|||| He developed an interest in science. 他养成了对科学的兴趣。

name: view
interpret: n.风景；视野，观点，见解；vt.观看，注视；考虑
example: 单词 view 的例句||||I disagree with this view. 我不同意这个看法。|||| I'll sit here and look at the view. 我要坐在这里观看景色。

name: government
interpret: n.政府，当局，行政管理机构
example: 单词 government 的例句||||Tom works for the government. 汤姆为政府机关做事。||||The new government will come into power next month. 新政府将在下月开始执政。

name: cause
example: 单词 cause 的例句||||Bad teeth often cause pain. 坏牙常引起疼痛。|||| Unhappiness is the root cause of his illness. 不开心是他生病的根源。

name: Boston
interpret: n.波士顿(美国马萨堵塞州首府)
example: 单词 Boston 的例句||||How many miles to Boston? 去波士顿有多少英里？|||| Could you pick me up at Boston hotel? 你能在波士顿酒店接我吗？

name: worth
interpret: adj.值钱；值得，具有..价值；n.价值，作用
example: 单词 worth 的例句||||The book was old and it was not worth a cent. 这本书旧了，一文不值。||||This novel is worth reading. 这部小说值得一读。

name: suppose
interpret: vt. 假设；认为；让（虚拟语气）；推想 vi. 猜想；料想
example: 单词 suppose 的例句||||I suppose he will be back by eight o'clock. 我想他八点钟以前会回来。||||Suppose he can't come, who will do the work? 如果他不能前来，谁来做这项工作呢？

name: Hawaii
example: 单词 Hawaii 的例句||||I met her in Hawaii. 我在夏威夷认识了她。||||He is on vacation in Hawaii. 他去夏威夷度假了。

name: speed
example: 单词 speed 的例句||||The car was running at high speed. 汽车急速地向前行驶。||||We'll never get there if he doesn't speed up. 如果他不快些走，我们一定到不了那里。

name: human
interpret: n.人，人类；adj.人类的，人性的，有同情心的
example: 单词 human 的例句||||Human beings can talk, but animals can't. 人会说话，而动物却不会。||||Kehr is a very human person. 凯尔是一个极富人情味的人。

name: display
example: 单词 display 的例句||||A new kind of car was on display in the shop. 商店里展出一种新汽车。||||It is no use making a display of your knowledge. 卖弄你的知识是没有用的。

name: opinion
interpret: n.看法，意见；v.判断，意见，主张
example: 单词 opinion 的例句||||My opinion is on the whole the same as yours. 我的意见大体上同你的差不多。||||I quite agree to your opinion. 我很赞成你的看法。

name: explain
interpret: vt.解释，说明；vi. 解释，说明，辩解
example: 单词 explain 的例句||||She knows how to explain it. 她知道怎么解释它。|||| Could you explain that again? 您能再解释一遍吗？

name: king
example: 单词 king 的例句||||He was a good king! 他是个好国王！||||The lion is the king of animals. 狮子是百兽之王。

name: central
interpret: adj.中心的，位于中心的；中央的；主要的，最重要的
example: 单词 central 的例句||||This is the central city of the whole area. 这是整个地区的中心城市。||||The central figure in the painting is the artist's daughter. 画中间的那个人是画家的女儿。

name: several
interpret: adj.几个，若干，数个；各个的，各自的
example: 单词 several 的例句||||Words often have several meanings. 单词往往有若干个意思。||||Several new members have come into the club since last year. 自去年以来，又有些新成员加入了俱乐部。

name: business
interpret: n.商业， 买卖， 交易， 生意， 事情， 事物， 营业， 商行
example: 单词 business 的例句||||My father built his business on years of hard work. 我父亲多年奋斗创立了自己的事业。|||| We must finish up this business in a day or two. 我们必须在一两天内把这事结束。

name: swimmer
example: 单词 swimmer 的例句||||He is not a good swimmer. 他不是一个棒游泳者。|||| Bill is both a good swimmer and a good cook. 比尔不仅是个游泳好手，而且是个烹调能手。

name: dresser
example: 单词 dresser 的例句||||Her key is on the dresser. 她的钥匙在梳妆台上。|||| The dresser is beside the bed. 梳妆台在床的旁边。

name: conversation
example: 单词 conversation 的例句||||Conversation is one pleasure of life. 交谈是人生一大乐趣。||||We'll carry on a conversation with her tomorrow. 我们将于明天与她会谈。

name: found
interpret: v.建立，创立，创办；vbl.(find的过去分词)找到
example: 单词 found 的例句||||I found him at home. 我发现他在家。||||The United Nations was found in 1945. 联合国于1945年成立。

name: relaxing
example: 单词 relaxing 的例句||||My vacation was very relaxing. 我的假期过得很放松。||||Travelling by train is more relaxing than driving. 乘火车旅行比开汽车轻松得多。

name: biology
example: 单词 biology 的例句||||Biology is the study of living things. 生物学是对生物的研究。||||She has a degree in biology. 她具有生物学的学位。

name: beginning
example: 单词 beginning 的例句||||This is only the beginning. 这仅仅是开始。|||| Children should form good habits from the very beginning. 孩子们从一开始就应养成良好的习惯。

name: bingo
example: 单词 bingo 的例句||||His father forbid him entering into a bingo hall. 他父亲禁止他去宾戈游戏厅。||||The local cinema has been made into a bingo hall. 当地的电影院已改建成宾戈游戏厅了。

name: eleventh
example: 单词 eleventh 的例句||||We were working on the eleventh floor. 我们在11层办公。||||I am planning to leave on eleventh. 我计划十一号离开。

name: eighteenth
example: 单词 eighteenth 的例句||||I will meet you on the eighteenth next month. 我下月十八号和你见面。||||We had a birthday party on my eighteenth birthday. 在我18岁生日时，我们举办了一个生日晚会。

name: dislike
example: 单词 dislike 的例句||||We dislike those who talk big and do nothing. 我们不喜欢那种夸夸其谈，不干实事的人。||||I dislike man of that type. 我不喜欢那一类型的人。

name: fifteenth
example: 单词 fifteenth 的例句||||Today is March the fifteenth. 今天三月十五号。|||| Our office is on the fifteenth floor. 我们的办公室在十五楼。

name: fourteenth
example: 单词 fourteenth 的例句||||This is her fourteenth birthday. 这是她的第十四个生日。||||It's Friday, the fourteenth of May. 今天是5月14日星期五。

name: describe
example: 单词 describe 的例句||||Can you describe your son? 你能描述一下你儿子吗？ ||||It is very difficult to describe my joy in words. 我的快乐难以用语言来形容。

name: following
interpret: n.下列各项，部下，党羽；aaj.下列的，其次的；vbl.跟随
example: 单词 following 的例句||||The following is the full text. 全文如下。|||| Answer the following questions. 回答下列问题。

name: neighborhood
example: 单词 neighborhood 的例句||||I love the neighborhood here. 我喜欢这儿的周围邻里。||||He lives somewhere in the neighborhood of the station. 他住在火车站附近的某个地方。

name: partner
interpret: n.合作者，搭档；v.同...合作，做...的搭档
example: 单词 partner 的例句||||I have to meet my partner every Friday. 每周五我必须和我的合伙人碰头。||||Are you sure you want him as your partner for life? 你决定要他做你的终生伴侣吗？

name: sixteenth
example: 单词 sixteenth 的例句||||She lived on the sixteenth floor. 她住在十六层楼上。||||Nala is her sixteenth children. 娜拉是她的第十六个小孩。

name: seventeenth
example: 单词 seventeenth 的例句||||It was Mary's seventeenth birthday. 那是玛丽的十七岁生日。||||It happened on January the seventeenth. 事情发生在1月17日。

name: relax
example: 单词 relax 的例句||||Relax when you dance. 跳舞时要放松。|||| Keep at it, don't relax! 继续努力，不要泄劲！

name: reply
example: 单词 reply 的例句||||He did not reply to her question right away. 他没有马上回答她的问题。||||We wait on your reply to our letter. 我们等着你们的回信。

name: unless
example: 单词 unless 的例句||||You will fail unless you work hard. 如果你不积极工作，就会失败。||||Don't ask me to explain unless you really don't understand. 不要叫我解释，除非你真的不懂。

name: especially
interpret: adv.特别，尤其，格外；专门地，主要地
example: 单词 especially 的例句||||I like to swim, especially in the sea. 我喜欢游泳，尤其喜欢在大海中游泳。||||I am especially interested in math problems. 我对数学问题特别感兴趣。

name: fill
interpret: vt.填充，弥漫，供给，满足，供应；vi. 充满，装满；n.满足，装满，充分，填方
example: 单词 fill 的例句||||Fill the tank with water. 把水槽灌满水。||||Many people find it difficult to fill in a form. 许多人发现表格填写困难。

name: wine
interpret: n.酒，葡萄酒，紫红色；vt./vi.喝酒，请喝酒
example: 单词 wine 的例句||||After drinking some wine, I feel warm all over. 喝酒以后周身发热。||||The wine bottle is empty. 酒瓶空了。

name: advantage
interpret: n.长处，好处，优点，优势，利益，有利条件
example: 单词 advantage 的例句||||It is of great advantage to me. 它对我大有益处。|||| You have the advantage of me in experience. 在经验方面，你胜过我。

name: support
interpret: n.支持，援助，供养；vt.支援，帮助，支持
example: 单词 support 的例句||||You may depend on their support. 你可依靠他们的支持。||||He is the only support that his poor old mother has. 他是他可怜的老母亲的唯一赡养者。

name: instruction
example: 单词 instruction 的例句||||You'll get nowhere if you follow his instruction. 要是你按他的方法去做，将会一事无成。||||They'll radio for instruction. 他们要通过无线电去请示。

name: result
interpret: n.结果，成绩，答案；v.产生，起于，致使
example: 单词 result 的例句||||As a result, he had to leave. 结果他只得离开。||||He was disappointed at the result. 他对这样的结果感到失望。

name: experiment
interpret: n.实验，试验，尝试；v.实验，尝试
example: 单词 experiment 的例句||||We decided to begin the experiment in the evening. 我们决定晚上开始那个实验。||||Why did he do that experiment once again? 为什么他再次做那个实验？

name: fact
example: 单词 fact 的例句||||It is close to fact. 这更接近于事实。||||I'm going there tomorrow, as a matter of fact. 其实，我明天是准备去那里。

name: upset
interpret: adj.烦乱的，不高兴；v.颠覆，推翻；扰乱，使心烦意乱，使不舒服
example: 单词 upset 的例句||||She upset our plan. 她打乱了我们的计划。||||He was very upset. 他非常心烦。

name: lead
example: 单词 lead 的例句||||She is a lead singer in a pop group. 她是流行歌曲演唱团体的最重要的歌手。||||Excuse me, does this road lead to the railway station? 请问，这条路通向火车站吗？

name: article
example: 单词 article 的例句||||The article is very important. 这篇文章很重要。|||| Can you translate this article for me? 你能替我翻译这篇文章吗？

name: wooden
interpret: adj.木制的；木头似的，呆笨的
example: 单词 wooden 的例句||||The room was full of wooden furniture. 房间里摆满了木制家具。||||There's a wooden bridge over the river. 河上有一座木桥。

name: Egyptian
interpret: adj.埃及的；埃及人的；埃及语的；n. 埃及人
example: 单词 Egyptian 的例句||||He is an egyptian. 他是个埃及人。||||The ancient Egyptian civilization is one of the oldest in the world. 古埃及文化是世界上最古老的文化之一。

name: perform
example: 单词 perform 的例句||||He is going to perform magic at the party. 他将在晚会上表演魔术。||||He can perform the task. 他能够完成这项任务。

name: complete
interpret: adj.彻底的，完整的，已完成的；v.完成，使完整
example: 单词 complete 的例句||||They help him complete his work. 他们帮助他完成工作。||||Please complete the following information. 请您完整填写以下信息。

name: uncomfortable
interpret: adj.不舒服的，不合意的，不安的
example: 单词 uncomfortable 的例句||||He looked shy and uncomfortable. 他看起来羞怯又不自在。||||It makes me feel uncomfortable. 弄得我浑身不自在。

name: probably
example: 单词 probably 的例句||||Next year I shall probably be looking for a job. 明年我很可能找份工作。||||We're going on holiday soon, probably next month. 我们很快要去度假了，可能是下个月。

name: speech
example: 单词 speech 的例句||||I did not lose a word of his speech. 他的演说我没有听漏一个字。||||We were listening to the Prime Minister's speech. 我们正在收音机旁听首相的广播演说。

name: successful
interpret: adj.成功的，一帆风顺的，飞黄腾达的
example: 单词 successful 的例句||||He was successful in his studies. 他在学业上很成功。||||Thanks to your help, we were successful. 由于你的帮助，我们得以成功。

name: thirteenth
example: 单词 thirteenth 的例句||||Let's study the thirteenth lesson. 让我们学习第十三课。||||This is the thirteenth book I bought last year. 这是我去年买的第十三本书。

name: thirtieth
example: 单词 thirtieth 的例句||||A day is about one thirtieth of a month. 一天大约是一个月的三十分之一。||||I'd like to go to Shanghai on December thirtieth. 我12月30号想要去上海。

name: survey
example: 单词 survey 的例句||||Survey the car before you buy it. 买车之前先对它鉴定一下。||||His report is more than a survey. 他的报告不只是一份调查。

name: garbage
example: 单词 garbage 的例句||||Garbage pollutes our rivers and streams. 垃圾使大小河流遭受污染。||||Have you taken the garbage out yet? 你把垃圾扔掉了吗？

name: mad
interpret: adj.疯狂的，发疯的，生气的，愚蠢的，狂欢的；n.狂怒
example: 单词 mad 的例句||||Don't fight with him, he is a mad man. 别跟他打架, 他是疯子。||||Mother gets mad with me for coming home late. 妈妈为我回家迟了而发火。

name: trash
example: 单词 trash 的例句||||Put out the trash. 把垃圾拿出去。||||Don't forget to throw away your trash. 不要忘记把垃圾丢掉。

name: training
example: 单词 training 的例句||||She is training for the school sports meet. 她在为参加学校运动会进行锻炼。||||I haven't had any real training. 我没有受过什么真正的训练。

name: illness
example: 单词 illness 的例句||||I am sorry to hear of your serious illness. 得知你重病，我很难过。||||His illness has turned better. 他的病有了好转。

name: nor
example: 单词 nor 的例句||||It is neither hot nor cold in winter here. 这里冬天既不热也不冷。||||She can't get there at four, nor can I. 她不能在四点钟到那里，我也不能。

name: lively
interpret: adj.充满活力的；活泼的；充满趣味的；adv.轻快地，富有活力地；轻快地跳起
example: 单词 lively 的例句||||The lesson is very lively. 这节课很生动。|||| He may be eighty, but he is still lively. 他可能已有80岁，但是仍然充满朝气。

name: influence
interpret: vt.影响，感化；n.影响力，感化力，势力，权势
example: 单词 influence 的例句||||He is a man of great influence in this town. 他在这个镇上是很有权势的人。||||He has a strange influence over the girl. 他对这女孩有出奇的影响力。

name: main
example: 单词 main 的例句||||The building is the main object of his interest. 他最感兴趣的是这栋建筑物。||||This is the main purpose of my coming here. 这就是我到这儿来的主要目的。

name: natural
interpret: adj.自然的，正常的，天生的；n.有天赋的人
example: 单词 natural 的例句||||He is a natural dancer. 他是天生的舞蹈家。||||Try to look natural for your photograph. 拍照时要自然一点。

name: medical
example: 单词 medical 的例句||||But in Paris he dropped his medical studies. 但是在巴黎，他放弃了学医。||||I had a medical checkup before going abroad. 我在出国前作了一次体格检查。

name: northern
example: 单词 northern 的例句||||The park is in the northern part of the city. 公园位于该城市的北部。||||That's a large city in northern Greece. 那是希腊北部的一个大城市。

name: package
interpret: n.包裹，整批交易；vt.把...打包，把...进行推销
example: 单词 package 的例句||||He brought me a large package. 他给我送来一个大包裹。||||He mailed the package to me. 他给我邮寄了一个包裹。

name: screen
interpret: n.屏，幕，银幕；屏风；v.选拔；掩蔽，遮蔽
example: 单词 screen 的例句||||You can see him on the TV screen quite often. 你可以经常从电视屏幕上见到他。||||She first appeared on the screen ten years ago. 十年前，她第一次出现在银幕上。

name: retell
example: 单词 retell 的例句||||Retell the story in English. 把这个故事用英语复述一遍。||||Can you retell the story? 你能复述这个故事吗？

name: review
interpret: n.检讨，复习，回顾，评审；v.温习，检讨，评论
example: 单词 review 的例句||||The newspaper gave a review of the new book. 报纸对这本新书作了评论。||||The college published a drama review. 学院出版了一份戏剧评论刊物。

name: text
interpret: n.本文，文件，正文，课文；vt./vi.发短信
example: 单词 text 的例句||||You will find the text anywhere in the Bible. 你可在《圣经》某处找到这段经文。||||The teacher asked the students to copy out the text. 老师让同学们抄写课文。

name: usual
example: 单词 usual 的例句||||I got up at six that morning as usual. 像往常一样那天早上我六点起床。||||It's usual to have a holiday in summer. 夏天休假是惯例。

name: yourselves
example: 单词 yourselves 的例句||||I hope you'll enjoy yourselves. 我希望你们能玩得高兴。||||Did you make these cakes yourselves? 这些蛋糕是你们亲手做的吗？

name: whatever
interpret: adj.不管怎样的；adv.无论如何，不管怎样；pron.无论什么
example: 单词 whatever 的例句||||Whatever you do, try your best. 无论你做什么，都要尽力而为。|||| Whatever you say, facts are facts. 任凭你怎么说，事实总是事实。

name: whenever
interpret: adv.无论何时；conj.每当，无论何时，随时
example: 单词 whenever 的例句||||I'll go there whenever I have time. 我过会儿有空就去。||||Whenever we meet him we speak to him. 每次我们见到他，我们都和他讲话。

name: whether
interpret: conj.是否…，是不是…；是否…，是不是…
example: 单词 whether 的例句||||I cannot say whether it was Saturday or Sunday. 我无法肯定那天是星期六还是星期天。||||I don't care whether it rains, I am happy. 我才不在乎下不下雨呢，我快活着呢。

name: pride
interpret: n.骄傲，自豪；引以自豪的东西；vt.以…自豪
example: 单词 pride 的例句||||Their son is their pride and joy. 儿子是他们的快乐和骄傲。||||I didn't hurt your pride on purpose. 我不是故意伤害你的自尊心。

name: pity
interpret: n.遗憾，同情，可惜；v.同情，怜悯
example: 单词 pity 的例句||||I pity him from the bottom of my heart. 我从心里怜悯他。||||It was a pity that the weather was so bad. 天气这样恶劣，真遗憾。

name: produce
interpret: n.产品，农作物；vt.生产，提出，引起，分娩，制片；vi.生产，制造
example: 单词 produce 的例句||||We expect writers to produce more and better works. 我们期望作家们写出更多更好的作品。||||The company markets its new produce. 该公司出售它的新产品。

name: progress
interpret: n.进步，发展，前进；v.促进，进步，进行
example: 单词 progress 的例句||||Study well and make progress every day. 好好学习，天天向上。||||He is very pleased with the progress we are making. 他对我们工作的进展很满意。

name: pronounce
interpret: vt. 发音；宣判；断言 vi. 发音；作出判断
example: 单词 pronounce 的例句||||Please pronounce after me. 请跟我发音。||||How do you pronounce c-l-e-r-k? 你怎么念c-l-e-r-k这词？

name: pronunciation
example: 单词 pronunciation 的例句||||Please correct my pronunciation. 请纠正我的发音。||||She speaks English with a good pronunciation. 她的英语发音很正确。

name: proper
example: 单词 proper 的例句||||It is proper that you should ask your father. 你当然应该问你的父亲。||||To be rude to the old is not proper. 对老人粗鲁是不适当的。

name: prove
interpret: vt. 证明；检验；显示 vi. 证明是
example: 单词 prove 的例句||||This will prove to the world that we are right. 这将向全世界证明我们是对的。||||How can you prove that you are right? 你如何能证明你是正确的呢？

name: public
interpret: adj.公开的，众所周知的，公众的；n.公共场合，公众，同好者
example: 单词 public 的例句||||Most children go to public school. 大多数孩子上的是公立学院。||||She is shy of speaking in public. 她怯于在公众面前讲话。

name: murder
example: 单词 murder 的例句||||There is a law against murder. 有一条针对谋杀的法律。||||He was guilty of murder. 他犯了杀人罪。

name: steal
interpret: vi.偷，偷偷行动，(棒球等)偷垒；vt.偷，走私，偷垒；n.偷东西，诈取，砍价
example: 单词 steal 的例句||||Would you steal from your own family? 你会从自己家里偷东西吗？||||He didn't actually steal the money. 他实际上没偷那笔钱。

name: suggestion
interpret: n.建议，意见；细微的迹象；暗示，联想
example: 单词 suggestion 的例句||||May I make a suggestion? 我可以提个建议吗？|||| Give me time to look your suggestion over. 给我时间仔细考虑一下你的建议。

name: symbol
example: 单词 symbol 的例句||||The dove is a symbol of peace. 鸽子是和平的象征。||||The building is the symbol of eastern building. 这座建筑物是东方建筑的象征。

name: sat
example: 单词 sat 的例句||||He sat on a chair. 他坐在椅子上。||||The mother sat by the sick child all night long. 妈妈整夜守在生病的孩子身旁。

name: got
interpret: v.(get的过去式)得到，猜到，明白
example: 单词 got 的例句||||I just got some bad news. 我刚得到一些坏消息。|||| I have got far too much work to do. 我要做的事太多了。

name: chat
example: 单词 chat 的例句||||They like to chat over tea. 他们喜欢一边喝茶一边聊天。||||They're having a chat. 他们在聊天。

name: programmer
example: 单词 programmer 的例句||||I was a computer programmer for 10 years. 我从事计算机程序设计已经10年了。||||He is now looking for work as a computer programmer. 现在他正在寻找计算机程序设计员的工作。

name: technology
example: 单词 technology 的例句||||There is a series of science and technology books on the desk. 桌子上放着一套科技丛书。||||Many people call the age we live in the age of technology. 许多人把我们所处的时代称为技术时代。

name: firework
example: 单词 firework 的例句||||We went to a firework display yesterday. 我们昨天去看放烟火。||||She likes the firework show on National Day. 她喜欢国庆节的烟火表演。

name: energy
example: 单词 energy 的例句||||He is full of energy. 他充满了活力。||||It took a lot of energy to move the furniture. 搬这些家具费了很大劲。

name: organize
example: 单词 organize 的例句||||He has the ability to organize. 他很有组织才能。|||| I was not trying to organize any group of people. 我并没有试图去组织任何人民团体。

name: colourful
example: 单词 colourful 的例句||||Nature is most colourful in autumn. 秋天，大自然的色彩最为丰富。||||TV programs are becoming more and more colourful now. 电视节目越来越丰富。

name: anyone
example: 单词 anyone 的例句||||Anyone who wants to can join. 愿意的都可以参加。|||| Have you got anyone to speak for you? 你找到人代表你们发言了吗？

name: daytime
example: 单词 daytime 的例句||||You can't see them in the daytime. 在白天，你看不见他们。||||We must finish it in the daytime. 我们必须在白天完成这件事。

name: chance
interpret: n.机会，意外；运气；风险；vi.偶然发生；vt.偶然发生，冒险
example: 单词 chance 的例句||||We will take a chance to have the party outdoor. 我们将冒险举行露天聚会。||||This is the last chance any of us has. 对于我们中的任何人来说，这是最后的一次机会。

name: chairperson
example: 单词 chairperson 的例句||||The present chairperson is a woman. 现任主席是位妇女。||||We made him become our chairperson. 我们推荐他为我们的主席。

name: northwest
interpret: n.西北，西北方；adj.西北的，在西北的，来自西北的；adv. 向西北
example: 单词 northwest 的例句||||He was born in the northwest. 他出生于西北部。|||| The wind is blowing from the northwest. 风从西北方吹来。

name: southwest
interpret: n.西南，西南风，西南地区；adj.西南的，来自西南方的；adv.往西南，来自西南
example: 单词 southwest 的例句||||Spain lies to the southwest of France. 西班牙位于法国西南。||||India is on the southwest of china. 印度在中国西南面。

name: memory
example: 单词 memory 的例句||||He is aged, but his memory is still good. 他已年老， 然而记忆力还好。||||I have a good memory so I learn more quickly than others. 我记忆力很好，因此学起来比别人快一些。

name: good-looking
example: 单词 good-looking 的例句||||He was tall and quite good - looking. 他既高大又英俊。||||She is a good - looking girl. 她是一个漂亮的女孩。

name: guy
example: 单词 guy 的例句||||She lost her heart to the handsome guy. 她爱上了这个帅气的小伙子。||||That guy is very hard to deal with. 那家伙很难对付。

name: outdoor
example: 单词 outdoor 的例句||||It is a fine weather for outdoor sports. 天气很好，有利于户外运动。||||Football and basketball are outdoor games. 足球和篮球都是室外运动。

name: fear
interpret: n.敬畏，害怕，担心，不安的原因；vt.害怕，敬畏
example: 单词 fear 的例句||||He couldn't move for fear. 他害怕得动弹不得。||||He left an hour early for fear of missing his train. 他提前一小时离开以免误了火车。

name: actually
interpret: adv.实际上，事实上，竟然，居然，如今
example: 单词 actually 的例句||||She looks young, but she's actually 50. 她看上去年轻，可是实际上已五十岁了。||||Actually, that's not quite right. 实际上，那不完全对。

name: billion
interpret: num.十亿；数以十亿计；大量；一万亿
example: 单词 billion 的例句||||A billion is a large number. 十亿是个大数目。|||| They've spent nearly a billion dollars on it already. 他们已经在那上面花了近10亿美元。

name: character
interpret: n.（书、剧本、电影等中的）人物，角色；（汉）字，字体；品格
example: 单词 character 的例句||||I am not familiar with his character. 我不了解他的性格。||||These two girls are very much alike in character. 这两个姑娘的性格相仿佛。

name: hard-working
example: 单词 hard-working 的例句||||He's not very clever, but hard-working. 他不大聪明，却很努力。||||My math teacher said I was a hard-working student. 我的数学老师说我是个勤奋的学生。

name: happily
example: 单词 happily 的例句||||From then on, the prince and princess lived happily. 从那时起，王子与公主就幸福地生活在一起。|||| Where we will live happily ever after. 我们可以在那里直到永远。

name: lunchtime
example: 单词 lunchtime 的例句||||We only had a little snack at lunchtime. 我们午饭只吃了一点小吃。||||It was close to lunchtime when the children arrived. 孩子们到家时，已近午饭时间。

name: similar
example: 单词 similar 的例句||||The two boys look very similar. 这两个孩子看上去很相似。||||A cat is similar to a tiger in many respects. 猫和虎在很多方面相似。

name: mid
example: 单词 mid 的例句||||Our mid-term exam is pending. 我们就要期中考试了。||||He switched over to teaching in mid-career. 他在而立之年转入教学工作。

name: easily
example: 单词 easily 的例句||||Money that is easily come by is often easily spent. 钱来得容易往往也花得容易。|||| Let's not take the car, we can easily walk over. 我们不用坐车，走着去很方便。

name: refuse
example: 单词 refuse 的例句||||He refused to comment after the trial.庭审之后他拒绝作出评论。||||The District Council made a weekly collection of refuse.区政务委员会每周收取一次垃圾。

name: anymore
example: 单词 anymore 的例句||||She doesn't live here anymore. 她已不在这里住了。||||He doesn't come here anymore. 他再也不到这儿来。

name: flood
interpret: n.洪水，水灾；v.灌溉，淹没，泛滥
example: 单词 flood 的例句||||The reason for the flood was that heavy rain. 水灾是那场大雨造成的。||||It is said that there has been a big flood. 据说，那里遭受了一场大洪水的袭击。

name: himself
example: 单词 himself 的例句||||He is proud of himself. 他为自己感到自豪。||||He said to his mother that he would do it by himself. 他对他的母亲说他将自己独立做那件事。

name: itself
interpret: pron.(it的反身代词)它自己，它本身
example: 单词 itself 的例句||||The thing itself is not important. 这事情本身并不重要。||||The machine will start by itself in a few seconds. 几秒钟后，机器将自行启动。

name: themselves
interpret: pron.他们自己，她们自己，它们本身；他们亲自；他自己
example: 单词 themselves 的例句||||They finished the work by themselves. 他们自己完成了这项工作。||||The boys didn't know what to do with themselves after school ended. 男孩们不知道放学后该做些什么。

name: tiring
example: 单词 tiring 的例句||||It is very tiring work. 这是很累人的工作。||||I came by air and it was tiring. 我坐飞机来的，很疲劳。

name: safety
interpret: vt.保护；n.安全，保险机，安全打
example: 单词 safety 的例句||||He was worried about the safety of me. 他为我的安全担心。||||This new plane is undergoing safety tests. 这架新型飞机正在接受安全试验。

name: ah
interpret: int. 啊!呀!嗳!哈!(表现痛苦，感叹，惊奇，怜惜，厌弃，欢喜等)
example: 单词 ah 的例句||||Ah!This is a waste of time! 啊，真是浪费时间！||||Ah, I've got it. 哦，我想起来了。

name: amusement
example: 单词 amusement 的例句||||He likes to go to places of amusement. 他喜欢去娱乐场所。||||To our amusement, the boy acted an old woman. 使我们感到好笑的是那男孩扮演了一个老太太。

name: sore
interpret: adj.疼痛的，酸痛的；n.痛处，溃疡，疮
example: 单词 sore 的例句||||I've got a sore place in my back. 我背上有个地方痛。||||His father's throat is a bit sore. 他父亲的喉咙有点痛。

name: achievement
example: 单词 achievement 的例句||||Running ten miles is no mean achievement. 跑十英里是了不起的成绩。||||Such a goal is impossible of achievement. 这样的一个目标是不可能完成的。

name: consider
interpret: vt. 考虑；认为；考虑到；细想 vi. 考虑；认为；细想
example: 单词 consider 的例句||||We should consider what to do next. 我们应考虑下一步该怎么办。||||They consider it better to do it that way. 他们以为那样做比较妥当。

name: cancer
interpret: n.癌症；巨蟹座，巨蟹宫，出生于巨蟹宫时段的人
example: 单词 cancer 的例句||||You think she has cancer. 你认为她得了癌症。|||| People are dying of cancer more and more often. 死于癌症的人越来越多了。

name: deal
interpret: n.交易，协定，份量；v.(dealt,dealt[delt])处理，应付，分配
example: 单词 deal 的例句||||Be careful. She is very difficult to deal with. 可得当心，她很难对付。|||| Deal with a man as he deals with you. 以其人之道，还治其人之身。

name: ending
example: 单词 ending 的例句||||She think the ending be great. 她认为结局好极了。||||The story had a satisfying ending. 那个故事的结局令人满意。

name: death
example: 单词 death 的例句||||His death was a great shock to the family. 他的死对他的家庭是一个很大的打击。|||| I was shocked at the news of her death. 我听到她去世的消息十分震惊。

name: farthest
interpret: adj.最远的，最久的；adv.最远，（far的最高级）
example: 单词 farthest 的例句||||The town is five miles away at the farthest. 那个镇至多不过五英里。||||Of all the students, I ran farthest. 在所有学生中，我跑得最远。

name: final
example: 单词 final 的例句||||Is this your final decision? 这是你们最终决定吗？||||The father had the final say. 父亲有最后的决定权。

name: major
interpret: n.主修，成年人，陆军少校；adj.主要的，较多的，大部份的；v.主修
example: 单词 major 的例句||||His major is history. 他主修历史。|||| The car needs major repairs. 这辆汽车需要大修。

name: necklace
example: 单词 necklace 的例句||||She wears a necklace. 她戴着项链。||||Your necklace is just like mine. 你的项链和我的项链很相似。

name: medium
interpret: n.媒体，方法，媒介；adj.适中的，中等的
example: 单词 medium 的例句||||He was a man of medium height. 他是个中等个子的男子。||||Do you have the medium size? 您有中号的吗？

name: regular
interpret: adj.有规律的，有规则的，整齐的，正规的
example: 单词 regular 的例句||||I had no regular education. 我没有受过正规教育。|||| Saturday is my regular day for shopping. 我通常在星期六到商店买东西。

name: solution
interpret: n.解答，解决办法，解决方案；溶解；溶液
example: 单词 solution 的例句||||It's a peaceful solution. 这是个和平的解决方法。|||| They tried everyway to find the solution. 他们想尽办法来解决问题。

name: teen
interpret: n.(=teenager)青少年；13岁到19岁的年轻人
example: 单词 teen 的例句||||Teen girls always like day dreaming. 十几岁的女孩子都爱做白日梦。|||| When I was a teen I was too shy to ask about it. 当我是一个少女时，我不好意思问这些。

name: scene
example: 单词 scene 的例句||||He is an important man behind the scene. 他是一个幕后的重要人物。||||I can imagine the scene clearly in my mind. 我可以清楚地想像出那个情景。

name: talent
interpret: n.天才，天资；才能，才干；有才能的人
example: 单词 talent 的例句||||The child has musical talent. 这孩子有音乐天才。|||| There was a lot of talent in this city. 在这个城市里有很多人才。

name: system
interpret: n.系统，体系，制度，方式，秩序，分类原则
example: 单词 system 的例句||||He is good at the subject of social system. 他擅长于社会制度问题。||||He created a new system of teaching foreign languages. 他创造了一种新的外语教学体系。

name: ancient
example: 单词 ancient 的例句||||This is an ancient story. 这是一个古老的故事。|||| Xian is an ancient city. 西安是一座古城。

name: clean-up
example: 单词 clean-up 的例句||||I am giving the classroom a clean-up. 我在打扫教室卫生。||||My mom did the clean-up yesterday. 我妈妈昨天打扫卫生了。

name: coal
example: 单词 coal 的例句||||There is plenty of coal in this area. 这个地区有丰富的煤。||||Put some more coal on the fire. 再往火里加点煤。

name: fiction
interpret: n.小说；虚构之事；捏造的故事
example: 单词 fiction 的例句||||He's a great reader of science fiction. 他很喜欢看科学幻想小说。||||Is the story fact or fiction? 这个故事的情节是真实的还是虚构的？

name: humid
example: 单词 humid 的例句||||In the east, the air is humid in summer. 在东方，夏季空气潮湿。||||It's too humid today! 今天真潮湿！

name: frightened
example: 单词 frightened 的例句||||I was frightened of him when I saw him first. 我第一次见他时怕他。||||You frightened me to death for staying out all night! 你整夜不回家，把我急死了！

name: living
interpret: adj.活的，活着的，现存的；逼真的，一模一样的；生活的，维持生活的；n.生活，生计
example: 单词 living 的例句||||Nowadays it is very easy to earn a living. 现今谋生很容易。||||I'll never forget that as long as I am living. 这事我至死也不会忘记。

name: wheat
example: 单词 wheat 的例句||||It's still too early to harvest the wheat now. 现在割小麦为时过早。||||The farmer grows a lot of wheat. 这位农民种了许多小麦。

name: nineteenth
example: 单词 nineteenth 的例句||||The story goes back to the middle of the nineteenth century. 故事追溯到19世纪中叶。||||It happened in the nineteenth century. 这事发生在十九世纪。

name: finished
interpret: adj.完成的，精湛的；v.动词finish的过去式和过去分词
example: 单词 finished 的例句||||We finished up everything which was on the table. 我们把桌上的东西全吃完了。||||We can certainly have the job finished on time. 我们肯定能按时完成任务。

name: snack
interpret: n.小吃，点心，快餐；vi. 吃零食，吃快餐
example: 单词 snack 的例句||||I only have a snack at lunch time. 午饭我通常只吃一份快餐。||||Let's have a snack at the nearest restaurant. 咱们找个近便的饭馆吃点吧。

name: favorite
interpret: n.特别喜爱的（人）物；adj.特别喜爱的
example: 单词 favorite 的例句||||Spring and autumn are my favorite seasons. 春秋是我喜欢的季节。||||Her most favorite fruit is orange. 她最喜欢的水果是桔子。

name: guide
example: 单词 guide 的例句||||I guide him in his studies. 我辅导他学习。||||A trained dog can act as a guide to a blind person. 经过训练的狗能担任盲人的向导。

name: wallet
example: 单词 wallet 的例句||||I keep my wallet in an inside pocket. 我把钱包放在里面的口袋里。||||It is terrible that she lost her wallet. 糟透了，她丢失了钱包。

name: wrote
example: 单词 wrote 的例句||||She wrote the music and he wrote the lyrics. 她作曲子，他写歌词。||||He wrote back that he was too busy to join us. 他回信说他太忙不能参加我们的活动。

name: touching
example: 单词 touching 的例句||||It was a touching sight. 这是一幅动人的景象。||||His letter was touching. 他的信很感人。

name: restroom
example: 单词 restroom 的例句||||Can I go to the restroom? 我能去洗手间吗？||||I go to restroom more than five times a day. 我一天上厕所五次以上。

name: did
example: 单词 did 的例句||||How many goals did you score in the last game? 上一场比赛你们进了几个球？||||Why did you choose basketball in the first place? 你为何首先选择篮球呢？

name: aged
example: 单词 aged 的例句||||He had put on weight and aged a little. 他胖了，也老点了。||||He is aged, but his memory is still good. 他已年老，然而记忆力还好。

name: rode
example: 单词 rode 的例句||||He rode a motorcycle to the station. 他骑摩托车去车站。||||Today I rode across the city. 今天我骑车穿越了整个城市。

name: pioneer
interpret: n.先锋，拓荒者，开劈者；v.提倡，作先驱，开劈
example: 单词 pioneer 的例句||||He was the pioneer of photography. 他是摄影术的倡导者。||||His pioneer group chose him as their leader. 他所在的少先队选他当了队长。

name: Olympics
interpret: n.奥林匹克世界运动会(=Olympic Games)
example: 单词 Olympics 的例句||||Which events is he going in for at the Olympics? 他将在奥运上参加什么项目？||||I think the Olympics will be a great success. 我想奥运会将会是非常成功的。

name: amazing
interpret: adj.令人吃惊的；令人惊异的
example: 单词 amazing 的例句||||The news is quite amazing. 这消息十分惊人。||||Our trip to the mountain was amazing. 我们的登山之行真是太妙了。

name: seen
example: 单词 seen 的例句||||Since I left college, I have not seen him. 自从我离开大学以后，就没有见过他了。||||I hope to have seen the film next week. 我希望下星期能看到这部电影。

name: elder
interpret: adj.年龄较大的，年长的；n.长者，长辈
example: 单词 elder 的例句||||She has an elder brother. 她有一个哥哥。||||He's the second child. He has an elder sister. 他排行老二，他有个姐姐。

name: Switzerland
example: 单词 Switzerland 的例句||||They are going to spend the weekend in Switzerland. 他们要去瑞士度周末。||||As everybody knows, Switzerland is a peaceful country. 众所周知，瑞士是一个爱好和平的国家。

name: colorful
interpret: adj.色彩鲜艳的，华美的，富有色彩的，有趣的
example: 单词 colorful 的例句||||That bag is very colorful. 那个书包非常鲜艳。|||| I love the colorful paintings. 我喜欢那些色彩斑斓的图画。

name: diner
interpret: n.用餐者，路边小饭馆，(餐车式)小饭店
example: 单词 diner 的例句||||The diner is very small. 这家餐馆很小。||||Asking if the diner is ready to order. 询问用餐者是否准备点菜了。

name: balanced
example: 单词 balanced 的例句||||You ought to have a balanced state of mind. 你应该保持心态平衡。||||You should keep on a balanced diet. 你应该坚持均衡饮食。

name: loving
example: 单词 loving 的例句||||He recovered soon under his wife's tender loving care. 在妻子体贴入微的关怀下，他很快就痊愈了。||||He greeted her with a loving hug. 他以一个深情的拥抱来迎接她。

name: skater
example: 单词 skater 的例句||||Tom is a really good skater! 汤姆真是一个优秀的滑雪高手！||||The skater quickly recovered his balance. 那个滑冰的人很快恢复了平衡。

name: chore
example: 单词 chore 的例句||||Each morning I get up and do the chore before I go out. 我每天早晨起床后干些家务再外出。||||It's such a chore to do the shopping every day! 每天上街买东西真烦人！

name: golfer
example: 单词 golfer 的例句||||She was a good golfer and tennis player. 她是一名高尔夫球和网球好手。||||She is the ninth best golfer in the world. 她是世界排名第九的高尔夫球选手。

name: trendy
interpret: n.新潮人物，穿着时髦的人；adj.流行的
example: 单词 trendy 的例句||||I just want to dress my baby as trendy as possible. 我只想尽量把宝宝打扮得时髦点儿。||||Do you know black clothes will be trendy this fall? 你知道今秋要流行黑衣服吗？

name: collector
interpret: n.收藏家，采集者，搜集者，征收员
example: 单词 collector 的例句||||My son is a stamp collector. 我儿子是邮票收藏者。||||He's a book collector. 他是位藏书家。

name: aloud
example: 单词 aloud 的例句||||He called aloud for help. 他高声喊叫救命。||||Read it aloud before you write it down. 抄写前，大声读出来。

name: spoken
example: 单词 spoken 的例句||||His spoken English is very good. 他的英语口语非常好。||||We'll hold a talk on how to improve our spoken English. 我们将要举行一次关于如何提高我们的英语口语的会谈。

name: girlfriend
example: 单词 girlfriend 的例句||||My girlfriend is a teacher. 我女朋友是个老师。|||| I just broke up with my girlfriend. 我刚和我的女朋友分手了。

name: dining
example: 单词 dining 的例句||||The dining room was twice as big as the Tom's. 这个餐厅比汤姆的餐厅大一倍。||||Don't talk about business while we are dining. 吃饭时别谈公事。

name: fewer
example: 单词 fewer 的例句||||We need more apples and fewer oranges. 我们需要多些苹果，少些橘子。||||Now I meet with fewer difficulties in my work. 现在我工作中困难少些了。

name: sang
example: 单词 sang 的例句||||She sang a sad song. 她唱着悲伤的歌。||||The children sang out at the top of their voices. 孩子们放声高歌。

name: anytime
example: 单词 anytime 的例句||||You may come anytime. 你什么时间来都可以。|||| I could come here anytime. 我可以随时到这里来。

name: finely
example: 单词 finely 的例句||||These carrots are finely chopped. 这些胡萝卜切得很细。||||The house has been finely restored. 那房子修复得很好。

name: calendar
example: 单词 calendar 的例句||||A big calendar is hanging on the wall. 墙上挂了一本大月历。||||Is there a calendar clock in your family? 你家有日历钟吗？

name: elevator
example: 单词 elevator 的例句||||The elevator doesn't stop at floors 1, 2 and 3. 电梯在一、二、三楼不停。||||The elevator went up to the fifth floor. 电梯升到了五楼。

name: geography
example: 单词 geography 的例句||||I like geography and history. 我喜欢地理和历史。|||| The students are having their geography class now. 学生们正在上地理课。

name: player
interpret: n.运动员，做游戏的人，选手，队员，比赛者；演员，演奏者，自动演奏装置，戏子
example: 单词 player 的例句||||She is our best player. 她是我们最好的运动员。|||| He is quite a good player. 他是一个满不错的选手。

example: 单词 theater 的例句||||Excuse me, where is the entrance to the theater? 请问剧院的入口在哪里？||||Her mother never went to the theater. 她母亲从不去戏院看戏。

name: below
example: 单词 below 的例句||||I looked down at the hall below. 我瞧了瞧下面的大厅。||||The temperature is below zero. 温度在零度以下。

example: 单词 seventh 的例句||||July is the seventh month of the year. 7月是一年中的第七个月。||||Let's start from the seventh stop. 让我们从第七站开始。

name: stairs
example: 单词 stairs 的例句||||He followed us up the stairs. 他随我们上了楼。||||I waited at the top of the stairs. 我在楼梯顶端等着。

name: doorway
example: 单词 doorway 的例句||||They huddled in the shop doorway to shelter from the rain. 他们挤在商店门口躲雨。||||Mary suddenly appeared in the doorway. 玛丽突然出现在门口。

name: tenth
example: 单词 tenth 的例句||||The tenth question is very difficult. 第十个问题十分难。||||He is the tenth in order. 按顺序他是第十个。

name: protect
example: 单词 protect 的例句||||We protect you from danger. 我们保护你不受危险。|||| An umbrella will protect you from the rain. 雨伞可以保护你不至于淋雨。

name: worse
interpret: adj.更坏的，更差的；adv.更坏，更差
example: 单词 worse 的例句||||I have even worse news for you. 我有更坏的消息告诉你。||||The weather got worse during the day. 白天天气更坏了。

name: yogurt
example: 单词 yogurt 的例句||||All I had for lunch was a yogurt. 午饭我只吃了一块酸乳酪。||||How many cups of yogurt do we need? 我们需要多少杯酸奶？

name: court
interpret: n.法院，庭院，奉承，球场；v.献殷勤，追求，招致危险
example: 单词 court 的例句||||The court is very dirty. 这个院子非常脏。||||Can you prove that to the court? 你能向法庭证实这一点吗？

interpret: n.（网球 ，羽毛球的）球拍；n.喧闹，吵闹，狂欢；考验，辛酸经历；行业，职业，骗局
example: 单词 racket 的例句||||I bought her a new tennis racket. 我给她买了一只新的网球拍。||||What a racket over there. 那儿多么吵闹呀。

name: unhappy
interpret: adj.不幸的，不愉快的，不幸福的
example: 单词 unhappy 的例句||||With all his money, he is unhappy. 尽管他有那么多钱，他也并不愉快。||||I'm unhappy about the work you did for me. 你替我做这件事我不太满意。

name: calm
interpret: n.平稳，风平浪静；adj.平静的，冷静的；v.平静下来，镇静
example: 单词 calm 的例句||||The sky is blue, and the sea is calm. 天空碧蓝，海上风平浪静。||||She tried her best to be calm. 她尽量冷静。

name: blood
example: 单词 blood 的例句||||Their hands were full of blood. 他们的手沾满了鲜血。||||He was a person of gentle blood. 他出身名门。

name: blender
interpret: n.混合的人，混合器，搅拌器
example: 单词 blender 的例句||||I like this blender. Do you have a pink color? 我喜欢这台搅拌器，有粉红色的吗？||||Pour the milk into the blender. 把牛奶倒入搅拌器里。

name: cotton
interpret: n.棉花；v.和谐，一致；接近，亲近
example: 单词 cotton 的例句||||He trades in wool and cotton. 他经营羊毛和棉花。||||This shirt is made of cotton. 这件衬衣是棉布的。

name: double
interpret: n.两倍；adj.两倍的，双重的；v.加倍的，快步走，加倍努力
example: 单词 double 的例句||||They bought a double bed. 他们买了一张双人床。|||| Ten is the double of five. 10是5的两倍。

name: position
interpret: n.位置，职位；状态，立场；vt.安置，决定...的位置
example: 单词 position 的例句||||He is the only possible man for the position. 他是担任该职务的惟一合适人选。||||You don't understand what a difficult position I'm in. 你不会明白我的处境多么困难。

name: skill
example: 单词 skill 的例句||||He has no skill in teaching. 他没有教书的本领。|||| He cannot do the work for lack of skill. 由于缺乏技术，他不能做这项工作。

name: sunrise
example: 单词 sunrise 的例句||||We got up before sunrise. 我们在太阳升起之前起床。||||I enjoyed the sunrise by the seaside. 我喜欢海边的日出。

name: state
interpret: n.州，国，情形；adj.国家的，州的，正式的；vt.说，陈述，声明，规定
example: 单词 state 的例句||||I'm worried about her state of health. 我担心她的身体状况。||||Each state of the United States has a capital. 美国每一个州都有一个首府。

name: choice
example: 单词 choice 的例句||||There are many books you can make a choice. 有许多书你可以任意选择。||||He went abroad at his own choice. 他出国是自愿选择的。

name: realize
interpret: vt.认识到；了解到，实现，使显得逼真，把…变为现金；vi. 变卖为现金
example: 单词 realize 的例句||||Do you realize the importance of this question? 你意识到这个问题的重要性了吗？||||He'll come to realize it one day. 他总有一天会懂得这一点。

name: express
interpret: vt.表达，表示，表现；压榨，榨出；n.快车，快邮，快件，速递；adj.特快的，特殊的
example: 单词 express 的例句||||Everyone is free to express himself. 每个人都可以畅所欲言。||||Send the letter by express. 用快件把这封信寄出去。

name: destroy
example: 单词 destroy 的例句||||Destroy the old world and build a new one. 破坏旧世界，建设新世界。||||Now I will destroy it. 现在我将亲手毁灭它。

name: scarf
interpret: n.围巾，头巾，领带，嵌接；vt.围围巾，嵌接
example: 单词 scarf 的例句||||She had a scarf around her neck. 她脖子上围着围巾。||||She wore a red scarf. 她戴着一条红领巾。

name: admire
interpret: vt.钦佩，赞赏，羡慕；称赞，夸奖
example: 单词 admire 的例句||||Don't forget to admire the baby. 不要忘了夸奖那孩子。||||I admire him for what he has done. 我对他所做的事很钦佩。

name: guidebook
example: 单词 guidebook 的例句||||The guidebook says to turn left. 旅游指南上说向左转。||||Where can I get a guidebook or map of Beijing? 到哪儿买旅游手册或者北京地图？

name: style
interpret: n.样式，风格；n.风格，时尚，文体，风度，字体，类型；vt.称呼，设计，使合潮流
example: 单词 style 的例句||||She has a style of her own in everything. 她在各方面都有自己的独特风格。||||Her dress is out of style. 她的穿着不时髦。

name: succeed
interpret: vt.成功，继承，继续；vi.接替，有作为
example: 单词 succeed 的例句||||It was a good try but it didn't succeed. 这是一个很好的尝试，但没有成功。||||If he has no children, who will succeed? 如果他没有孩子，谁将继位？

name: design
interpret: vt.设计，构思，绘制；vi. 计划，谋划；设计，构思，绘制；n.设计，图样；计划，企图
example: 单词 design 的例句||||It was done by design and not by accident. 这事是故意做出来的。||||This piece of cloth has a new design. 这块布图案新颖。

name: depend
example: 单词 depend 的例句||||All living things depend on the sun for their growth. 万物靠太阳生长。||||You may depend on it that he will help you. 你可以指望他来帮助你。

name: grammar
example: 单词 grammar 的例句||||I find German grammar very difficult. 我发现德语语法很难学。||||He spent much time correcting my grammar. 他花了很多时间来改我的语法错误。

name: normal
interpret: adj.正常的，正规的，标准的；n.正规；常态
example: 单词 normal 的例句||||He received four years' normal edication at college. 他在大学受了四年正规教育。||||Everything is normal here. 这里一切正常。

name: communicate
interpret: vt.传达，传播；vi.交流，沟通，联通
example: 单词 communicate 的例句||||I'm afraid we just don't communicate. 恐怕我们没法交流。||||Parents communicate with school by internet. 家长通过因特网和学校联系。

name: gray
interpret: n.灰色；adj.灰色的，阴沉的；v.变灰色；（计算机）灰色
example: 单词 gray 的例句||||She was dressed in gray. 她穿着灰色的衣服。||||His hair was gray and he was short and fat. 他头发灰白，长得又矮又胖。

name: encourage
interpret: vt. 鼓励，怂恿；激励；支持
example: 单词 encourage 的例句||||They often encourage the students with prizes. 他们经常用奖品来鼓励学生。||||His parents encourage him in his studies. 他父母鼓励他在学习上用功。

name: rainforest
example: 单词 rainforest 的例句||||They are all from a rainforest in South America. 他们全部来自南美洲一处雨林处。||||They walked through the rainforest. 他们走过了热带雨林。

name: irregular
interpret: n.不合规格之物；adj.不规则的，不整齐的，不合法的
example: 单词 irregular 的例句||||English spelling is very irregular. 英文的拼法很不规则。||||This is a irregular verb. 这是一个不规则动词。

name: unfriendly
interpret: adj.不友好的，冷淡的；不亲切的
example: 单词 unfriendly 的例句||||Our neighbours are unfriendly to us. 我们的邻居对我们不友好。||||His tone is rather unfriendly. 他的口气很不友好。

name: social
example: 单词 social 的例句||||The ant is a social insect. 蚂蚁是一种群居昆虫。|||| As a social worker, she does a lot of work. 作为一个社会工作者，她做了大量的工作。

name: reader
example: 单词 reader 的例句||||My brother is a great reader. 我弟弟是个很爱看书的人。||||It aims to tell the reader interesting facts. 它的目的旨在给读者介绍有趣的事物。

name: gentle
example: 单词 gentle 的例句||||You must be gentle when holding a little baby. 抱小孩时要轻柔。||||Our new teacher is gentle towards us. 我们的新老师对我们很和蔼。

name: hotline
example: 单词 hotline 的例句||||This radio station has opened an audience hotline. 这个广播电台开通了观众热线。||||America and China agreed to set up a hotline. 美国与中国同意建立热线联系。

name: including
example: 单词 including 的例句||||There were ten people, including you. 加上你，一共十个人。||||There are three storeys including the ground floor. 包括底层共有三层。

name: birth
interpret: n.出身，血统，出生，诞生，出现，起源
example: 单词 birth 的例句||||She gave birth to a fine healthy baby. 她生了一个健康可爱的婴儿。||||She supports birth control. 她赞成计划生育。

name: adverb
example: 单词 adverb 的例句||||The adverb always follows the verb. 副词总是跟在动词后。||||Adverb is to describe a verb or an action. 副词是来形容一个动词或一个动作。

name: recently
example: 单词 recently 的例句||||The book was published as recently as last week. 这本书上周刚出版。||||The weather has been very snowy recently. 近来天气多雪。

name: agent
interpret: n.代理人；代理商；产生作用的人或事物
example: 单词 agent 的例句||||I am an agent for Apple. 我是苹果公司的代理。||||Go to my agent's office in New York. 请到我在纽约的代办处吧。

name: aim
interpret: n.目标，对准；v.对准目标，打算
example: 单词 aim 的例句||||He has a high aim in life. 他的人生目标很高。||||He spent most of his life without aim. 他毫无目标地度过了大半生。

name: development
interpret: n.发育，成长；发展，进展；发达；开发
example: 单词 development 的例句||||We shall follow closely the development of the situation. 我们将密切注意形势的发展。||||This is the late development of science. 这是科学的新发展。

name: educational
interpret: adj.教育的，教育方面的；有教育意义的
example: 单词 educational 的例句||||He is an educational worker. 他是一位教育工作者。||||The sixth grade saw an educational film yesterday. 六年级学生昨天看了一部教育片。

name: emperor
example: 单词 emperor 的例句||||He is a good emperor. 他是个好皇帝。||||The daughter of an emperor does not worry about finding a husband. 皇帝女儿不愁嫁。

name: fell
interpret: vbl.fall的过去式，vt.击倒，打倒（疾病等），致于...死地，砍伐；n.一季所伐的木材，兽皮，羊毛；adj.凶猛的，可怕的
example: 单词 fell 的例句||||I fell to the ground. 我摔倒在地上。|||| The young couple fell in love at first sight. 这对年轻人一见钟情。

name: lunar
interpret: adj.阴历的，月的，微亮的（指光）
example: 单词 lunar 的例句||||The Spring Festival is the lunar New Year. 春节即农历新年。||||The lunar New Year arrived. 阴历新年来了。

name: passenger
example: 单词 passenger 的例句||||It is a passenger train. 这是辆客车。||||The passenger ship was two hours late. 客船误点两小时。

name: bulb
example: 单词 bulb 的例句||||The bulb of the eye is important for us. 眼球对于我们来说非常重要。||||We'll have to change the bulb again. 我们又得换个灯泡了。

name: vest
example: 单词 vest 的例句||||You'd better wear a vest under a coat. 你最好把背心穿在上衣里面。||||All girls have to wear white cotton vest. 所有女同学都需穿棉质白色内衣。

name: couple
interpret: n.对，夫妇，数个；v.加倍，成双，连结
example: 单词 couple 的例句||||I have a couple of things to do. 我有几件事要做。||||I'll come again in a couple of days. 我过两天再来。

name: dynasty
example: 单词 dynasty 的例句||||Zhang Heng, a famous scientist in Han Dynasty. 汉代的一个著名科学家张衡。||||The Tang Dynasty made Chang'an its capital. 唐代建都长安。

name: European
interpret: adj.欧洲的，发生在欧洲的；n.欧洲人
example: 单词 European 的例句||||France is a European nation. 法国是个欧洲国家。|||| I am not very familiar with European history. 我对欧洲历史不太熟悉。

name: law
interpret: n.法(律，规，学)；律师业；规律，定律
example: 单词 law 的例句||||He went to the school of law for three years. 他在法学院读了三年。||||The new law will reduce pollution of the rivers. 这条新法律将会减轻河流污染。

name: positive
interpret: adj.肯定的；正面的，积极的；n.正片
example: 单词 positive 的例句||||I try to stay positive. 我尝试着保持积极。|||| Can you be positive about what you saw? 你能肯定你看得真切吗？

name: obey
interpret: vt. 服从，听从；按照……行动 vi. 服从，顺从；听话
example: 单词 obey 的例句||||Everyone must obey the law. 人人都必须遵守法律。|||| We must obey orders. 我们必须服从命令。

name: behavior
example: 单词 behavior 的例句||||You have surprised me with your good behavior. 你的优良表现真使我惊奇。||||Behavior like this will lead you into trouble. 这样的行为会给你惹麻烦的。

name: border
interpret: n.边框；边缘，边境，花坛；vt.在…上镶边，接近；vi.接界，近似
example: 单词 border 的例句||||He waited for her at the border. 他在边界等她。|||| He drove us right up to the Russian border. 他开车一直把我们送到俄罗斯边境。

name: customer
example: 单词 customer 的例句||||The customer is always right. 顾客永远是正确的。|||| I visited the customer yesterday. 我昨天去拜访客户了。

name: fighter
example: 单词 fighter 的例句||||Not only is he a scientist, but also a fighter. 他不仅是位科学家，也是位战士。||||Lu Xun is a fearless fighter. 鲁迅是一名无畏的战士。

name: rent
example: 单词 rent 的例句||||I have rented a house and paid the rent. 我已租了房子，并交了租金。||||He decided to rent the house. 他决定租这房子。

name: topic
example: 单词 topic 的例句||||On what topic are you talking? 你在谈论什么话题？||||This is a topic sentence. 这是个主题句。

name: fool
interpret: n.愚人，受骗者，奶油拌水果；vt.愚弄，欺骗，浪费；vi.干傻事，开玩笑
example: 单词 fool 的例句||||He spent all his money, he is such a fool. 他这样傻，花光了所有的钱。||||Some people act the fool now and then. 有些人时常装傻。

name: decision
example: 单词 decision 的例句||||Once a decision is made, we must carry it out. 一旦做了决定，我们就要执行。||||It was unwise of you to make that decision. 你这个决定是不明智的。

name: education
example: 单词 education 的例句||||He had a good education. 他受过良好的教育。|||| We mustn't cut the cost of education. 我们不应该削减教育经费。

name: feeling
example: 单词 feeling 的例句||||I am feeling better now. 我现在觉得好些了。||||I'm feeling kind of tired. 我感到有点累。

name: guest
example: 单词 guest 的例句||||We must prepare a room for our guest. 我们必须为客人预备一个房间。||||He is an unwelcome guest. 他是个不受欢迎的客人。

name: translate
interpret: vt.翻译；用简单易懂的语言表达
example: 单词 translate 的例句||||Can you translate from French into English? 你能把法语译成英语吗？||||Can you translate this article for me? 你能替我翻译这篇文章吗？

name: host
interpret: n.主机，主人，主持人，东道主；v.主持，做东
example: 单词 host 的例句||||Who will be the host for tonight's program? 谁是今晚的节目主持人？||||The host greeted us at the gate. 主人在大门口迎接我们。

name: homeless
example: 单词 homeless 的例句||||The flood made many people homeless. 水灾使许多人无家可归。||||My sister always takes pity on the homeless children. 我妹妹一向可怜那些无家可归的孩子。

name: indoor
example: 单词 indoor 的例句||||I like indoor climbing. 我喜欢室内攀岩。|||| There is a big indoor swimming pool in this hotel. 这家旅馆内有一个大的室内游泳馆。

name: meaning
interpret: n.意义，含意，目的，意图；adj.意味深长的
example: 单词 meaning 的例句||||At last he knew the meaning of life. 终于，他知道了生命的意义。||||Could you catch her meaning? 你明白她的意思吗？

name: mostly
example: 单词 mostly 的例句||||Our weather has been mostly warm. 我们这里的天气多半是暖和的。||||She uses her car mostly for driving to work. 她的汽车主要用于上下班。

name: online
example: 单词 online 的例句||||I read the paper online every morning. 我每天早上在网上看报纸。||||The computer might not support online working. 计算机不能承载联机工作。

name: organization
example: 单词 organization 的例句||||The United Nation is a large organization. 联合国是个大机构。||||They cleaned him out of the organization. 他们把他从该机构中除名了。

name: operate
interpret: vi. 运转；动手术；起作用 vt. 操作；经营；引起；对…开刀
example: 单词 operate 的例句||||The only way to do this was to operate. 要做到这一点的唯一方法就是动手术。||||The doctor decided to operate at once. 医生决定立刻动手术。

name: program
interpret: n.节目，程序，计划；v.规划，拟...计划，制作节目
example: 单词 program 的例句||||He ran a program on a computer. 他用电脑执行一个程序。||||I have a full program for my visit to London. 我访问伦敦的日程安排得满满的。

name: regard
interpret: n.关心，注意，尊敬；v.视为，注意，和...有关
example: 单词 regard 的例句||||You have no regard for my feelings! 你没有考虑到我的感情！||||More regard must be paid to safety on the roads. 必须更加注意公路上的交通安全。

name: performance
interpret: n.履行，执行；性能，特性；表演，演出
example: 单词 performance 的例句||||The performance lasted for three hours. 表演持续了三个小时。||||His performance in the exams was not very good. 他考得不很好。

name: stage
interpret: n.阶段，舞台，时期；vt.上演，表演
example: 单词 stage 的例句||||She was mad about the stage. 她狂热地迷恋着舞台生活。||||Take it easy when you are on the stage. 上台的时间不要紧张。

name: volunteer
example: 单词 volunteer 的例句||||She works as a volunteer in the hospital. 她在医院里当志愿者。||||That man is a volunteer fireman in this town. 那个人是这个镇里的志愿消防队员。

name: outgoing
interpret: n.外出，开支，流出；adj.喜欢外出的；（计算机）输出
example: 单词 outgoing 的例句||||He is an outgoing and lively person. 他是个性格开朗而又活泼的人。||||She's very outgoing. 她很外向。

name: confident
interpret: adj.确信的，自信的，有信心的
example: 单词 confident 的例句||||I am confident in him. 我对他有信心。||||We need a confident leader to overcome these difficulties. 我们需要一个有信心的领导者来克服这些困难。

name: creative
example: 单词 creative 的例句||||This job is useful and creative. 这项工作既有用又富有创造性。||||He is a very creative musician. 他是一个非常有创造力的音乐家。

name: achieve
interpret: vt.完成，达到，实现；vi.达到目的
example: 单词 achieve 的例句||||It takes hard work to achieve success. 成功需要努力工作。||||They will stop at nothing to achieve their aims. 他们将不择手段地来达到他们的目的。

name: Asian
example: 单词 Asian 的例句||||She won two gold medals in the Asian Games. 在亚洲运动会上她赢得了两枚金牌。||||An Asian is a person born or living in Asia. 亚洲人是指出生或居住在亚洲的人。

name: create
example: 单词 create 的例句||||That would create a wrong impression. 那将造成一种错误的印象。||||The project will create up to 40 new jobs. 这项工程将提供40个新的工作岗位。

name: attract
interpret: vt. 吸引；引起 vi. 吸引；有吸引力
example: 单词 attract 的例句||||That will attract a big crowd of people. 一定会吸引很多人。||||He shouted to attract attention. 他大声叫喊以吸引注意。

name: latest
interpret: adj.最新的，最近的，最后的，最迟的
example: 单词 latest 的例句||||This is the latest hair-style. 这是最新的发型。|||| Have you read her latest work? 你读过她最近的作品吗？

name: harvest
interpret: n.收获，收成，结果，成果；v.收获，收割
example: 单词 harvest 的例句||||There was a good harvest that year. 那一年收成好。||||The autumn harvest is about to start. 秋收即将开始。

name: ourselves
example: 单词 ourselves 的例句||||We walked home by ourselves. 我们独自走回家。||||We fight only for ourselves! 我们只为自己而战！

name: sold
interpret: v.动词sell的过去式、过去分词
example: 单词 sold 的例句||||John's house was sold to a Frenchman. 约翰的房子卖给了一个法国人。||||This kind of books is sold by all booksellers. 所有的书商都出售这种书。

name: understood
example: 单词 understood 的例句||||He is understood to be a man of ability. 他被认为是一个有能力的人。||||It is understood that hard work can bring success. 不言而喻，艰苦的工作可带来成功。

name: hum
interpret: vi. 发低哼声 vt. 用哼声表示 n. 嗡嗡声；哼声；杂声
example: 单词 hum 的例句||||She continued to hum the song over and over. 她一遍又一遍地不断哼唱那支歌。||||He could hear the hum of the bees in the garden. 他听得见花园里蜜蜂的嗡嗡声。

name: sunshine
example: 单词 sunshine 的例句||||She sat in the warm sunshine. 她坐在暖和的阳光下。||||What bright sunshine it is! 多么明亮的阳光呀！

name: southeast
interpret: n.东南，东南地区；adj.东南的，向东南的，来自东南的； adv.往东南，来自东南
example: 单词 southeast 的例句||||A southeast wind was blowing. 开始刮东南风。|||| Austria lies to the southeast of Germany. 奥地利位于德国东南。

name: given
interpret: adj.赠予的，沉溺的，特定的，假设的；vbl.give的过去分词
example: 单词 given 的例句||||This was given me as a birthday gift. 这是给我的生日礼物。||||He was given every chance to try the job. 他得到一切可能的机会去试做这件事。

name: universe
example: 单词 universe 的例句||||Our world is a small part of the universe. 我们的地球是宇宙的一小部分。||||I know seldom about universe. 关于宇宙我知道得很少。

name: part-time
interpret: adj.兼职的，部分时间的；adv.部分时间，兼职地
example: 单词 part-time 的例句||||She works part-time in a shop. 她在一家商店里兼职。||||I have a part-time job. 我有一份兼职的工作。

name: recycle
interpret: vt. 使再循环；使…重新利用 vi. 重复利用
example: 单词 recycle 的例句||||We should try to recycle all our waste paper. 我们应该把所有废纸回收再利用。||||They have to be sent to a special recycle centre. 它们必须被送到专门的回收中心。

name: manner
interpret: n.方式，方法；态度，举止；[pl.]礼貌，规矩
example: 单词 manner 的例句||||His manner was very cool. 他态度很冷淡。|||| The general had a severe manner. 那位将军态度严肃。

name: saying
interpret: n.谚语，俗话，格言；动词say的现在分词
example: 单词 saying 的例句||||Saying and doing are two things. 说和做是两码事。||||I know a chinese saying. 我知道一句中国谚语。

name: backache
example: 单词 backache 的例句||||I think you need to see a doctor for your backache. 我想你的腰痛需要看医生。|||| I often have backache. 我经常背痛。

name: elementary
example: 单词 elementary 的例句||||What were you like in elementary school? 你在小学是什么样的？|||| This is an elementary question. 这是一个基本的问题。

name: neighbor
interpret: n.邻居；v.邻接，毗邻而居，友好
example: 单词 neighbor 的例句||||He has a very good neighbor. 他有一个好邻居。||||My new neighbor moved in last weekend. 我的新邻居上周才搬来。

name: annoy
interpret: vt. 骚扰；惹恼；打搅 vi. 惹恼；令人讨厌；打搅
example: 单词 annoy 的例句||||Please don't annoy me. 请不要打搅我。|||| He was beginning to annoy me. 他开始使我心烦。

name: electric
interpret: adj.电的，令人激动的，鲜亮的；n.供电
example: 单词 electric 的例句||||What colour is the electric cooker? 电饭锅是什么颜色的？||||Is your cooker gas or electric? 你的炊具用煤气还是用电？

name: stood
example: 单词 stood 的例句||||She stood up when they came in. 当他们进来时，她站了起来。||||The child stood by the side of his mother. 孩子站在母亲身边。

name: southern
interpret: adj.南部的，南方的，来自南方的
example: 单词 southern 的例句||||They live in the southern area. 他们住在南部地区。||||He has traveled in southern cities. 他游历了南方各市。

name: success
example: 单词 success 的例句||||The party looks like being a success after all. 无论怎么说这次聚会看起来是成功的。||||All in all, it has been a great success. 总的来说，非常成功。

name: though
interpret: conj.虽然，尽管；即使；可是，不过，然而；adv.可是，不过，然而
example: 单词 though 的例句||||It's quite pleasant today,though the wind is rather cool. 尽管风有点凉，今天天气还是很不错的。|||| I will have a try even though I should fail. 哪怕失败，我也要试一下。

name: trust
interpret: n.信任，信赖，盼望，希望，赊卖，热望，切望；adj.信托的，被信托的
example: 单词 trust 的例句||||I would never trust in that kind of person. 我绝不会相信那种人。||||In some things you must trust to your elders. 有些事情你得依靠长辈。

name: wise
interpret: adj.明智的，有学问的，有智慧的，聪明的
example: 单词 wise 的例句||||He was wise to give up smoking. 他戒烟是明智的。|||| Even the wise are not always free from error. 智者千虑，必有一失。

name: total
interpret: n.总数；合计；adj.总的；全部的；整个的
example: 单词 total 的例句||||Please figure out the total cost. 请算出总费用。||||His total score was one hundred and fifty-five. 他的总分是一百五十五分。

name: pleased
interpret: adj.高兴的，快乐的，喜欢的，满意的
example: 单词 pleased 的例句||||She was pleased to hear good news about him. 听到他的好消息，她很高兴。||||Whichever day you come, we will be pleased to see you. 无论你哪一天来，我们都很高兴。

name: argue
interpret: vi.辩论，争论；vt.辩论，论证；说服，劝说
example: 单词 argue 的例句||||I won't argue about the matter. 我不会争论这件事。||||They sometimes argue off for hours. 他们有时一争就是几小时。

name: control
interpret: n.控制，管理，克制，控制器，调节装置；vt.控制，操纵，抑制
example: 单词 control 的例句||||He lost control of his bicycle and fell down. 他因控制不住他的自行车而跌倒了。||||That child is impossible to control. 那孩子很难管。

name: dancer
example: 单词 dancer 的例句||||I want to be a dancer. 我想成为一名舞蹈演员。|||| She was a great dancer. 她是一个伟大的舞蹈家。

name: someday
example: 单词 someday 的例句||||He'll forgive me someday. 总有一天他会宽恕我的。|||| My hope is that someday you will move to this town. 我希望你有朝一日能搬到这个城市里来。

name: cola
example: 单词 cola 的例句||||Oh, I'll bring some bottles of orange and coca-cola. 噢，我带几瓶橙汁和可乐。||||Cola is a soft drink. 可乐是一种不含酒精的软性饮料。

name: flew

单词 businessman 的例句||||He is a  businessman.他是一名企业家。
||||Jenny was married to a businessman. 珍妮嫁给了一位商人。

example: 单词 coach 的例句||||The coach is full of elderly ladies. 客车上坐满了老太太。||||The coach plays better than players. 教练比运动员打得好。

name: centre

example: 单词 mind 的例句||||I've changed my mind. 我一经转变主意。||||You really don't mind? 你真的不介意？

example: 单词 free 的例句||||I don't have much free time. 我没有多少空闲时间。||||There really is no free lunch. 天下果然没有免费的午餐。

example: 单词 lend 的例句||||Would you lend me some money? 能借我一些钱吗？|||| They had no reading books to lend. 他们没有阅读用书可以出借。

name: national
example: 单词 national 的例句||||In our country New Year's Day is a national holiday. 在我国，元旦是全国性的假日。||||Tomorrow is a national holiday. 明天是全国性节日。

name: lay

example: 单词 lay 的例句||||Please lay the knife on the dish. 请把刀放在盘子上。||||All birds lay eggs. 鸟都下蛋。

example: 单词 asleep 的例句||||The baby seems to be asleep. 那婴孩好像是睡着了。||||My right foot is asleep. 我的右脚麻木了。

example: 单词 wonder 的例句||||I wonder why he is late. 我想知道他为什么迟到。||||No wonder it's a wonder. 怪不得这是一个奇迹。

name: backpack
